1a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems sgom pa bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ 'phags
1b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dang mig zhan nur gyur pa la phyag 'a
2a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes pa// kun gyi rang bzhin na
2a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste// mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa// gnas gsum
2a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos// ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab
2b1(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa// chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid// bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig/ tshul khrims
2b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pha rol phyin lam skyed pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan khyad par ni// blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi de
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pa de ni mngon du gyur po na// de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs// shes byed ma par gyur pa shes rab spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya// rdo rtse ma mchog nyid
2b4(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid// ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol cho su brnyed pa de dag thams cad kyang // byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung //
3a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang // de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do// des na kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar
3a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya bar 'gyur// phra zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das// brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// tshig gis mi phebs gzhan deng
3a3(rgyud 'grel): byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang / ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdam ngag de nyid don 'dir lta/ mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun
3a4(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs dpyod yul chang mar bzhug nas blo yis 'jig byed de// thog mtha' skyed phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med mchang mar gang+gA/ de phyir 'jig rten rtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'drid mi dgos s+ho// bangos pa man
3a5(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya// skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni// 'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing rtag pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul// rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung
3a6(rgyud 'grel): pa de bzhin bden gyur na// de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol gyur pa yi rigs// de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las nges 'khrul mngon par 'gyur// gzhan du skye mched sgo nas
3b1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni// de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur// lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te// sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil
3b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas// de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs// des ni nges las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ kun tu rtog
3b3(rgyud 'grel): can yan lag ma yin kun tu rtog pas rtsol med nyams// blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas// sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin// 'du byed sna tsho
3b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu rtas che// sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang // bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i
3b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa// 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye// rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni mi rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// de las zag bcos rang bzhin rtog pas
3b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed// ldan par 'byung ba shin du phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las// bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog/ sems 'di las rnams mtha'
4a1(rgyud 'grel): yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// bag chags rtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te// rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus
4a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba// rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sang byas che 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de ma zhi grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor lam srad the tshomo rgyun yang rgyun
4a3(rgyud 'grel): phra ba ma rtogs skyes// bdag tu btags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur// rnam shes de yang 'du byad
4a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na// las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gi rig pa tha dad med// de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas// de la bsam pa zhen phyir phyi ma de 'byung
4a5(rgyud 'grel): de la snang // rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo'i chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin// rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin to// sems rgyud de la phyogs kyang cung zad mong pos gcig
4a6(rgyud 'grel): la brten med de// de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang // sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtags
4b1(rgyud 'grel): par rab tu dka'// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa// tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med// dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni//
4b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med// skya 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir brtag chad med// des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon// gnas
4b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bral de che mnyam gyur de med med// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang // snod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang meng pa bzhin// phyogs
4b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye// de phyir sems 'di yod maung mtha' lus 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral// bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul rgyu/
4b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra 'khrul la snang // de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge bo'i rgyun nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar btags pa yang // rdo rje'i granas med phyir ni mnyam gnas
4b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang // chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid mang bas skad cig min// dag pa'i gzugs bar na med pas 'jig rten ye shes yong min 'gyur// de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid
5a1(rgyud 'grel): // med par gcig pas drang dor med// don de'i tshul gyis don dum rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang // gnyis med bsam 'das stong nyid chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs// bstan pa de kun tha snyad
5a2(rgyud 'grel): yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med// don dam tshul gyis lam nyid 'di 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin// the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang spong zhing gnas par mi byed do// sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba
5a3(rgyud 'grel): la'ang med// de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams btags dang rang bzhin sgyu ma'ang med 'gyur phyir// yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa'ang med// mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la'ang gnas pa mi byed la// gang la 'jig rten dbang
5a4(rgyud 'grel): stsal pad+ma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas// chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te// drug gis bstan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor don du mi rtog go// shes rab thabs kyi spyod la mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi
5a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'dra bar sbyong // rang gi shes pa dam par byas te kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong // ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam// g.yo dang mi g.yo tha
5a6(rgyud 'grel): skang mi gnas gnas pa la'ang gnas par mi byed do// snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsung // gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni// rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa 'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs
5b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid stong pa'o// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan las 'das lam sgom pa'ang bdud nyid de// de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin rtsal spangs gar mi gnas// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan med// ldang dang mi
5b2(rgyud 'grel): sdang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min// 'jam dpal ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de yin der mi gnas// bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyes phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrang mi 'gyur te// sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin//
5b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo// 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin// na mkha' dmigs mings
5b4(rgyud 'grel): dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba 'ang med// rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral// don dang 'dred med gang la'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing // mnyam nas gnyis su brtags med brjod/
5b5(rgyud 'grel): byal bya dang mi bya med de sogs bri med// ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang // gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing // mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang ba
5b6(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin rnams der shes te// sems kyi dbyings su bsgoms pas lom 'di gzhan du bsgom pas 'od gsal mi 'gyu ro// brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen por yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir// de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid
6a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cing bsgoms pa'i gnas yin te// ting 'dzin gsum po bstan par byas nas rtams kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyeng de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems
6a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsgom pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin// kun tu bzang mo'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur// de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las
6a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs// don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu sngags// gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yi// mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil
6a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsung // thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid do// 'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do// skad cig tsam du dad pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du
6a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang bsrungs pa yin// tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags// de phyir byang chub sems
6a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chungs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs// skye bo skye ba sna tshogs ngag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyis dbong song ba// rtogs
6b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med sbyar ba// sgyu ma'i sgra shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams// rmi lam gyis klang bzhin du rmi yis bden pa
6b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa// lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lamo gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de// de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rje'i thugs rjes kyi ma 'phros pa yin// shin tu ma
6b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la// gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la sgra bzhin sbyong ngang tshul bzhin min// rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs lta ba sna tshogs dag/ mi shes chu
6b4(rgyud 'grel): bos g.yengs shing gsung gi nying khu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral// de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugaso ba'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di// kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun ma yin yang // goms
6b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dgra las rab bsgrubs te// 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas// skye bos skye gnas thams cad du yod skad cig tu// mi mthun phyogs
6b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyis thugs 'di rab rgyas shog/ rdzogs so// // 'jam dpal pa shes gnyen gyis mdzad //
7a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yang dag par 'arjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa bzhugs/
7b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM g+hi ti/ bi d+hi su tra bin+ni ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la
7b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul gnas kun la khyab// lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te// mtshan brjod
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dka' ba// bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang // dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig/ lung dang man ngag dag la brtan pa bshad// thag pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba// dus gsuM
7b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lam mchog 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni// slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// dpag bsam shing tshan 'dir phyogs tsam// ye shes lus can 'jam dpal
7b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pur grub// mdo dang bsres pa'i mchog rim pa ste// de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin/ gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston ces pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / dbang thob
7b6(rgyud 'grel): par ston to// gzhan yang gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs zhes pa dang / bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// ces pas sgrub pa'i snod du rung bar bstan// yon tan las ri dang chu klu
8a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung / zhes pa dang gnas rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' ba ston to// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ zhes pas/ bsgrub dus gza' dang rgyu skar dang / nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa bstan
8a2(rgyud 'grel): to// dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs// zhes pas bsgrub pa'i rdza su don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / maN+Dal gsum dang me tog dang / dri'i byul pa dang mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang / blo brtan pa dang yo byad dang / tshogs par bya ba'i
8a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bdame to// yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang / gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa/ hUM mtshan ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshes mdog nag pa zhal gcig
8a4(rgyud 'grel): pa phyag gnyis pa/ thong dbyug dang sdigs mdzub byed pa/ sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pa dang / mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyi rdo rje'i rA ba dang / dra ba bya bar bstan to// snying rje chen po'i blo yi mchog
8a5(rgyud 'grel): ces pa dang / phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/ zhes pas/ sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston ces pa/ a ni yig 'bru kun
8a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog/ ces pas thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying kar ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya ba ston to// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ ces pa dang / mchod 'os bstod 'os
8b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i bdag ces pa 'di ston to// bdag gi snying kar a dang hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang / dkon mchog gsum
8b2(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'jam dpal dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas/ bdag gis bltas te/ lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstong ngo // bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ ces pa dang / dpag
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par na mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrubs la/ snying kha'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to// sbyin bdag chen po'i gtso ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ston pa po// brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin// zhes pa 'dis ston te/ sngags ngang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ bdag gi snying ka nas lha mo bzhi spros te/ gnas pa rnam pa gsum du mchod par bya'o// de bas na dbugs 'byin chen po
8b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshegs zhes pas ston to// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// zhes bya ba dang / smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ zhes bya ba dang / byang chub yan lag me
8b6(rgyud 'grel): tog spos zhes bya bas/ phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying kha nas gong gi tshul du sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su 'bu lo// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che zhes pa'i bar gyis/ gsang ba
9a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mchog tu gsang ba bzhis bstan to// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos kyi gru blangs pas/ rdo rje las kun byed pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su sgeg mo la
9a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang / rim pa bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o// gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / chags pa la sogs pas dbulo// rgyas par ma phye'o// zhes bstan to// de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ yang na ni thams cad
9a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang bstod par shes par bya'o// de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthor yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas/ tshad med po bzhi bsgoms zhes so// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad // yang dag bdag
9a4(rgyud 'grel): med de bzhin nyid// yang dog mtha' de yi ge med// chos dbyings dam pa zad min bdag/ nos pas de'i don sgom pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do// phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes ston to// spyong nyid dmar 'dod pa khro khyod
9a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dod ma spangs pa ste/ zhes pas pad+ma'i steng na dngos gzhi los langs te/ dang po dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa dang / chos kyi 'byung nas/ de'i tha ma 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du/ pad+ma zla ba'i steng na mu da mar skye'i// de bzhin gshegs/
9a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu dmar// cod pan bzang po thon ka'i rtse// skra mchog mthon ka chen po cam
9b1(rgyud 'grel): zur zung lnga ba me tog thod// rgyun kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// shes rab ral gri mda' ga zu thogs// rdo rje dkyil klung rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpral ldan sgeg dang bsregs par ldan// sum cu
9b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis// rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs bstan pa yin// // phyag rgya bzhi yi don bstan pa zhes bya bas// yum bzhi'i phyag
9b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya sku 'phro 'du dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab par bstan to// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ces pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang lha mo rnams thugs kar spros zhes pa'o// de nas mdun du pad+ma
9b4(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba la// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin du byas te/ ye shes sems dpa' bltas la dgug cing rang gi lus la bsgoms zhes pas gnyis su med par bya
9b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// zhes pas snying ka'i 'od kyis bskul te/ bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan zhes bstan to// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
9b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags dang bcas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sbrul la zhes ston to// de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do// bdag rigs gzhan rigs thams cad pas// shes dang
10a1(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ ces pa thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par du'o// de ltar rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags zlos pa dang / mtshan klog par byas te/ de ltar yon tan brjod pa las kyang / rigs kyi
10a2(rgyud 'grel): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' thams cad sku gnyis med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa'i ming ni/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams
10a3(rgyud 'grel): cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med par tshigasu bcad pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyi nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
10a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang
10a5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan las/ nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yid ma du lan gsum 'don tam/ glegs bamA du byas pa la klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs
10a6(rgyud 'grel): shing / gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring po mi thogs par de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/ mtshan
10b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing / dmigs pa yun ring du gnas pa des/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ many+dzu shrI hUM oM wA gi shwa ri muM/ maN+Dal tsakra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par
10b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul la/ phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod na/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag gzhan dpag tu med par 'byung bar
10b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring por mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par dam pas bsngags pa thab par 'gyur ro// dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma bdud rtsi 'thung // 'gro ba sdug bsngal nad kyis
10b4(rgyud 'grel): gzir 'gyur la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di// sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad// 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan 'gyur nas// mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog/
10b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las// rdo rje
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gru gar blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa rdzogs so//
11a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ldan gyi bka' 'brel don bsdus sgron ma paN+Di tade thA ka ra tsan+das mdzad pa/
11b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis// sangs rgyas kun ltar gnyis med pa// dam pa lam ston lta bu yi// sku yi rnam par 'char mdzad pa// 'jam pa'i
11b2(rgyud 'grel): sa la phyag 'tshalo// slob mas lags par rtogs phyir dang // bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa'i phyir// gsang ldan dka' 'grel 'dir brtsam bya// de nas dkyus nyid la 'jug par bya ste// gang 'di la sogs pa'i tshig rkang pa bzhis mchod par
11b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ston te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa yin la/ de la slob dpon nyid lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'o// zab cing la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis
11b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad par dam bca' ston pa ste/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan zab cing rgya che ba'i mtshan/ rnal 'byor ci'i rgyud la brten nas/ gzhan dang bdag gi don du 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad pa'o// thig la bcu drug mi shigs dbus la sogs pa
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa bcu drug gis gang la zhus pa dang / gang gis zhus pa dang / gang gi don du zhus pa ston pa las/ gang la zhus na sku gsum la zhus pa ston te/ thig le la sogs po rkang pa bdun gyis chos sku bstan/ gsang sngags la sogs pa
11b6(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa gnyis kyis longs sku bstan la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis sprul sku bstan/ byang chub la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis gang gis zhus pa bston cing blo zhan don phyir rim pa gsungs// zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis gang gi don du
12a1(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa bstan pa'o// de ltar slad kyi don bstan nas gzhung la 'jug par bya ste/ gang gis gang du thabs ji ltar bya ba dang gsum du gnas pa las/ de la dang por rdo rje 'chang chen por// slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas
12a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ sa pa rkang pa gnyis kyis gang zag gang gis bya ba ston te/ slob dpon rig pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs pa/ de nyid bcu shes shing 'jigs pa med pas cha rkyen lnga dang ldan par bya ste/ phyi nang gi khrus dang / phyi nang gi bsrung ba dang / byi nang
12a3(rgyud 'grel): ge gos bgo ba dang / phyi nang gi byug pa dang / gnas dong stan sngags chus bsangs la 'dug pa'o// bsam gtan dang ni rjes 'thun par la sogs pa'i rkang pa drug gis gnas dang bsnyen pa ston pa la/ gnas ni rkang pa lnga yis ston to// zla yis
12a4(rgyud 'grel): bye ba gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i gnas so// sogs pa'i sgras ni sgrub pa'i gnas bsdu'o// der chag chag sbyang nul bya zhong me tog gis nyams dga' bar bya'o// grogs bzang btsal la snyen pa brtsam zhus pa rkang pa gcig gis
12a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa bya bar dam bca' ba bstan pa'o// bdag dngas gA ni ngasu sbyang snyid la sogs byung ba bzhis tshogs gcig pa'i bad+ma da bsgrung zla bsnun te/ rdo rje 'chang hUM mdzad du bsgyur la// g.yas dang glu yon gser gyi rdo rje dang
12a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bsnams pa khro zhing rngam pa'i thugs khar ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du d+hU sngon po bsams la de las 'ong byung bas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dper ba dang gur dang bri res dang dro bar gyur par bsam mo// rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams
12b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjesu 'brang ba 'am/ rdo rje rtse mo dag gi rjesu 'brang ba las shes par bya'o// 'dir ni bla ma'i man ngag bsdus pa'o// de nas shin tu rtser ldan pas/ sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis tshogs gsog
12b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yo byad sprul pa ston te/ de la spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang / so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlab bo// spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin nam/ rdo rje rtse mo yongasu bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba ni spyir sbyang ba'o// rdo rje
12b3(rgyud 'grel): me'i sngags dang phyag rgya mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsregs pa ni sreg pa'o// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ til dang nas dang ku sha dang / 'bras yos dang dri bzang po dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon
12b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du rdo rje'i gar byas la rdo rje'i thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag bya bcas pa la/ oM a ra pa tsa ra ya ti rA ma 'am/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlab bo// de bzhin du me tog drang
12b5(rgyud 'grel): spos dang mar me dang dri dang byug pa dang lha bshos dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams mi'i las 'das nas/ lha'i mchod rdzas khyad par can du bsam mo// de bzhin du sbyin srog la yang bza' ba zas kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste/ gzhung bzhin
12b6(rgyud 'grel): du bsham zhing byin gyis brlab bo// sngon du bsnyen pa rab 'bad de/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa rkang pa bco lngas rten gyi zhing sprul par ston te/ de yang sngon du bsnyen pa zhes pa rkang pa bzhi rten gyi zhing na mkha' la sprul par dam bca' bar
13a1(rgyud 'grel): ston la/ lag pa'i 'du byed ces brkyang ba bcu gcig gis rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi lus ngam yid kyi sbyor bas lcing spyan drungs pa ston te/ de yang bdag gis g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo la oM AHn+tu d+hU tA/
13a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga bkod la/ de nas mdzum mo gnyis mthe chung gnyis so sor bdud la de bkan la/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes brjod cing byon par bsams mo// grong byon zhe na rigs lnga 'am gcig gram drug pa/ mya rigs gsum mdun gyi nam
13a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la byon pa'o// gang gis byon zhe na/ lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas so// de ltar mkha' la zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bdag dang zhing du 'brel par bya ba ston te/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams yang byem po
13a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ma yin te/ rig pa can spyan rtsi rig rig pa snyan cha khrol khrol par bsam pa'o// dka' ba'i mchod pa klu yis bstod ces pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa ltos cho ga dag pa yan lag bcu'i ske nas bsod nams kyi tshogs
13a5(rgyud 'grel): gsag par bya ba ston te/ de yang dag pus mchod ces pa rkang pa lngas phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang ba dang / mya dran las mi 'anga' bar gsol
13a6(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdag dbul ba dang / dngos grub blang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang dgu ste/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'breng ba dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjesu 'breng ba las shes par bya ste/
13b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag rgya yis me tog la sogs pa rnam pa lnga phul/ oM badz+ra lA s+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le trAM/ oM badz+ra gI tI hrI/ oM badz+ra nir+t+ti A/ oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra haM/ badz+ra rat+na ma nut+tA raM/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma ka ya n+ye/ badz+ra kar+m+ma ka ro d+hU be/
13b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra d+hu be dz+haiM/ oM badz+ra puSh+To trAM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hrIH/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he e/ sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dge bair mchod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma nAM nir+yA ta nA pU dzaM s+pha ra Ne karma badz+ra a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma
13b3(rgyud 'grel): tsA nIR+YA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dzaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma nAM nIR+Sha tA nu rA ga Na pU dza s+phA ra Na karma bA ne hUM ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma nAM niR+YA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+phA ra Na karma duSh+To aM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ka yA b+hi She ka rat+ne bo badz+ra ma
13b4(rgyud 'grel): nIni oM/ oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA g+hA ta sUr+ye b+h+yo badz+ra te dza ni dza la hri/ oM sirba ta thA ga tA sha ba ri pU ra NA tsan+ta ma ni d+ha dzA gra b+h+yo badz+ra d+hA dzA gri tI/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta bA trapra ti pra mor+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ya ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ta badz+ra d+harma ta sa ma ti/
13b5(rgyud 'grel): b+histu no mi mya hA d+harma grI d+hI/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA bA ra mi tA naiR+Sha re stu n+yo mi ma g+ho ShA nu g+he d+hi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa pA~M k+Sha rA pA ro brta d+hi sarba su tran+ta na ye sU no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+na b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM g+hi hi/ b+hi yaM stu no mi badz+ra
13b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ri baM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa s+pha ra tra pA dzA kAHki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo kaM dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dzi karma ba ra ba ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga d+hi sa mu tra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ku ru
14a1(rgyud 'grel): ku ru/ zhes bya ba sems dpa' bcu bya// dang 'dra ba'i rog ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de'i phyag rgya na 'di rnams te// rdo rje bsdamasu bskur ban pA ste bcangs la/ gnyis su drA /
14a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur gnyis// bsgyings bcas gsor la gnyi ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mnga' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni// logaso zhes po snying khur bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying khar nyi ma bstan par bya// g.yon
14a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yan pa dbye// snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdung // mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyi kra kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi// thal mo//
14a4(rgyud 'grel): 'akram pa spyi bor bzhug/ go cha mthe chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// de nas phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor la yan lag lngas phyag btsal bar bsam zhing 'dis phyag bya ba ni/ oM sarba tra thA ga ta kA ya wa krit+ta pA na
14a5(rgyud 'grel): me na badz+ra bon+d+ha nAM ka ro mi/ de nas phyag bzhi bya ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo rkyang ba lus thams cad pab ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzo po s+thA nA ya At+ma nA nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba tra thA ga ta badz+ra satwA d+hi tiSh+Tha stu mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis
14a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya'o// de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje phal mo snying khar sbyar te/ dpra par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzI bi She ka ye At+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ zhes pa 'a
14b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya'o// de nas nub phyogs nas ji skad bshad pa bzhin rdo rje thal mo spyi bIr bzhag ste kha swa la rog pa dang / oM sarba ta thA g+ha ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mo/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o// de nas
14b2(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ sIng khar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzaM kar+m+ma Ni At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA ma~M/ sarba ta thA ge ta badz+ra kar+m+ma kro R+Sha maM/ zheso bya bo 'dis phyag
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas me tog phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba'i
14b4(rgyud 'grel): chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de dag rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
14b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar 'gyuraro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na
14b6(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig pa'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ yongasu
15a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang
15a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA gau ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pho ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mAr me'i phyag rgya
15a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ rin po che'i 'od dam mar
15a4(rgyud 'grel): me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dgra yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga
15a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// A~M sarba ta thA ga tra A l-i ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ dri'i phyag rgya bcings
15a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am yongasu
15b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas
15b2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM saurba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dr-i s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bzhad pa'i phyag
15b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi rkang pa dang sgeg pa dang dga' ba dang rtse 'jo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag
15b4(rgyud 'grel): yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
15b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA gA ta ha s+ye lA s+ya ra ti kri Ta sau nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa mA le hUM/ bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de nyid thal
15b6(rgyud 'grel): mo bskor po 'di spyi bo bzhag la/ yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ dpag bsam
16a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi shong ngam gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
16a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rigs kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra bo d+ha l-i ku ra baus+t+ra pu dza~M me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sgeg mo'i
16a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+rod b+ha ba dA nA pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha
16a4(rgyud 'grel): so mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yaye hUM/ rdo rje phreng ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang
16a5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems
16a6(rgyud 'grel): can thaMd mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med par bzhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan
16b1(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tAnAd+hA ra ma hA d+ham+b+ha la bau d+hi k+ShAn+t+r-i pU ra mo tA pU dza m+bo g+hA sa mu drA smAr Na sA mA yo dz+dza/ rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
16b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongasu gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongasu mi spong ba'i bzlos dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pA ri t+yA kA nut+tA ra ma hA bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+hu sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
16b3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i rten gyi khams thams cad na/ rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de
16b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
16b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi ga rat+na l-i ka ro pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs pas rnam par
16b6(rgyud 'grel): bkram pa/ brgya stang la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam/ 'byor pa ci yod pa ltar dbul bar bya ba dang / ro brgya pa'i lhag pa'i zhal zas dang / swasti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'bum mam brgya stong skad dbul par bya ste/ oM
17a1(rgyud 'grel): ro mu kha sarba d+harmA NA/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta zhes brjod pa dbul bar bya'o// rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam rol mo brgya phrag stong ngam/ rol mo bcu/ moM hUM hrI mngon par zlas la dbul bar bya'o// rnam pa bcu ni 'ang lta ste/ gling bu/
17a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / rdza rnge chung ngu dang / che lang dang rnga bo che dang / mr-i traM gau dang / rnga ring dang / rnga skad nyag dang / tA mi la zhes bya'o// shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang / glang po che dang ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang / oM badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas
17a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos pa byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma
17a4(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar sbyar nas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
17a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigasu bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rlig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming rdo rje 'di zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i
17a6(rgyud 'grel): ngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang ra gi sngags kyi lha tha~Md
17b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na mod par so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'pha
17b2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rje su yi rang bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos
17b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad la mya
17b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol 'tshalo// de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis/ bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhesu gsol//
17b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsol du gsol// bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas sho ga/ 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston
17b6(rgyud 'grel): bgyid cing // sems can sdug bsngal mdo bos gzir las dgrol// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos la/ de nas bstod pa ni 'khrugs sdeb par bya ste// tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya// byang chub sems ni
18a1(rgyud 'grel): rab 'byung ba'i// zhes bya ba la sogs patshogs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstod pa bston pa ni/ tshigs bcud glu yis bstod par bya// byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i// 'di ltar sangs rgyas
18a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das// don chen yi ge dam pa yin// mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// gti mug bro ste gaN+DI muga~M sal// mgon po so bcu'i dbang phyug ste// rdo rje chags pa khyod la 'dud//
18a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// gdong drug mig drug lag drug po// mche gtsigs gdong brgya kun 'dul ba// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// stong nyid smra bo'i khyu mchog
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// 'dod pa'i don grub ngan song sbreng // mgon po nyon mongs dra ba 'joms// sa gzhi tshangs gnas rkang pas gnod// sgyu 'phrul dru ba khyed la 'dud//
18a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub rtog bya ba// thig le chen po yi gre med// longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// me longs ye shes ngo bo nyid// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchogs/ khong nus byung ba skye ba med
18a6(rgyud 'grel): sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// oM ni 'byung ba 'gog pa ste// tshig tu brjod pa rnam spangs pa// rin chen 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// so sor kun rtag ngo bo nyid// a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin
18b1(rgyud 'grel): // brjod pa kun gyi rgyu mi mchog/ rlos/ rdo rje 'jug khyod 'drud// byA ba nan tan ngab nyid// an cig 'byugs la bar byed// tshig kun gsal byur byed pa yin// rdo d+hag khyod pa 'du// stong pa rang bzhin 'dod chags ma/
18b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyi nyid ma grub bde pa che// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gnyi ga med par dga' ba tshe// spangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// stong pa'i don ldan mgu ba che// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud//
18b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// kha dog che la gzi brjid ldan// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// ming che mtshan bzang rgya che ba// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshul 'dud// bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yangs khyab
18b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud// chos kyi shes rab mtshon byang ba// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag/ na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud
18b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba chen po gsal ba che// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// mkhas shing 'phrul 'chang rdo rje las// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul chen po go che sra// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid gnod sbyin gtso//
18b6(rgyud 'grel): sems cad thams cad khyod la 'dung // sgyu 'phrul sa chu zhing bsrung // ye shes su nying khyod la 'dud// skyon dag rdzo seM hrI// rdo rje spem tsho khyod la 'dud// tshul khrims chen po 'ching ba'i mchog/ rdo rje dpal 'bru bya
19a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// bzod chan 'chang ba ston pa po// rdo rje dbangs mkhan khyod la 'dud// brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi// rdo rje gar ma khan khyod la 'angang // bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje me tog khyod la 'dud// shes rab
19a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po lus 'chang ba// rdo rje bdug pa khyod la 'dud// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// rdo rje mar mu gsal la 'dud// stabs po che la thabs che ba// rdo rje dang / byed khyod la 'dud// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che// rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la 'dud//
19a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nags pa rnam par rgyal// rdo rje 'dren byeng khyod la 'dud// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che// rdo rje sdom byed khyed la 'dud// rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhags// rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud// byams chen rang bzhin dadag tu med//
19a4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// ye shes cha grub sems dpa'i tsho gas// stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa// bag la nyal la byams sems can// shes rab snying rjer ldan la
19a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan/ shugs ched mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o// stobs chen rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i// goms shugs ye shes bzhir
19a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'dzin// drag po chen po mun pa 'joms// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed
19b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul// mi shes ri 'joms sra ba po// mya ngan kun sel drug po ste// che bas che ba khyod la 'dud// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas//
19b2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog/ theg pa'i tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mchog tu grub byed pa'i// pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud// 'dud nyi shu dang spyi bstod kyis kyang bstod// de ltar bstod
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa byed pa de// 'khor lo 'dud pa'i gtso mchog 'grub// zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bstod pa byas pa'i phan yon ston te/ de lar bstod pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyuraro//
19b4(rgyud 'grel): dgyes nus bdag la lha rnams kyis// snyan pa'i tshig gis bskyod par bsam// zhes bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyis// lha rnams kyis bdag la bstod par ston to// lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu bdag gzhan gyi don du lha rnams la bstod pa
19b5(rgyud 'grel): legaso// legaso zhes gsungs par bsam mo// drin gyi tshul gyis slar bstod pa// zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis slar lha rnams la bdag gis drin la lan gyi tshul gyis bstod pa thams cad dam/ 'dud nyi shus bstod pa'o// de dag ni mchog gi
19b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po sbyor ba dang po'i 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin to// zhes rkang pa gcig gis sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu rdzogs par stan pa'o// de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa brgyad rkang pa gsum gyis yongs su
20a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ phyag bya zhing smon pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed sdom pa bzung ba dang / 'jug pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pa/ ye shes lnga bsgom pa ston te/ go sla ba'i phyir 'dir ma smos//
20a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas de la mngon 'byung gzugs/ zhes pa nas/ de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gzhi'i ting 'dzin ston te/ rdo rje dang mchod rten dang chos 'byung dang rgya gram dang / gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed
20a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ston pa'o// de yang de ni yi ge rdzogs pa las zhes bya bas chos 'byung nang du yi ge a kha dog sna tshogs pa'am kha dog dkar pos sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par 'brel to// de yang slob dpon la la dag rgya gram khong du 'dod la/
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sa gzhi'i tshul du brtag par bya'o// de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni/ zhes pa nas dang po'i sangs rgyas sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyi sa gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa bstan pa'o// de yang dang po'i
20a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes pa ni/ shUr la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi ni sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu rnams so// steng gi zhal rnams ni lha zhal dkar po 'am/ rta zhal dkar po la rdog ma sngon po can no// dang po'i
20a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thugs ka ru// zhes pa nas de dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams ston te/ rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o// /
20b1(rgyud 'grel): da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste/ zhes pa nas de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to// zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal
20b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog skyed pa bstan pa ste/ dkyus ma nyid gsil ba'i phyir 'dir ma dkrol lo// 'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa las dkyil 'khor drug tu gsungs pa dang / gsang ldan 'di nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du gsung
20b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhag ma gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa'am/ yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas cig car du sprul pa'o// de
20b4(rgyud 'grel): yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang / thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o// gsang ldan 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i khongasu bsdu'o// khyad par ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis
20b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas las kyi khyad par yang bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste/ sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas// 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do// las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pas// las rgyal mchog gi ting 'dzin bstan pa ste/ de nas
20b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi khyad par yang // bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste// zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o// sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas// 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad//
21a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bla mas zhes bya ba'i don te/ bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste/ sgo bzhi'i dbye ba dang rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes
21a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' byon te/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang / spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang / sgron bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang nod pa dang / ye shes bstim pa dang / phyag rgyas gdab
21a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / lha las sbyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o// de las de yang las mkhan rang byed la/ sgo bzhi dbye ba ni/ dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyi sdig mdzub kyi se gol gtog cing / phreng sngags brjod pas sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo//
21a4(rgyud 'grel): yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug par bsam ste/ khro bo hUM mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ mdzub mo gnyis lto sbrang la drag tu brdab pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM badz+rod+hA Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM zhes
21a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo// de ni sgo dbye ba'o// de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying khur a las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ mthe bong dang mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dza bsams te/ lag ngar
21a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdo rje rgya gram gyi tshul du bsnol te/ dpung pa gnyis su mi gol gtog cing // rdo rje slu ba'i nang pa oM bang+ges nA bi dza hUM ba tshaM zhes brjod cing / mthe mjug gi rnga las ye shes kyi 'ong bar lcags kyu lta bur 'phros te/ rang bzhin gyis
21b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsam mo// de yang gzhung las rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bdag/ lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje dra bcing // rdo rje se grol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar
21b2(rgyud 'grel): bya zhes 'byung bas so// byon te phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa ni// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA k+Shit+tA/ pra NaH
21b3(rgyud 'grel): nAM badz+ra ban+de naM ka ro mi zhes brjod cing dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal bar bsam mo// de nas ched du brjod pa ni/ a ma'i kun tu bzang po yaM// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo
21b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes// zhes ched du brjod par byas mu mo// de nas spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad dam tshig
21b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs khar zhugs nas/ spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam/ de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kha nas ye shes lha tshogs thon
21b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ nam mkha' la gnas so// de nas sgon bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab po ni/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen gdod nas skyes pa min// rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur zhes brjod nas
22a1(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs khur zhugs te/ mi bskyod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ mi bskyod pa'i thugs kha nas slar thon te/ rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin
22a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs par bsam mo// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyoDa kyang she bar bya'o de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyisu shes par bya ste/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur
22a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa'o// dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni/ rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dur sbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba'o// de nas rigs
22a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyad yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar sbyangs kyis dbang bskur bsam/ bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar
22a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa ni lugs gnyis te/ ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs kha nas slar thon te/ gdan re re la snang ba gnyis gnyis kyi tshul du bzhun
22a6(rgyud 'grel): po la/ sgrub pa pos rigs pa'i dbang lnga 'am drug nos nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa 'am/ yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig
22b1(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la sgrub pa pos dbang nos par bsam mo// ye shes pa skur thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo// de yang dbang rtags ni sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po
22b2(rgyud 'grel): che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyisna dbang bskur bar bsam/ sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dAr dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab pa ni de
22b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo// sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis gnas bzhi byin gyis
22b4(rgyud 'grel): brlab par bas mo// de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa ste/ de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
22b5(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam mo// rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcing bar bsam// rdo rje 'bebaso ba'i
22b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo// de nas phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa ni gnyis te/ rgyas pa dang bsdus pa'o// rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjesu 'brengs pa las shes par bya'o//
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa ni de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab/ sgrub pa po'i snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/ gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi 'jug la/ dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM many+dzu shrI/ zhes
23a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo// chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ljags kyi steng du hUM dkar po las yongasu gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po las yongasu
23a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rmugs su yod par bsam/ de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku bskyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la/ chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo// las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni/ sgrub
23a4(rgyud 'grel): pa po'i snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ rdo rje gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
23a5(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo// phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// mnyam par bzhag pas gnyisu bya// rdo rje'i
23a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te// de nas bcings pa rab tu bshang// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo ni// g.yas pa'i nang du spang bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yis
23b1(rgyud 'grel): reg pa'o// rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za bar mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'
23b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste// sgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ka yin// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni// legaso zhes pa snying khAr gzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis//
23b3(rgyud 'grel): snying khar nyi ma bstan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs skor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye// snying khur g.yon pa ra lA gri mdung// mgal ma'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyi ka kha nas
23b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung // rdo rje gar gyis bskor ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe chung mtsho ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje sgyings pa'i tshul gyi su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdung ba bya// phreng ba bcings pas kha nas
23b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yin// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po// mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni// mthe chung las de
23b6(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu che// khrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud// rgyab gnyis rkyang ni bsnyams te mnan// sgo gnyis pa dang gsum pa la sogs pa lnga'i las kyi phyag rgyo bcing ba ni/ so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re 'am// phyogs
24a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bcing ba'o// de rnams ni 'dir mang du sgo mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o// de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni// sgrub pa po'i snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po// oM hUM hrIHzhes yid la zlos shing // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par// rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o//
24a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha las la sbyar ba ni// gzhung las/ de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni// sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas// 'dir ni bdag gris ma bshad do// zhes 'byung bas sgra las 'phel te bshad pa na// gsang ldan nam ske dang po'i lha las
24a4(rgyud 'grel): la bzhag pa ni/ lce'i dag pa dang mthun par las la bzhag ste/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no// sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sems can
24a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang ser sna dang / phrag dog sbyongs shig pa'o// yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi sgo bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la sbyar ba'o// las kyi khyad par gyi ting
24a6(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni/ mtshams sbyar bar bya'o// de nas spos kyi chu dag la// sngags 'das pa yis bas byas te// phung pos bsdu ba'i mchod pa lngas// rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas// 'di dag rim pa'i go rims
24b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis// sa gol rim pas brdab byas pas// rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te// mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas// sa ma ya dzeHzhes brjod bya zhing // 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la// mnyam med la
24b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bstod par bya// de nas gtso bo sngags rings la// dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing // a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni// bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog grub// de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis// mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni// dang
24b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i// gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o// de dag ni yongasu rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting 'dzin te// zhes bya bas yongasu rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa te// de dag yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste// de nas spos
24b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi chu dag la// sngags zlas pa yis bsang bya ste// phung pos bsdus ma'i mchod pa lngas// rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas// zhes bya bas/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa sten te// spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang / so so'i snga
24b5(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te// sngon bzhin no// 'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis// se gol rim pa brdab byas pas// rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te// mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas//
24b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba ston te/ de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas sbyar drangs la mdun gyi na mkha' la byon par bsam mo// sa ma ya dzaHzhes brjod
25a1(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing // 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la// mnyam meng la sogs bstod par bya// zhes pas bstod pa ston to// sngags sngon du 'gro bas/ dri nas bstod pa ni mnyam med mi g.yo 'am 'dud nyi shus bstod pa
25a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas dgug pa dang bcing bA dang mnyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhol yas ljang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon bzhin no// de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la// dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod
25a3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing // a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni// bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub ces bya bas lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ston te/ de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni// las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par
25a4(rgyud 'grel): papar bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod nas zhes bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te/ de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyi nang gi lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa dang / bsgrub mchod
25a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug dang / mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du 'bul lo// phyag bzhi bya ba ni dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o// zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te/ de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni/
25a6(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin tshe rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / nub phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsa
25b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste/ sngon bzhin no// de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gang ma ngag gi nyams pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang / mtshan
25b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas pa rnams ston pa ni/ de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ bsgom bzlas bya ba ni/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsam/ oM swa b+hA wa bI shud+d+ha haM zhes brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par drag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ oM sarba sa mo haM zhes
25b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du sgom mo// de ltar mnyam pa nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang / mtshan
25b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byed na yang lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la/ bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byas pa'i dus su lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam/
25b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byas nas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis// bzlas pa'i bsnyen pa la/ dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i snyan pa dang / grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang gsum mo// de ltar
26a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o// de la sngags rnams 'di yin+na te/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA yo gi shwa ra hUM/ oM badz+rA satwa hUM/ oM badz+rA ran+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra d+harma d+d+ha/ oM badz+ra kArma hUM/ oM badz+ra bAd+d+ho NitrUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na badz+re Ni tA/
26a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra d+harma badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le hUM/ oM badz+ra gI taM hUM/ oM badz+ra nodzo hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra rA dza dzA/
26a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rA gra ho/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu sa/ oM badz+ra rat+na oM/ oM badz+ra twe dza oM/ oM badz+ra k+She tudz+dza/ oM badz+ra hA swA ha/ oM badz+ra d+har+m+ma hri/ oM badz+ra tAk+Sh+Na d+h+waM/ oM badz+ra ha~M tu maM/ oM badz+ra b+ha Sha re/ oM badz+ra karma kaM/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/
26a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ri san+d+hi ba~M/ oM badz+ra a~M kr-i sh+yA dza/ oM badz+ra pA sha trUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ba/ oM badz+ra a be shaM oM/ khyad par g+ho snying po'i sngags/ oM dAdz+dza pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+ha ye te na maH/ oM pu kha ts+tshe da ya te na maHoM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na ya te na meH/
26a5(rgyud 'grel): oM wA mI shwa ra ya te na maHoM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na maT+Te/ oM a pa ra tsa nA yA te na maH/ thun mong gi sngags te/ go bzlog par+ya shes par bya'o// oM sarba d+hAr+m+ma b+hUny+dza swA dzA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+re ya A aM a pra kr-id+b+ha pa r-i sh+yAd+d+ha/ sa
26a6(rgyud 'grel): d+hamA me dwe ta/ sarba rba thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa'i shud+d+hi ta su pa tra mai ta~M/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ti hr-i la/ har te ra/ oM hU hrIH/ thog wA/ dz+nyA na mu d+he dzI gI shwa ra~M/ ma hA ba tsa~M/ sa bad+ha rmA ga gan/ a ma lA~M su dz+ran+daH/
26b1(rgyud 'grel): d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so// bsnyen pa bstan pa'o// / de nas bsgrub pa la 'jug pa ni// de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du/ gzu
26b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes bya bas bsgrub pa'i gnas bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i spyir mdor bstan te/ de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa/ rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs
26b3(rgyud 'grel): pas dben par bya bar gsungs so// sa de bzhung bzhin sbyar bya dang // / gzungs dang ldan pa gzhung bzhin du// byi ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o// zhes bya bas sna'i cho ga rgyas par bstan te/ dri yang brams gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyung
26b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don brgyad kyi shes par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' sker bzang po lo zhugs te// slob dpor slob ma'i spyong lam bya ba ni// ze gcig gis bskud pa dang dkar gsum bzung
26b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam bya'o// grong khyer chen po 'ang gtsug lag khang ngam/ lnga khang la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyog su bri bar bya'o// de nas ji tsam byed po'i dkyil 'khor gyis bcang la sa'i lto'i 'phye brtag par byas la/
26b6(rgyud 'grel): nas sa brkos ngo sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o// sa'i ra lnga ni sa'i ro gseg ma dang / mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang / rdza'i ro gyi dum dang / shing li ro mgal dum la sogs pa dang / rtsa'i ro phub ma la sogs pa med
27a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o// blon po 'am blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu 'am de'i phyeng la bya'o// sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug la bya'o// sa brtag pa ni nyis
27a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur tshun du brtag go/ de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la spang bar bya'o// sa'i lha mo la slang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la slang ba dang / sa bdag la sogs pa la spang ba'o// de nas yid kyis sa'i lha
27a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gser gyi mdog can lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig sa'i 'og nas sku phyo tsam 'thon par bsams la/ spos chus brlan par byas pa'i lag pas sa la lan gsum rngabs lA/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams
27a4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya sing+ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar
27a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ sa'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bar bris shig zer nas sa'i nang du thim par bsam mo// yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhi pa zhig
27a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ der mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang gtor ma gcig bshams la/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul te/ spos kyi snod thegs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ dgongs shig bdag la
27b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la sman slad du// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'bri bar 'tshal// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bdag la byin
27b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab tu gsol// de skad ces lan gsum brjod pas/ dkon mchog gsum gyis gnang ba byin par bsam mo// yang gtor ma a kA ro la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i
27b3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te spos thogs te/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang // gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin// yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa'i// 'byung
27b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la phan don du// dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher byung ba// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin bri na// khyed
27b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod// da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni// bzod bar gsol gyis ma slu bar// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi// legs nyes bltas rnams bstan du gsol//
27b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol ba btab pas// sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig par gnang ba byin par bsam mo// de nas chag chag dang skyang nul legs par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis yungs kar gtor//
28a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing bgegs skud nas/ oM hUM hrIHzhes pa 'am/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes bya ba lan gsum mam/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o// yang na
28a2(rgyud 'grel): dang por sa'i pra brtag par bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pus mo nub tsam lte ba nub tsam brkos la/ de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo na mkha' la oM badz+re pa ta ya zhes brjod la brdeg/ de nas dong gi
28a3(rgyud 'grel): nurlung du chus bkang ste/ me tog yang bcug la/ oM hUM hrIH'am oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi dal ba brgya phyin te/ tshur log nas chu ma skam na dngos grub yod par ston/ chu skams na gzhan du
28a4(rgyud 'grel): sro bar bshad/ de nas rdza so ma btang ba zhig tu rin po che sna lha 'bru lnga dang sman dang snying po dang spos dang lnga brug la/ dong gi nang du gzhug po/ de nas rkos pa'i sa da rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags btab pa'i spos chus bral brul du
28a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrus la nang dgang bar bya'o// lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yid par bstan// chang na gzhan du spro// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gang ba/ 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyu ba bzhin du byas
28a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa ni sa las dang byo bas sbyang ba'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin nam rdo rje rtse mos bzlas pa'i spos chus gsang gter bya ba dang / zhi ba'i skyon sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang yungs kar gyi gtor ma ni sngags kyis sbyang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang
28b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khang la thug pa'i bar du bsgoms la sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i nang du sa chung bar sgom par bya'o// sa sbyang ba'o// de nas slob dpon ltar
28b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sa phyogs 'dri nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o// zhes bsam pa sngon du btang ba ni/ sems kyi dbang gis gzung ba'o// de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byasA la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na duHkhats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA nA murti/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wa gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na/ ya te na ma/ zhes zlos
28b4(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dug pa yan chad ni/ slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin no// de nas bsgrub bya'i phyogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan+da pa bzhi s+t+waM/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ 'dung nyi shus bstod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag gi ni bstod pa yis// tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lho che// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshang du gsol// zhes bya ba ni bgogs tshor gtsang par
28b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab pa'o// de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni// g.yas su ma las nyi ma g.yon du Ta las zla ba/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM gis mig 'bras tshul du byas pa ni mig brlab pa'o// rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs
29a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsgoms pa ni rkang pa brlab pa'o// bdag nyid rang gi rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid// bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag/
29a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro// rdo rje lta bas cher gcad pa'i// mig g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon phyogasu bskor bas/ bgegs thams cad gsal gdab par bsam/ g.yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas phyogasu
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg par bsam mo// de ni rdo rje lta bas tshar gcod ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mchemasu byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du mchongs te phyin la/ kha lho phyogs su bltas la/
29a4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkur brtan la rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad du
29a5(rgyud 'grel): nu med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri yis/ lha dang lho ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dgas dang / sha za dang 'byung po dang brjed
29a6(rgyud 'grel): byed dang mkha' 'gro ma dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang rgan po dang rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod po de dag dengs shig/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas
29b1(rgyud 'grel): myur ba nyid du dngas shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag/ nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par bya'o// zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas rkang pa'i sor mos rdo rjes rtse gcig pa sa la 'bri zhing // hUM hUM zhes
29b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stobs bdun dang / lag stobs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni rdo rje stang stobs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig buM
29b3(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ yang na de bas mang yang rung // shar phyogs su gzug par bya// pog por kham pa las byis pa/ so ma btang ba dkar po bcu// byas nas phyogs dang mtsham su ni// brgyad pa de bzhin bdun du bkod// pog por dag du ma
29b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor na// kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul// de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na// gcig gcig sgor ni bzhag nas dbul// me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi// rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya// nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyis//
29b5(rgyud 'grel): myur gu legs par skye bar dgod// dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab drang // srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni// rta babs sogs las phyi rol du// mdzes par bya phyir mkhas pas gdags// 'bras yos 'bru dang bcas pa yi// me
29b6(rgyud 'grel): tog sil ma rab tu dgram// dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du// phyi ma'i ro mo sdug gu bri// 'jig rten 'di na grags pa yi// bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams// dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du// phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas
30a1(rgyud 'grel): pas dgos// yi gyi brgya ba zlas pa'i chus// dngang ldan gyi phyogs nus brtsams nas/ phyi dang nang du bcas la gsang gtor bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor ma'i dran
30a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya kha'i dbus su gzhag la/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyi d+mo'i dus su glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang me tog dang / spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang / ni 'dod
30a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o// de nus rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dkar po sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying pos bzhugasu gsol te/
30a4(rgyud 'grel): yang na phreng sngags sam/ yang na sangs rgyas kyi snying po oM hUM hriHsa bzhugs su gsol la/ de bzhin du lha gzhan gyi yang sku bzhugs pa 'am/ mtshan ma rnams brtags la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying 'apo
