59a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par ni rje su skyongs// theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya// 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'das mI chags// lha dang lha min gsung ba la// khyod kyis bsnyas par mi bya'o// phyag rgya bzhon pa
59a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha ngag/ mtshan ma bsgom par mi bya'o// 'di dag dam tshig yin por bshad// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// des slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gsol// gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de dag bdag gis bgyid par
59b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// de nas sdom pa gzung ba brjod// sdom pa mi 'dod gang zag la// 'jug pa tsam zhig mi bya'o// dbang bskur bar ni mi bya'o// bo d+hi tsit+to tA da yA mi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed nasu// de'i snying khar
59b2(rgyud 'grel): snying pos ni// rdo rje rab tu bzhag par bya// su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badz+ra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ dang po'i sangs rgyas byin gyis brlob// mchod pas mchod de yon blangs nas// las kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro// sems mas bcings te
59b3(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhir gzhug/ de nas shar sgor 'dug byas la// dus 'di nyid du khyod nyid ni// sangs rgyas rigasu chung pos na// nga yi rdo rje ye shes sbyin// sangs rgyas rigasu 'grub par gsungs// gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i// mdun
59b4(rgyud 'grel): du smra bar ma byed cig/ brag mad smras na nyams par 'gyur// dre bras nanA tan smra bar bya'o// snying khar rdo rje gtugs la smra'o// de nas rdo rje mgor bzhag la// 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste// 'ga' la smras na klad pa 'gas// tsIn
59b5(rgyud 'grel): gur gum la sogs pa'i// mna' chu byin la 'di skad brjod// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das nas sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub// 'thung zhig rdo rje chu las 'thung // oM badz+ra ya ta hUM/ mna'
59b6(rgyud 'grel): bor ro// de nas 'di skad smras te// dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi// rdo rje 'dzin po nga yin gyis// nga yi ji ltar bka' stsal te// khyod kyis skyo ba med par gyis// gang yang nga la ma mos min// de bzhin mos par ma byas ni// bdud
60a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom nas myos par 'gro// de bas dam tshig gnas par gyis// de nas yi ge brgya pa mnyam gzhag bstan byas la// bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgra pra ste// snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbu su blta/ sngags/
60a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag po yi ge a gzugs dmar// brjod pas yang dag pas g.yo blta// slob ma'i lus 'di sgo nas dbye bar bya// zhugs nas rdo rje byams ma'i snying la gnas// ma lus mal kun tu gang nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas
60a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa mnan nas su// sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab// kun tu dril bu'i sgras ni yang dag dkrol// lag pa pad+ma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya bca'// mi bskyod na chen la sogs ba gshegs rnams// rang gi
60a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rtogs las byung 'di phab pas// legs pab gyur par rang nyid lus la blta// ga'is nges kyang babs par ma gyur na// lag pa g.yas pas til gyi sa bon bzhag/ dbus su yi ge hUM ya rnams bkod do// rdo
60a5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'od 'bar bar ni rnam par bsam// g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag brgyar bcas pa yis// bslang bar byas la sdig pa bsreg par bya// lus ni thal bar byas pa rnam ngag pa// bsod nams lus la sngags kyis bag nga //
60a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dbab pa nyid du bsam// rdzas bzhin dbab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur// de nas babs par gyur pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rtags gsum 'byung // gar dang gar gyi las dang ni// klu dang klu lan yang dag bya//
60b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byas la 'di skad brjod// 'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di// dkyil 'khor du ni legs btsud nas// lha'i rigs kyi rim pa dag/ 'di'i bsod nams ci 'dra bar// de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur// 'dis ni dngos grub
60b2(rgyud 'grel): gang grub dang // rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang // bsod nams mthun gang yod pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin 'gyur// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoH/ phreng ba bor te bltas rnams blta// gal te bcom ldan dbu la babs// dbu yi
60b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor 'grub par 'gyur// zhabs la babs na sngags rnams 'grub// snod dang smad dang bar du babs// dngos grub rab 'bring gsum du shes// lha'i gzugs las rang du 'gyur// de la dngos grub rim par 'grub// mchod
60b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'gram la tshun chad nas// de yi de rigs de yin te// me tog btang ste de yi rigs// lha gnyis kyis ni bar dag tu// babs na gang du nye ba yin// gal te dkyil 'khor las thal na// lan gsum rab tu bskyor du gzhug/ de la
60b5(rgyud 'grel): rgal na re thag chad// de nas phreng ba blangs te 'di skad du// sems ni stobs chen 'di long cig/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na sra mi ma ma satwa ma hA ba la brjod la mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de nas mig gis ci mthong dri// dkar po mchog ni dngos
60b6(rgyud 'grel): grub la// ser po don 'byung dngos grub ste// dmar po thugs rje chags pa'o// nag po mngon spyod las su bshad// sna tshogs dngos grub thams cad ngo // gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ rdo rje chags pas de khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni
61a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson par mdzad// rdo rje mig ni bla na med// he badz+ra pA sh+ya/ gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan// shar phyogs sgo nas lcags kyu ma'o// lho phyogs nas zhugs pa ser po// nub phyogs nas
61a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog dmar skya'o// byang sgro nas dril bu ljang gu'o// shar khyams nas rim pas// byams pa dkar po'o// 'jam dpal spos kyi glang po// ye shes tog/ lho'i khyams la rim pas/ bzang skyong / blo gros rgya mtsho
61a3(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa brtsegs pa/ bzhi sku mdog ser po/ nub kyi khyams la mthu chen thob/ ngan song kun 'dren/ mya ngan kun 'joms/ dra ba can gyi 'od/ sku mdog dmar po/ byang gi khyams la/ zla 'od gzhon nu/ 'od dpag med
61a4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha'i mdzod/ sgrib pa kun sel/ sku mdog ljang gu'o// grwa la shar lhor bdug pa dkar me// lce nub tu me tog mu ser mo// nub byang du mar me ma dmar skya/ byang shar du byug pa ma ljang gu/ shar gyi 'khor lo la
61a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pas rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ rgyal po ser ba/ chags pa dmar ba/ legs pa ljang gu'o// lho'i 'khor lo la rim pas rdo rje rin chen ser ba/ gzi brjid dmar ba/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan sngo ba/ rdo rje bzhad pa dkar
61a6(rgyud 'grel): po/ nub kyi 'khor lo rdo rje chos// dkar dmar rdo rje rnon po sngo ba// rdo rje rgyu ser ba/ rdo rje smra ba dmar ba'o// byang gi 'khor lo la rdo rje las khra bo// rdo rje srung ba ser ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po/ rdo rje khu tshur ser po
61b1(rgyud 'grel): gru chad la shar lhor sgeg mo dkar mo// lho nub tu phreng bA ma ser bu/ nub byung du glum dkar dmar/ byang shar grwa la gar ma ljang gu/ de nas 'khor lo'i shar du mi bskyod pa sngon po/ rin tshon 'byung gnas ser ba/ snang ba mtha'
61b2(rgyud 'grel): yas dmar ba/ don yod grub pa ljang gu'o// mtshams kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje sems ma dkar ba/ rin tshon ma sngo bsangs ma/ chos ma dmar mo/ las ma ljang gu'o// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dkar ba/ dang po sangs rgyas sku
61b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog sna tshogs pa'o// ye shes sems dpa' dkar// dwe ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// kha cig 'dir rnam dag gsum ston te/ mi 'thad// de nas dbang bskur te sgrub pa dang / slob dpon no// de la sgrub pa ni/ de nas shar
61b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos zla ba'i dkyil la/ slob ma yi dam du bskyed pa la byin gyis brlabs la// las kyi bum pas dbang bskur la mchod pa dang // bkra shis brjod cing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la so Da pas mchod la/ khu bi'i dbang bskur te/ oM na mo many+dzu
61b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra b+hI Shiny+tsa tses pas dbang bskur tre/ li kyi dbu brgyan par bya'o// de nas dbu rgyan stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba yig 'bru lhar bskyed le// de bzhin bcug la slob ma'i mgo la bskon la// oM rat+na ku la mu ku TA b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas/ dbu ngar dpyangs dang bcas pas
61b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur// de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las 'od dpag med du bskyed la ye shes bcug la/ de gyur pa las rdo rjer gyur te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun tu rab sgrub phyir/ rdo rje 'di
62a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhyod kyis long // oM badz+rA tI ba tA ta/ aSh+NI Shany+tsA mi tiSh+Tha bad+d+ha sam+b+ha ya hU~M/ de nas dril bu yang a ma ka sa~M bsgyud la/ ye shes bcug pAs t+pal blar gyur pa d+mo b+h+yan ta/ a A k+Sha ra mu kha sarbad+hArmAr+N+Na At+man+daH
62a2(rgyud 'grel): tAtA zhes pas sbyin no// de nas rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bzung la ming ngang rnam snang chos kyi ngo rje ston// oM nA mA b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas byin te/ lha gang la babasdu po'i ming sbyin no// de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ sngags dang phyag
62a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i ye shes blang ba dang / mchod pa dang brtul zhugs kyi dbang byin+da la/ slob mas thal mo skor te bla mA la yon 'bul ba lo sogs pa'o// rig pa'i dbang bskor ba'o// de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon phul la/
62a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab ste/ bdagu dang gzhan de ni byed pa yi// slob dpon gyi ni dbang yin pas// thugs rje'i bdag pos gsal te zhu'u// de nas slob ma rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad bsgreng laM/ dbang rtags shar nges su glu
62a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas la tshon sna lngas pad+ma 'drab ma brgyad bris la/ de'i steng du seng ge bla res dang dar dang gdugs// me tog gi phreng ba dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad glu gar sogs de ltar brgyan pa'i sgo
62a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams la rnam rgyal bum pa nas bzung ste/ ske'i bar du dbang bskur ro// 'jam dbyangs sku gzugs nas bzung ste/ oM many+dzu shrI me ta su kha~M badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM ba hoHsu ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas slob dpon chen por gyur pa kris
62b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod de/ shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i ral gri las byung ba// byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub dri dbang bskur// 'jam dbyangs lha tshogs rnams kyis legs gsungs gang yin pa// des ni dbang bskur mchog la
62b2(rgyud 'grel): dus kun bkris shog/ 'grub na lha kun la sbyar ro// byung sems rdo rje la sogs dkyil 'khor lo 'jug cing // srid pa'i snying po rnam grol sgeg mo la sogs pa// bde byed rab mchog legs par glu blangs pa bkris yang //
62b3(rgyud 'grel): de ring khyod kyi dbang mchog 'di la bkra shisde shog/ shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas// sems can bde gshegs rtogs 'dzin dbang bskur ba// dpag med lha yi tshogs kyi legs gsungs bkris gang //
62b4(rgyud 'grel): des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkris shog/ dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog dbyung bsgyur ba// lha yi tshogs kyis btung de dbang bskur
62b5(rgyud 'grel): gang // des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na pad+ma bsnams// rdzogs pa'i rin chen cod par bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur// pad+ma'i 'dod chags legs gsungs
62b6(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang // des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ na mkha'i snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' ba'i// don rnams kun 'grub bde byin dbang bskur chen po la// dge ba phun sum
63a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mdzad legs gsungs pakris gung // des na khyod kyi dbyung bskur mchog la bkra shas shag/ de nas dbu rgyan dang rdo rje dang dril bu dang rdo rje dbang bsgyur byin la/ me tog la sogs pas mchod /
63a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig la sogs pa'i dbang byin te/ rdo rje byin la de kho na nyid bstan te/ thog mthe' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag/ rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i
63a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ ho las dril bur bsgreng la// 'odi ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror 'dod // rtag pa khyed kyis gzung ba yin// rgyal ba'i byang chub mchog rab kyi// srid pa'i ngo bo gyis bdag mdzod// phyag
63a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen pos de bzhag la// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// de bas dam tshig srung bar gyis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par ni
63a5(rgyud 'grel): bsten bya bzhin// rang gi lnga'i sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// sku'i ngom tshig go// de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dang slob dpon la
63a6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs te dkyil 'khor ni mi mnyam med par zur bzhi sde// dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi dang // bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs bzhi// ting 'dzin kha khyer shes par bya// kha khyer la brten rdo rje'i mchog/ gzugs rnam
63b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mos mchod pa yin// rgyan rnams kun gyi bkram pa yang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// gdul bya bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ ngar 'phyan drilta bu sgrogs pa yin// me long ye shes rtag myed rtog/ byang chub
63b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag me tog phreng // dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog/ nyi ma zla bar yang dag bshang // kun grub mi bzang bde bo ste// bde ba chen po zhes gragaso// de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi// ka pa dkyil 'khor dra ba yin// dngos
63b3(rgyud 'grel): grub bde ba kun ster ba// rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin// theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems// 'di de'i 'khor lo bskor bas ni// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na// 'khor lo rnam
63b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yin// gang du 'jug pa tsam gyis ni// mi mtshungs pa dang mi ldog pa// bde ba chen po rab sgrub phyir// de dag dang por yang dag 'gyur// de nas lha'i rnam par dag pa ni// rang rig pa'i sgyu ma gnyisu med pa'i
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes de nyid lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum yin te/ de yang gzugs dang gti mug dag bya chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes spyi'i cha nas 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad do// 'di la sku gsum du brtsi'o// rnam par shes pa'i
63b6(rgyud 'grel): phung po dang / zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'o// tshor ba'i phung po dang ser sna dag pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan no// nga rgyal gyi sgrib pa 'du byed kyi phung po dang
64a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dag pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni snang ba mtha' yas so// sgrib pa dang 'du byang phung po dang / khro ba dag pa bya ba nan t+yan+da don yod grub pa'o// dad+ho par 'dzin pa la sogs
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bkag pa'i rnam thar bzhi'o// mi bskyod pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes des dgag bya nang dang phyi nang / phyi dang nang snod bcung ngu zhen pa bkag pa'i rig pa'i cha maM lodA lta bu'i me long / me long lta bu'i
64a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid/ me long lta bu'i so sor rtog pa/ me long lta bu'i bya ba nan tan no// shor gyi 'khor lo ser po bzhi'o// de bzhin stong pa'i cha bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'o// des 'gre'o// dgag bya dag
64a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa'o// ye shes phye ba'i sems dpa' la/ stong pa'i tsho nas byang chub sems dpa'o// ser sna dag pa sbyin pa ste sgeg mo'o// tshul khrims 'chal pa spangs te phreng ba ma/ khro ba spangs pa glu mkhan
64a5(rgyud 'grel): mya/ phrag dog spangs pa ga rI mkhan ma// brnab sems spangs pA mai tog me// shes rab 'tshul pa spangs pa bdug spos ma// ldog pa'u smon lam spangs pa mar mA mA// shes bya'i sgrib pA dang phung
64a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdud spangs pa dang pa'i stobs lcags kyu ma// 'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs sgo ba zhags pa ma/ las kyi sgrib pa dang 'tsho bdag gi bdud bco
64b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dran pa'i stobs sgo ba lcags sgrog mya/ skye ba'i sgrib pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sgo ba dril bu ma/ lha'i rnam par dag pa'o// de nas slob dpon gyi rnam dag pa rnams kyang ji ltar bslab
64b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o// mchod po gser thur thogs la// ji ltar mig mkhan mkhas pa yis// 'jig rten ling thog gsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis gsal//
64b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra nai twA pra ha ra pa tra laM hrIH/ me long blangs la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid bstan te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu
64b4(rgyud 'grel): byung // ngo bo nyid med gnas med par// de ltar chos 'di shes nus su// sems can don ni mnyam meng myos// 'on kyang spangs rgyas sras su skye// de nas dril bu dkrol te/ chos rnams na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam
64b5(rgyud 'grel): kha' la yang mtshan nyid med// na mkha' drung mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gus lo// A zhes pa dril bu'i snying po sbyin no// de nas ta thA mnyes par gyis zhes pas ho zhes byas gzhu byin la/
64b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi steng 'og tu 'phan du gzhug go// yang me long bstan la/ rdo rje sems dpa' ma long bzhin// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin gyis// bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas// me
65a1(rgyud 'grel): long 'dzin pa oM many+dzu shrI a/ rkang pa'i bar du 'khor lo bzhag la// lag par dung byin la// de ring thams cad 'jig rten la// skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bsgom// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// kun tu ma
65a2(rgyud 'grel): lus gang bar gyis// sdom nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dogs pa med pa'i sems kyisu// gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la// phan 'dog drin
65a3(rgyud 'grel): du gzo bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang // khyod la rtag tu srung bar byed// 'khor lo dang po 'di byin yang // 'jig rten kun la khyad par du// semra can kun la phan pa'i phyiraro// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba//
65a4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de bzhin du rdo rje dang khro bo dang / pad+ma drang nor bu'i 'khor lo bskor ces rjesu gnang ba byin no// de nas gzangs bstod la lung bstan te/ oM dra ni khyed la lung bstan yin// rdo rje
65a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa kun tu rab sgrub phyir// srid pa dran 'gro rnams la ston// rdo rje che ge mo b+hur+N+Na s+pho/ zhes pas gzengs stod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings laM// g.yon pas
65a6(rgyud 'grel): chos gos 'dzin pa ltar byas la brjod do// ngan song phyir mi ldog ces bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab ste// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i// khams gsum na ni sdig med de// de bas 'dod la chags
65b1(rgyud 'grel): bral ba// khyod kyi nam yang ma byed cig/ ma sa ma ya hA na phaT/ de lta'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi yang bslab par bya'o// de nas khyod kyis mi mkhas pa'i gang zag la sngags dang phyag rgya mya ston cig/ de yis spyad na som nyi zos//
65b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyi ka ngan song nyid du lhung // der khas blangs la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+TaM 2
65b3(rgyud 'grel): tAM da ra ya mi badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs// dril bu sbyin no// rjes gnang mthar thug
65b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin te// slob ma rgyan dang ldan pa/ spyi bor gdugs bzung thal sbyar nas// dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug/ gdugs dang bcas pos bskor phyogasu// spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug/ slob ma 'di ni
65b5(rgyud 'grel): phul ba lags// sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur// mkhan pos de skad smras nas su// gdugs bzhag nas bu yi slob ma de// lag pas bzung ste 'di sprad skye// dkyil 'khor slob dpon nyid du 'gyur// sngags dang
65b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha rnams kun gyis bskur bar 'gyur// sems can kun la snying rje'i phyir// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ sgrub pa
66a1(rgyud 'grel): po yang rgyud la sbyor// khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang // sems can rnams la phan pa'o// nyams pa che bar gyur kyang ni// bu khyod kyis gyang mi bya'o// de nas slob ma re re yis// lag pa bzung la sbyin sreg
66a2(rgyud 'grel): bya// de ltar byas la bdag bsrung ste// sngags pas yon blangs slob mi dag la sbyin// slob mas bskor ba phyag byas bdag nyid dbul// bla mas mchod cing yid la gang 'thad dbul// dngos grub dam pa 'dod pa yis// deng
66a3(rgyud 'grel): dang de kun bla ma sbyin// des ni bsod nams tshogasu 'gyur// tshogs las dngos grub chen po 'byung // de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la gsang ba'i gsang bas mchod de/ oM badz+ri satwa su saM tra haM/ badz+ra rAt+na ma
66a4(rgyud 'grel): nu ta re/ badz+ra d+harmaM karti naM/ badz+ra karma ko sho ka rod+b+ha wa/ d+hU ba la sogs pas kyang mchod la/ thams cad la ci nus pas mchod ces bsgo la byed du gzhug/ de nas bza' ba dang lhung ba rnams kyis/ bdag dang gzhan tsi dag
66a5(rgyud 'grel): bas mchod la longs spyad do// de mna' bsgrags la zhugs pa rnams la mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang gsol ba gdab pa dang / bzod pa gsol la nyi ma 'char kAr rdo rje sems pa'i phyag rgya gyen du bkrol te/ oM khyod
66a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rje su mthun par dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa rnam rang la dzaHhUM baM hoH
66b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la/ de nas snying kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang la dbang bskur ba mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing ba la go cha bcing bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra rat+na b+hiShIny+tsa sarba mu tra me ti ku ru ba ra ka ra ba tse na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng
66b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bcings la bkrol// thal mo sbyar te mnyam pa'i thalo mo dang / oM badz+ra tu gyi hoHyi ge brgya pa brjod la de dga' bas lags pa sbyin no// de nas oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sarba big+h+nAM badz+ra d+ha rA Na hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT zhes pur bu
66b3(rgyud 'grel): bton la 'o mas bkru'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NA Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta/ zhes pas tshon rtsi rnams bsdus la/ gar dang sil snyan ldan byas la/ chu rlung chen po rgya mtshor bya// sdig pase maM gos yaM gA med// dkyil
66b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba yi lci bas byug/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams// ci dge' bar ni spyad par bya// khyi dang bya rog la sogs la// cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no// yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni// slob dpon nyid kyis bsgrus
66b5(rgyud 'grel): nas su// bdag rang nyid kyis sbyang bar bya// slob ma rnams la bgo mi bya// rgyud rnams kun+do las de skad gsungs// slob mas sbyad na dam tshig nyams// gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na// da yi cho ga'i go rims ni// dkon
66b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum gyi yo byad du// cho ga bzhin du dbul bar bya// gdugs dang rnga yab sil snyan sogs// sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya// gdan dang gdub spos la sogs pa// dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya//
67a1(rgyud 'grel): gos dang yo byad sgo la sogs// dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya// de dag la ni slob ma yis// cung zad tsam yang mi bskya'o// gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na// dge slong dge
67a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen rnams la sbyin// de nas de yi phyir de nyid// nyes byas lhag chad zhi bya'i phyir// byams de chen po bsgom par bya// slob mas ma dag zhi bya'i phyir// spyan la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya// sems
67a3(rgyud 'grel): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byams pa chen po bsgom par bya// dad pa med dang dmaun+da lnga 'jug pa dang // 'dod la chags dang 'khor ba'i dbang phyug dang // g.yo rgyu can dang ser sna 'jur bgogs can//
67a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse gnyis blo zhwan rtig pa can// rang gi bu nyid yin yang da lo ni// sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni sbyin mi bya// mtshan ni yang dag brjod pa rgya mtsho lte bu'i don// bdag 'dri'i blo yis dpag par mi nus kyang // bla
67a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i man ngag rim pa'i srub shing gis// cho ga'i rim pa bdud rtsi 'di rtsams pa// 'di la dge ba tsi thob des// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi// seMn rnams dang 'dir bzhugs pa// sku gsum sku lbu lhun grub
67a6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ baN+Di ta shAn+ta gar+b+ha sa mdzad pa rdzog so// // lo tsA ba smr-i ti dz+nyA na kArtis desgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i'o//
68a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA ku rus mdzad pa bzhug so//
68b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti gu h+ya sA d+hA pra dI pA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'phags
68b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de la dang por bsnyen pa ni/ gnas dben par 'dug ste/ rnal 'byor pas khrus dang bsrung ba dang / gos brje ba dang / byug pas byugs te/ gnas dang /
68b3(rgyud 'grel): stan bsangs te 'dug nas/ rang rdo rje 'chang du myos pa'i snying khar nyi ma/ de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje/ de'i lte ba la hUM las 'od 'phros pas gnas bsrungs te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje 'khor los
68b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing sprul nas/ bdag dang 'brel par bya la// tshogs bsag par bya'o// tshogs bsag pa ni/ phyag 'tshal zhing bdag spro ba bskyed pa dang / mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rje su
68b5(rgyud 'grel): yaM ra ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang // mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol po dang / bdag dbul ba dang / dngos grub blang ba dang / 'dud kyis bstod pa dang / bsngo ba'o// lha rnams kyis byin
68b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gyi tshul du tshur bstod pa'o// de dag ni dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin to// / de nas sdom pa bzung / de nas 'khor lo bdag la bsdu// stong par bsgom la ye shes kyi las su ldang // de nas mngon
69a1(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub pa lnga bsgom mo// de dag ni yongasu dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// de nas gzhal yas khyad gdan dang bcas pa bsgom mo// de dag ni gzhi'i ting 'dzin to// // de nas khang bu'i dbus sang+ge drang
69a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du/ a las rdo rje 'chang du bskyed de/ sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o// de'i thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyaso// de dag ni dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting
69a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin to// de nas snying ka'i ye shes sems dpa' la dmigs te/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mtshan ma bzang po ma byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de dag ni thun mong gi bsnyen pa'o// de nas tshem bu'i dkyil 'khor du// ro
69a4(rgyud 'grel): la bsnyen pa zhag lnga bya ste// kun rig gi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus bkru/ de nas bgegs bskrad pa ni// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsho lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa badren pa bdar la// tshe 'das pa 'di la gaskyon gyi
69a5(rgyud 'grel): dusu brnyes byed cing / gshin gyi dus su bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dgA thams cad skad cig kyang ma gnas par dengs shig ces byos la yungs kar brdeg cing / sngags khro bo'i snying po/ oM yAn+ta ka
69a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT ces bzlas so// de nas shes pa dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa bdar la tshe 'das pa ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na gnas kyang rung skad cig gis
69b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir khugs par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+ya sarba pA paM A kAR+Sha hUM dzaHa ni su tri pri du dza zhes brjod cing snying kA nas 'od zer 'phros pas kyang dgug par bas mo// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bstim la bzhag go// de nas yang dug gzhom pa'i tshig
69b2(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pa dang / kun rig gi sngags kyis bkrus la/ ro byin gyis brlab te rang gi lha ru bsgoms nas yi ge a spyi bor bsams nas 'od 'phros pas ye shes lnga yis gang bar bsam mo// de nas a'i spro bsdu'o// de nas
69b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mig la a A zhes bya ba dgod de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la yang i I u U e ai o au dgod par bya'o// yid la aM aHdgod par bya'o// lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang mtshogs mar
69b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi bsgom par bya'o// da ni sngon du bya ba'i tshe gA'o// de nas ro sta gon la gnas pa ni/ tshem bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusuM khI dar gyis bkab pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ slob dpon sbyang bar gnas pas gong du bstan pa bzhin
69b5(rgyud 'grel): du tshogs bsag pa'i cho ga byas la de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/ spyan drang tshigs 'di brjod par bya'o// kye dbang bskur nges de bla na med// phyogs
69b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ma lus bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// 'di la phan gdags don ched du// gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// 'di la dbang ni stsal du
70a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog rnams bsgoms la// sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lha rnams gsal ba'o// de nas ting 'dzin gyi dkyil
70a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du dbang bskur la dam tshig la bzhag par bya'o// de nas zhag lngar ro'i lhag pa'i lha'i snying po 'am/ sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya'o// de nas tshem bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du khru gang dor bar zhi ba'i thab
70a3(rgyud 'grel): khung byas la/ til nag po la sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ sdig pa sbyang ba'i sbyin sreg zhag gcig bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshod du 'dud nyi shus bstod par bya'o// de nas gsel ba gdab byas nas byo/
70a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas na mkha' la/ mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgrim// de dag ni shi ba sta gyen la gnas po'i ting 'dzin to// de dag ni khyad par gyi bsnyen pa'o// de dag ni ston du gnyen pa'o// de nas zhag bdun gyi nang
70a5(rgyud 'grel): par sbyin sreg chen po bya ste/ slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang / slob ma yongasu bzung ba'i cho ga byas la/ de nas dang po sa'i cho ga bya ste/ dang pos brtag pa ni sa'i phyor brtag pa dang / mtshan nyid brtag pa dang tshad brtag pa'o// bslang ba ni sna
70a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang mi snang ba'o// sbyang ba ni las dang bya ba dang sngag so// gzung ba dang sems kyi dbang gis gzung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting 'dzin gyis gzung ba'o// byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje rgyu'i ting 'dzin gyiso// srung ba ni
70b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phur ba la sogs pa'i bya'o// de dag ni sa'i ting 'dzin to// sta gon la yang dang po lnga sta gon la gnas pa ni// dri'i thig la byas la dar dam tshig pa bskrad nas/ ya shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs zhing bsres la mchod
70b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa lngas mchod do// bum pa ni grangs tshang bar bsags la// rgyan dang yo byad dang ldan par byas nas// nang gzhal yas khang du bsgoms nas/ der dam tshig pa bskyad la// yas kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs zhing bsres nas
70b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod de bzlas pa byas la bzhag go// slob ma lhag par gnas pa ni 'jug pa rnams bsogs la bya'o// de yang dgu ste/ tshig gis dag par bya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang / byin
70b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa dang / mchod pa dang / sgo shing sbyin pa dang / bsrung skud gdags pa dang / ku sha sbyin pa dang / zab mo'i chos bshad pa'o// de nas lha kha sbyar la gshegasol te nyal bar bya'o// de nas nung par rmi lam dri bar
70b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de dag ni sta gon gyi ting 'dzin to// de nas thig gdab par bya'o// thig la bcu gcig ste/ rgyu dang mkhal mkhan dang / chung dang byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbyu ba dang des tshig dang gdab pa'i granas dang / 'dabs
70b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gdab pa'i thabs dang / cho ga nyams pa'i nyes pa dang / bgegs bsal bas so// gdab pa'i thabs ni dang po tshangs pa'i thig/ de nas logs thig/ de nas zur thig/ de bzhin du cha dang cha bran
71a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / skor thig dang sgo thig yan chad btab la/ pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ de'i phyi rol du rtsibs bcu drug/ de'i phyi rol du lha'i snam bu'i thig gdab bo// de dag ni thig gi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas
71a2(rgyud 'grel): tshon dgye bar bya'o// de la bcu gnyis te/ rgyu dang 'thag pa'i mkhan po dang chod dang byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbye ba dang / des tshig dang / dgye ba'i gnas dang / 'gyed mkhan dang dgye ba'i thabs dang / cho ga nyams pa'i
71a3(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa dang / bar chad kyi bgegs bsal ba'o// dgye ba'i thabs ni 'khor lo kun sor po/ lte ba dkar po/ shwa ra ston po/ lho ser po/ nub dmar po byang ljang gu'o// pany+tsa ra ga ni/ nang du dkar po de'i phyi rol sngon po/
71a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas ser po de nas dmar po/ kun gyi phyi rol ljang gu'o// de nas phyag rgya dgod pa ni/ 'khor lo'i lta ba la rdo rje 'dzin chen po 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la rgyal ba rigs bzhi/ yum bzhi ste brgyad bri'o// rtsibs bcu
71a5(rgyud 'grel): drug po la sems dpa' bcu drug bri'o// grwa la mchod pa brgyad bri'o// snam bu la bskal pa bzang po bri'o// sgo bzhir srung ma bzhi bri bar bya'o// de dag ni tshon gyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas sngor bsnyen pa byas pa'i ro
71a6(rgyud 'grel): de bsreg khang du drang ste/ pu re legs par bcas pa der bcug nas shing rta la sogs pas drangs nas/ zhar la bgegs bzlog pa dang / dug sbyong ba'i tshigs bcad glur lan cing rol mo la sogs pas drangs
71b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ bsreg khang la sngags mkhan dang bcas pas skor ba lan gsum byas la/ shar phyogs nas gzhug par bya'o// nus na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang yang bskur bar bya'o// de dag byas na/
71b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang yo byad rdzogs par bkod nas/ lhag chad bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o// de dag ni slob dpon gyi ting 'dzin to// de nas dam tshig
71b3(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni/ kho sbyar yang bsal la gzugs brnyan dang bsres te/ cho ga yan lag gsum gyi dam tshig gi lha rnams bsgom par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi na mkha' la
71b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa bya/ de nas dzaHhUM baM hoH// bzhis dgug gzhug bcing bu byas la ting 'dzin dang byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa phul la bstod pa bya'o// de nas mthong ba nang gi 'jug pa bya'o// de nas ni lha
71b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas oM dz+wA la dz+wa la zhes me sbar lnga pra brtag par bya'o// pra legs na me dbus su 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bskyod lnga de zhu ba las/ drang srong chen po me lha zhib pa ba ka zha
71b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba zhi zhing dkar po dbu gcig pa phyag bzhi pa mig gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po na ber ka/ gnyis pa na mchog sbyin/ g.yon dang po na phreng ba gnyis pa na gun+d+he/ gos dang rgyan dkar po mchod
72a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir thogs dkar po/ yan lag thams cad nas rdo rje dkar po 'byung ba mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsgom mo// de nas mthor 'thung dang bsang ba byas la/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i me lha spyan drang
72a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gIs// tshur gshe tshur gAshe 'byung po che// lha'i drang srong bram ze mchog/ bsreg blugs zhal zas pazhes slad du// 'bar bya'i nang du gshegasol// zhes brjod la/ rang gi skyong kha nas khre
72a3(rgyud 'grel): bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po spros la/ Tak+ki hUM dzaHzhes brjod do// de nas mdun gyi na mkha' la// tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// bya ba la sogs pas bstod ngo // de nas nang du dgug gzhug cing dbang du bya'o// de ras badz+ra
72a4(rgyud 'grel): sAn+ti zhes brjod do// de nas ting 'dzin dang ldan par bya// byin gyis brlab dbang bskur// de nas oM ta na sa ma ya hUM phaT tsas brjod la dam tshig la bzhag par bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra pan+d+ha ba zhes brjod la lus 'di mdzod
72a5(rgyud 'grel): cig ces bsgo'o// de nas mchod pa'i yan lag gis mchod// de nas bstod pa bya'o// de nas bsreg rdzas rnams dbul te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrungs lo// me lha'i lce drang gzar bu'i kha la// lha'i sa bon bkod na/
72a6(rgyud 'grel): pus mo'i bar du lag pa bzhag nas/ dang po mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo// oM ag+ne ye ha ba bya ka bi bya ba ha ne di bya di bya d+hi pa yaM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes dbul// bgegs kyi mtshan
72b1(rgyud 'grel): mu yang shes par bya'o// yang gsang gtor byas la mar gyi dgang blugs bdun dbulo// oM sarba pa du ha na swA hA til bgyi'o// oM sarba saM pa te swA hA/ zho'i 'o// oM sarba smi ku ru swA hA/ ut+pa la'i'o// oM badz+rA yu She swA hA/ dur ba'i'o//
72b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/ 'bras ma chag pa'i 'o// oM badz+ra pA ti hi ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ ku shu'i 'o// oM badz+rI bai dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras kyi lag pa nA gyi'o// oM badz+ra ma le puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ mdar gsum dang dkar gyi'o// oM ma hA paM gA
72b3(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o// oM mya hA b+hA ya swA hA/ sran ma shra'o// oM badz+ra grasma re swA hA/ gro'i'o// oM badz+rA ny+dza ne swA hA/ yems shing drang dur ba'i myu gu'o// oM ti ti pri yai swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa'o// oM badz+ra ra tA
72b4(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hI/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// oM badz+rA tra ra swA hA/ a mra'i 'o// lan grangs ci nus dbulo// de nas bstod pa bya/ de dag ni me lha'i ting 'dzin te// de nas gsang gtor byas la/ dri nas me lha'i snying khar bzhal yas khang
72b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la// gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor na sna bsreg khang du me tog gi ri mo 'am/ dus gcig tu spyan drang zhing dbulo// spyan drang ba ni/ hUM ma lus sem can kun gyi mgon gyur cing // bdud sde dpung bcas
72b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshe gsol// de nas bstod pa dang / de nas dgug gzhug bcing dbang du bya// oM badz+ra san+ni baM zhes
73a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul/ phyag rgyas gang ba/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlab/ sems pa rnams gnas bzhir yum bzhis brlab/ bde
73a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i cod pan dang drar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur/ sems pa rnams rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskuro// de nas mchod pa rnams pa lnga la sogs pas mchod/ de nas gsang ba dang 'thor 'phung
73a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la gong ma lta bu rdzas sngags sam/ yang na spyi sngags sam/ lha'i sngags kyis dbu'o// de nas gsang ba dang 'thor 'thung byin la/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul la 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o// yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ oM badz+ra
73a4(rgyud 'grel): muHzhes phyag rgya bkrol la bskyed pa snying khar bsdu/ spyan drangs pa gshegasu gsol te/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun gyi dpung / sems pa chen po brtan mdzod la/ sang+yas yul du gshiDa nas kyang / slar yA ga sha kha mjed du gsol de nas gas
73a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor byas la/ slar yang me thabs tu bsams la/ mchod yon la sogs pa byin la/ rdzas lhag ma kun sbyin sreg bya// tha mar yang dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung phul la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// /
73a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dgram par byas la/ snga ma bzhin gshegasu gsol te/ oM AHhUM maHzhes brjod la/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings/ gyen du bkrol la gsheg su gsol/ gtor ma btang phyag btsal mchod bstod bzod
73b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gsol/ dngos grub blang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ phyag rgya dgrol bskor ba bya/ gshegasu gsol/ bskyed pa bsdu/ sman ma phyag/ phyogs skyong gsol/ tha ma slob ma bsrungs la dgye'o// de nas skar ma bzang po la rus pa
73b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la tsha tsha 'debs par bzhago/ bdag gis smra ba thabs legs sbyar bso// 'jam dpal mtshan mchog thob gyur cig/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma/ slob dpon chen
73b3(rgyud 'grel): bo pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar skud du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti tsakra kra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bcom ldan
73b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// thogs meng dus mtha' na mkha' bsod nams dpag med pa// mkha' mnyam sems can sgrol phyir thams cad mkhyen bsngos pa'i// 'jam dbyangs mtshan
73b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan dus gsum bde gshegs dge ba'i gshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i tshul// kun tu gzigs par lung bstan bsam gyis mi khyab de la bdag phyag 'tshal// bla ma dam pa'i gzhung lugos las// man
73b6(rgyud 'grel): dge rgyu par rab bstan pa// snyigs ma'i sems can blo zhan rnams// rnam rtog g.yeng bas mos pa nyung // de la dran phyir bsdus pa 'dis// grib dang lung bstan ma thob kyang // sman pa phan par bzhugs pa bzhin
74a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis 'di ni byas pa yin// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// yid dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// yi ga a ni rnam bsams
74a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang // bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa rnams// mdun du mngon sum lta bur dmigs// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag par// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// rgya chen 'dod pa
74a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bgyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la// bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed pa'i// dge ba kun la rje yi rang //
74a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon sangs rgyas nas mi rong ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// bskor phyir bdag gis bskul bar 'tshal// yongasu mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
74a5(rgyud 'grel): la// bskal pa rab mang bzhugs par ni// sangs rgyas kun la gsol pa 'debs// gang yang bdag gis mchod pa rnam drug dang // dge ba gzhan byas de dag thams cad ni// bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid
74a6(rgyud 'grel): thob phyir// bdag gis chos bzhin yongasu bgyi// chos la dbang bskur sangs rgyas thams cad la// byang chub snying po'i bar du skyabasu mchi// e mo sems can bla med skal bya'i phyir// bdag gis thams cad
74b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa thob gyur cig/ bdag nyid dngos po dbul lags kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa mdzad pa'i phyir// bdag lus so sor ba zhesu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa tha~Md kyi// khyad 'phags la ma ni
74b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bstan// de nas ye shes rnam lnga yi// gzugs brnyan tsa mo la rob dmigs la// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam pa dag pa// rong bzhin gyis ni byin gyis brlab// oM shU n+yA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swA b+hA wa at+ma ko& haM/ nam mkha' lta bur
74b3(rgyud 'grel): rab dmigs la// yi ge b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// stong gsum tshad dang mnyam pa yi// mchod rten bde gshegs gzhal yas khang // rim pa drug dang ldan par bsgom// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par bsam// dbus kyi snying po'i
74b4(rgyud 'grel): pho brang du// dbus su seng ge'i gradan nyid de// gzhan yang rim pa ji bzhin bsam// de yi dbus ma'i gdan thog tu// a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'angs// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor gtsug can// zhi ba rgyan spangs byang chub
74b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ kun tu zhal gyi rnam par mdzes// de thugs d+hIHlas bskyed pa yi// gdong lnga zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// g.yas pa bzhi na ral gri ste// g.yen bzhi shes rab po ti bsnams// rgyan dang nA bza' gzhon nu'i tshul// thugs/
74b6(rgyud 'grel): kar a las byung ba yi// 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan// ji ltar gsang sngags dgod pa ni// 'khor lo'i cho ga mthong ba yi// dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs khar bsam// lte ba a las byung ba yi// ye shes sems dpa' zhal
75a1(rgyud 'grel): drug pa// ut+pal dmar la sngo po ni// po tis mtshan pa bsnams pa'o// gzhonu'i brgyan ldan thugs khar ni// zla ba'i steng du a kar bsam// de las so sor 'phros pa yis// rim bzhin thams cad snang
75a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// na mkha'i mkha' mnyam sems can gyi// ma rika mun pa bsal byas na ste// sar 'dus rim bzhin rang nyid kyi// yi ge'i nang du 'dus par lta// de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo yi// mtshan brjod rim par klag pa yang // 'di
75a3(rgyud 'grel): ltor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// zhes pa dang po nas brtsams nas// don chen yi ge dam pa'i bar// rang gi de nyid brjod pa yin// khong nas byung ba skye ba med// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// de mthar thugs pa
75a4(rgyud 'grel): yum bzhi yin// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// chags pa thams cad spel bar byed// de dag mthar ni rigs lnga ste// bde gshegA yab dang yum rnams kyang // mtshan gyi
75a5(rgyud 'grel): don la rab dmigs te// mnyam par bzhag nas mtshan brjod ni// rim bzhin klog pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang gi de nyid yi ge las// rim bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba yis// rang rang gidan la dgod par bya// 'dod pa chen
75a6(rgyud 'grel): po bde ba che// zhes pa dang por brtsams nas ni// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// ngo yi mthar thug sems dpa' ni// bcu drug 'khor lo rab tu dgong // yi ge a las bskyed ba dang // sems can don bya/
75b1(rgyud 'grel): slar 'dus te// rang gi gdan la dgod par bya// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar// phyi nang lha mo bskyed par bya// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med//
75b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin thAg chen tshul gnas par// yi ge oM la sau bskyed pa yi// skal bzang phyi rol rim bzhin du// 'khor lo gsum la dgod par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji srid sgom pa'i mthar thug pa// tshig bcang ba
75b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dag gis ni// mtshan gyi don rnams bstan pa yin// 'od zer 'phro zhing bsdu ba dang // gzugasu gyur nas lhar gnas pa// pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro// rim gnyis chos dbyings ye shes kyi// dkyil 'khor dgod pa bstan
75b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa che// mthar thugs oM gyis rnam par spro// gti mug spyod pa dag byas te// slar 'dus rim pa gnyis pa las// rnam par
75b5(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad tshul gyis ni// mtshan gyi don rnam grangs bzhin du// phyogs bzhi dag nas bzhugs pa yin// tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga ru// tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba// 'di yi dor la dmigs shing dgod// de nas rim pa gsu
75b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ru// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// tshul nas rab tu bstod pa ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ ces pa yi ge mthar thug par// hUM gi rnam par
76a1(rgyud 'grel): spro zhing bsdu// ma bskyod pa yi rnam par dgod// tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa yi// tshigs bcud bcu yis phyogs bzhi ru// gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa gcig spros// zhe sdang bdul nas rnam par gnas// 8
76a2(rgyud 'grel): nas rim pa bzhi pa ni// yang dag bang go ming de bzhin nyid// ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsol// de mthar thug pa spro bsdu ste// snang ba mtha' yas rnam pa yis// phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam par
76a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// so sor kun rtog ye shes ni// hrI yaM rnam par spro bsdu ste// 'dod chags rnam par dag byas la// tshig bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// mtshan don gzhung las byung ba bzhin// phyogs bzhi rnam par dgod pa'o// de nas
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa lnga pa yi// dkyil 'khor ba dag gis bshad par bya// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// zhes pa dang por byas nas// nor bu chen po rin chen rtog/ der mthar thug pa mnyam nyid kyi/ ye shes tshigs bcad nyi shu gnyis
76a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phros shing 'dus pa yis// ser sna can ni rnam bcom zhing // mtshan gyi don ni grangs bzhin du// rin chen 'byung ldan tshul du gnas// traM gi rnam par 'phro zhing 'du// de zlas rim pa drug pa'o// don grub dkyil 'khor
76a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa yang // tshogs bcang bco lnga'i mtshon ngon ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba// zhes pa dang por brtsams byis nas// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ de yi mthar thug mtshan rnams ni// a yi rnam par
76b1(rgyud 'grel): spro zhing bsdu// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi// 'gro ba phrag dog rnam sbyangs te// don grub rnam par rim bzhin dgod// de lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis// 'od zer spro zhing bsdus nas su// khams gsum sems can thams cad ni// gang gi 'od za'o//
76b2(rgyud 'grel): rerig gyur pa// de yi sangs rgyas rnamasu 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun l-I reg 'gyur zhing // bsdu zhing bdag dang mnyam par sbyar// dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang // mdog dang gdan dang phyag rgya rnams// de bzhin dang po'i sangs rgya
76b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang // 'khor lo la sogs rim pa yang // ji ltar grags pa bzhin du dgod// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHyis// ye shes 'khor lo rnams bkug cing // bdag dang mnyam par sbyar byas nas// rang bzhin mchod pa'i sprin tshegs bstim/
76b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yang // mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud // ces pa'i tshig bcad bzhi bzhi yis// dkyil 'khor lnga la bsdus te bstod// de nas
76b5(rgyud 'grel): mchin gyi yon tan ni// lag nA rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa// yon tan sgo nas bstod pa yin// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa lnga yis rnams phye la// dkyil 'khor/
76b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi yon tan ni// rim pa bzhin du mkhas pas dbye// de yi tshigs bcad mtshan rnams ni// dkyil 'khor lde yi yon tan grags// oM sarba d+harma zhes pa nas/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a yi bar// sku yi phreb ba'i sngags kyi ni// de la brtan zhing
77a1(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas par// sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin// de nas dpa ldan rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// rdzogs pa'i sa ng+yas kun gyis bshad// de yi mthar bsdus pa yis// sgo nas yang dag ston pa yin// // de ltar gang
77a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig sgom byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rnam 'phros te// rno gsum don la dmigs pa yis// ring por mi tho Ta 'dul dbang gis// ston gzhung sogs tha~Md kyang // ma lus de yis thob par 'gyur// sa mchog bcus rab bgrod nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang
77a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar 'gyur// thun bzhi 'am ni thun gsum gyi// mtshan ma brtan po byung gi par// de ni rgyun tu klag par bya// de nas dkyir dbang bskur dang // zhi sogs las rnams brtsam par bya// gzhan yang shi la phan pa dang // cho ga'i bye brag ma lus kun// cho ga
77a4(rgyud 'grel): chen por mthong bar bya// dkyor bsdu ba'i rim par yang // rim bzhin yi a las twa// de nas thig le dmi Da pa med// sgyu ma'i tshul du spyod lam brtag/ dam pa'i gzhung lugs gsal med kyi// bsdus la dga' ba'i ngor byas nas// bdag 'dra brtse bar
77a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'os te// khA ba len rdo yis lcags 'du bzhin// 'jam pa/ byangs la mos pa yin// rang dbang med par brtsom pa la// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzod par mdzod// de las bdag gis dge ba gang thob des// 'gro ba rnaMs kyi don rtoT zhi gyur nas// bdag
77a6(rgyud 'grel): so 'jam dpal dbyangs dang 'dra gyur te// na mkha'i mthA ma nyaM seMn grol bar shog/ 'phaDa pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim po/ bla ma dam pa'i cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams la/ blo zhan pa'i don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo rjon
78a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
78b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sa gI tI na bi ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// shes rab
78b2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// gdong lnga gtsug pud lnga dang ldan// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan 'dud// dang por bsngags pas/ dbang thob cing dam tshige dang ljon par byas te// yid dga'
78b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su 'dug la// tho rangs ka kha'i sgo dog par byas la// snying khar zla ba'i steng du yi gI mu rnam par bsams la/ 'od zer gyis bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la// phyog btsal ba dang /
78b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang / rje su yi rung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o// de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
78b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes la stong pa nyid bsgom te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sto b+ha wa Ata ma ko&haM/ sngags 'di'i don la dmigs paso// chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgom mo// de nas yi ge hrIHlas pad+maH
78b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan dmar po bsam zhing / de'i steng du a las zla ba'i gdon rnam par bsams te/ dbus su yi gi mu dmar skya 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro zhing / 'du ba bsam par bya'o// de nyid thig ler gyur pa las/ yas
79a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po sbyin dkar dag pa lta bu rdo rje skyil krung can/ phyag bzhi dang ldan pa g.yas g.yon gnyis nA/ mdzes pa'i ral gri 'debs shing shes rab kyi
79a2(rgyud 'grel): ti 'dzin pa'o// de'i 'og ma gnyis na mnga'o gzhu rnams bsnams pa'o// gzhon nu'i rgyun can no// de ltar rnam pare bsgoms te/ at+ma ko&haM zhes brjod la/ nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o// de'i
79a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la snying kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yi ge las byung ba'i pad+ma dang / zla ba'i steng du bzhugs te/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rnam par mchong la/ rang dang gnyis su
79a4(rgyud 'grel): me ba bsres par bya'o// snying ka dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang spyi bo rnams su// rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis na mkha' khyab pas/ de
79a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs po bskul bas lha mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dbyung bskur te/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan+da dang dAr dbyangs dang bcas pas dpung bskur ro// de'i thugs khor zla ba'i dkyil
79a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor buSh+Tiyongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga phyag brgyad po/ zhabs gnyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ byis pa'o rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rin
79b1(rgyud 'grel): po che sna tshogs pa'i na bza' can// g.yas bzhin mdzes pa'i ral gri/ g.yon bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam/ de'i thugs khar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rnam par
79b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams te/ lce drug pa kha dog drug dang ldan pa/ mu khyud bzhi yis bskor ba// lte bar yi ge a dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams
79b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad khyab par byas te/ slar 'dus te dwe nyid la tham pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags dgod par bya'o// oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+hU wa bi shudu d+ha badz+ra a A aM aHde'i phyi rol mu khyung lu dbyangs kyi
79b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu gnyis dgod do// de'i phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa ste/ dang po'i rtsibaswa la oM badz+ra tik+Sha ya te na ma gnyis pa la au du/ khats+tsha da ya t+ye nu ma/ gsum bI lA oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na
79b5(rgyud 'grel): murta ye ya te na ma/ bzhi pa la oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pa lA au wA gI shwa ri ya t+ye na mya/ drugA pa la au a ra pA tsa na ya te na ma/ phyi'i mu khyud drang po la ye shes sems dI pa'i
79b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng sngags/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya zhes bya ba nas/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a zhes bya ba'i bar du dgod do// phyi'i mu khyud tha ma la yi ge ka nas ha'i bar gsol byed kyi yi ge dgod do// de ltar snying
80a1(rgyud 'grel): gar bsam zhing / dwe lAs 'khor lo de'i dbusu a las bskyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar zhing / in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud can// nyi ma
80a2(rgyud 'grel): 'char ka'i 'od 'dra bas bskor zhing / zhi ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis kyis ut+pal dmar po dang sngon po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam gyis mdzes pa g.yas dang g.yon nA rim pa bzhin bsnams pa/ rgyan tha~Md kyi
80a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing / skyes mo krung gi bzhugs par bsam// // de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// de'i dbus yi ge a bkod/ de las 'od zer 'phros shing 'khor lo'i sngags kyi kha dog ji lta ba bzhin 'od zir 'phros te/ rang dang
80a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams kun khyab par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad gsal bar 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar bsdus nas/ bdag nyid la lan
80a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum bskor te/ snying ga'o sngags dang zla ba dang bcas pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i tshul gyis/ bdog med pa brtan por bsgo mo// de lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa rjon par
80a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// gzhan yang sngags bzlas pa dang / mtshan yang dag par brjod paklags pa yang rim pa des yang dang yang du bya'o// thun mtsham su ni ye shes sems dpa' gshegasol zhing ji ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bdag nyid la bsdu
80b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs pa la lha'i rnal 'byor du langs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis dkyil 'khor dang gtor ma dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / mdo gdon pa la stegs pa
80b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gyi las dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / lus ngag gi spyod pa thams cad lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o// zas la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi rnam da
80b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por sngags kyis btab la tshim par bya'o// phyi'i khrus don du gnyer ba'i tshe yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rong bzhin rnam par dag pas bkru'o// nyal ba'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la snyems par zhugs pas nyal
80b4(rgyud 'grel): ldang na gzugs kyi sku'i rim pas so// tshul 'di lta bur gong zhig sgom pa byed pa de ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis de nyid ring por mi thogs par na mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa mthong ngo // ye shes sems dpa' sprul pa sku'i
80b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrib thabs 'di/ rgyu dang sgeg pa'i rdo byang chub mchog ldan dang // 'jam dbul grags pa bla ma'i man ngag rim pa 'di// gsang ba'i mtshan ldan rdo rje las grub kyis// dam pa nyer bstan dan hI badz+ra las// byang chub sgyu 'phrul sbyor ba'i
80b6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag 'di// rnyed nas 'di la gus phyir bdag gis bris// 'di yis 'gro kun ye shes sems dpar shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// /
81a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpom zla bzang grags pas mdzad ba bzhugaso/
81b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Da la pra tI tsin+ta ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//
81b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // ye shes sku nyid la btung nas// 'jam dbyangs kyis khyab dkyil 'khor ni// bsdus dang dbye ba'i bye brag gis// thun
81b3(rgyud 'grel): mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// dang po re shig rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// yid dga' ba yi sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sgyu ma'i lus kyi snying ga ru// rang
81b4(rgyud 'grel): gi sa bon bsams nas su// 'od 'phros pa yi sbyor ba dod// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyag rgya yis// rang gi 'khor lo sprul par bya// phyag lnga bya bo'i sbyor ba dang // mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis mchod// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
81b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs ltar// gsum pa skyabs 'gro la sogs bya// de rjes bstod pas mnyes bya ba// thur mong dang ni de ma yin// thun mong rnam pa gnyis yin to// dang po mya do nyid ji bzhin pa// 'chad pa'i 'dus pa nyi shu'o// thun mong min par
81b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi'o// nyi shu pa yi rnam pa yang // mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag nyid de de bzhin nyid// stong
82a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrog pa// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud // stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo// srid ba'i 'dod chags la sogs spangs// srid pa'i dga' ba chen po pa//
82a2(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags las byung yi ge med// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dung // sems can kun la shas cher chags//
82a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud // 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong pa// mgron po sems can kun gyi mchog/
82a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ha ha hi hi 'jigs par sgrogs// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// gad mo chen po gang rgyangs can// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa// dpal
82a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan lag pa brgyas gong la// nA mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sangs rgyas rol lnga phyag 'tshal 'dung // tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog+ha/ tshig kun rabA tu gsal bar byed// sangs rgyas
82a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// sangs rgyas bzhal po khyod la 'dud// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' ya so// tshig bden pa
82b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bden par smra// bden pa bzhi po ston pa po// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thug rig pa// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
82b2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das shing mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan 'das dang nya// bde sdug sel ba thar gyur pa// maud pa las byung khyod la 'dud// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che//
82b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'byung po khyod la 'dud// na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud // na mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shis ra bo ye shes me'o che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dung // dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa
82b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshags// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sgyu 'phrul dri ba khyod
82b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed po// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dung // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos
82b6(rgyud 'grel): de sna tshogs ston// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes snang ba lam med pa// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba// bstod
83a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// rab tu myos pas gus byed na// 'jam dpal rdo rje ngo bor 'gyur// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis
83a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni brlab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can den byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por bzung bar gyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//
83a3(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas bsams te gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi spong ngo // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang drag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi//
83a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re ji bzhin dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po los byung ba'i// pad+ma rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum//
83a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// lus kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus gyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med // dam pa bdag gis
83a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma rgal ba rnams sgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la
83b1(rgyud 'grel): 'god// de ltar sdom pa 'dzin byed na// bdag nyid snod du rung bar 'gyur// de nas sa bon 'od kyis ni// dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon gzhug/ de las ye shes me 'bar bas// rnam smin phung po bsreg pa yi// skad cig gis ni sgyu
83b2(rgyud 'grel): 'drar 'gyur// de nas snying rje bskyed pa ni// sdug bsngal chos dang mi dmigs pas// byang chub rnam pa lnga sgom ste// gzugs brnyan gyi ni ye shes la// sdug bsngal rnams ni snang ba ni// de las 'don pa'i bsam pa ni// sdug
83b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu legs dmigs snying rje'o// bdag stong sems can chos rnams kun// stong pa nyid du rab sbyor bas// kun gyi stong pa las 'jug pa// chos dmigs snying rje mnyam nyid// de yang ma skyes pa'i phyir stong par shes pa ni/
83b4(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa shes pa las// sems can thams cad dgod bsam pa// dmigs med shes rab so sor rtog/ sems can don ni rtog med pa// nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon bzhin// gang dang gong 'dod snang byed la// dmigs
83b5(rgyud 'grel): mung snying rje bya grub pa'o// bdag dang gzhan sogs rtog pa rnams// slar zhing 'byung bAr mi 'gyur zhing // gang la chags dang rnam grol ba'i// chos dbyings ye shes rnam par sgom// de dag ni tshogs gnyis kyis yongs
83b6(rgyud 'grel): tingange 'dzin to// de nas na mkha' stong pa las// b+h+rUM byung 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par hUM ni 'jigs pa bsgom byas te// 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pa las// hUM bcu 'khor lo'o
84a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs stengasu// khro bo bcu gcig skad cig rdzogs// hUM mdzad snod mdzes gtsug tor dang // gshin rje gshed dang gzhan mi thub// rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'dod rgyal mi g.yo mgon po
84a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis par// bskyed la de nyid rnam 'phrul ba'i// bgegs bcu dgug par bka' bsgo bas// bkug ste zhabs 'og phur bus gdab// rdo rje gsang
84a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod bya bas// skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur// hUM mdzad thugs kha'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros phyogs mtshams steng 'og tu// 'phros pas dra ba gur dang ni// rab gnyis dang sa gzhi dang // rdo rje'i rang bzhin
84a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor bcing ba yis// phyis kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de nas zhi ba'i bsam pa yis// kun tu bzang por hUM mdzad gyur// de las chos kyi 'byung gnas sam// dbus su b+h+rUM las
84a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal ya sau khAng // spyi dang thun mong khyad par ni// rim+ba pa bzhin du shes par bya// zur bzhi pA lA sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam par brgyan// dare dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// gra dang sgo yi mtshams rnam su// zla ba phyed/
84a6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor phyi ma dang mtshungs pas// mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ste// ka ba brgyad dang
84b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ru// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni// kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod// bsdus dang so so'i mtshan nyid ni// phyi nas 'byung ba las shes bya// dbus su saM gaM taM traM trAM aM las// hUM gnyis ldan pas byung ba'i gdan// ming las
84b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon te shes par bya// a las zla ba'i steng du bsam// de dag ni steng gi ting 'dzin to// de nas sa bon las skyes pa// a las rnam par snang mdzod che// mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag gnyis pa// mnyam gzhag pa 'am byang chub mchog
84b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyan la sogs spangs pa ni// rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'o// thugs kAr pad+ma gnas pa las// hUM las drang po sangs rgyas ni// zhal lnga byis pa'i rgyanA dang ldan// phyag brgyad g.yas bzhis ral gri 'dzin// g.yon
84b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhis shes rab po tri 'dzin// dang po sangs rgyas thun mong ba'o// sangs rgyas de'i thugs kha ru// a las gyur pa'i 'khor lo nI// rtsibs drug pa lo mu khyud bzhi// lte bA a l-I 'od 'phros pas// don byas 'dus pa'i sngags
84b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur// lte bar a ste mu khyud gnyis// nang ma'i mu khyud la dgod pa// oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+ha wA pI shud+d+ha badz+ra a A aM AHphyi rol tu ni dgong pa nI// rtsi bas bcas sam rtsibs med phyur// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis
84b6(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya// de yi phyi rom rtsibs drug la// gsang sdigs rgyal po drug ldan pa// dang po'i rtsibs la bgod par bya// oM badz+ro tik+Sh+Na ya te na ma/ gnyis pa'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ oM duHkhats+tsha da ya te na me/ gsum
85a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsibs la bgod bya ba// oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye ya te na ma?/ bzhi pa la ni bsam bya ba// oM d+hI na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pA la nI bsam bya ba// oM wA gI shwa rA ya ya te na ma// drug pa la ni bsam bya ba//
85a2(rgyud 'grel): a ra pa tsa ya te na ma// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la// ye shes sems dpa'i sku yi sngags/ a AM sarba ta thA ge ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+hA ga wAn/ dz+nyA na murti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+har+m+ma/ ga ga naM/ a
85a3(rgyud 'grel): mA la su pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la// ka sogs kA la thug par bkod// shes rab 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin to// de'i lte bi'i a las ni// gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal dbyangs//
85a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang yi ge'i zhal// dkar dmar sngo dang dkar ljang dkar// phyis kyang so sor bya ba yin// ut+pal ste dmar dang po gnyis// mnga' dang gzhu ni gnyis pa gnyis// mnyam
85a5(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pas gsum pa gnyis// sku ni dung lhur dkar ba'o// thugs kar zla ba sa bon no// rnam snang chen po zhes bya ba// dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'o// so sor dbye ba'i sbyor
85a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yang // dbus su rang gi gdan stengs su// hrIHhUM a a oM a las// pad+ma gar dang hUM byed dang // rnam snang rta mchog rdo rje nyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i go rims bzhin// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// ting 'dzin
85b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud 'dul byang chub mchog/ skyabs mdzad mchog sbyin 'gying bcas pas// 'on kyang khyad par yod pa'o// pad+ma rdo rje rdo rje dang // rdo rje sna tshogs rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// mdog ni bsdus pa'i zhal gyis
85b2(rgyud 'grel): t+ye/ dang po sangs rgyas d+hi kar las// sngar gyi kun gyi thun mong gi/ 'jam dpal dag tu thams cad mchog/ de yi thugs khur shAs rib kyi// 'khor los sa bon rnams la bskyad// rtsibs brgyad yin te rnam snang gi/
85b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bcu par ni yin par 'dong // mu khyud bzhi sogs spra ma bzhin// yi ge gyur pas sngags rnams ni// rtsibs la dgod pa'i sngags rnams ni// ye shes sems dpa' ming can du// sdus pa'i sngags rnams phye
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'o// kha dag sngar bzhin shes par bya// shes rab 'khor lor bsgom par bya// lte ba rnams su sa bon gyis// spro bsdu las grub ya shes sems// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// dmar po la sogs kho
85b5(rgyud 'grel): dog drug/ rdo rje rnon po sdug bsngal gcod// shes rab ye shes ye shes sku// ngag dbang phyug dang pa tsa'i mtha'// ral gri kun gyi g.yas pa ste// rang mtshan g.yen na 'dzin pa'o// ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms
85b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni// bsdus dang phye ba'i bye brag gis// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// ge rim bzhin du shes par bya// bsdus pa rnam pa gsum yin te// rnam snang gnyis
86a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje sems// de gsum gtso bo gang rung dram/ yang na rang bzhin gcig yin pas// gcig tu bsdus pas shes par bya// thugs bsdus pa la 'jam dpal dbyangs// so so'i la ni sngar bzhin
86a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// de'i thugs la sa bon bsnams// spros pa rang rang dkyil 'khor 'byung // las byas 'dus nas dkyil 'khor du// 'og tu 'chang po'i rim pas gnas// dbus dkar shar sde lho ser zhing // nub dmar
86a3(rgyud 'grel): byang gi ljang gu ru// kha dog la sogs shes// kun gyi dbus kyi mtshan ma ste// 'og kyang khro bo'i rdo rje dang // rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan// nyams dang de dang 'dra bar ram// yang na 'grel par bshad pa bzhi
86a4(rgyud 'grel): mong dang zhal mye dag mtshan ma stsogs// tha dad par ni shes par bya// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gi ste// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin nor bu bzhin// so so rang rang sa blon lngas// rang rig thams cad sprul
86a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// 'dod chags can sogs gdul byas nas// 'dus nos dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog yin par 'dod// rjes kyi las rgyal ting 'dzin ni// 'od zer spro bsdu 'gro ba sbyor//
86a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi phrin las mthun pas ni// khyad par dbye ba ma bshad do// sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// rang gi gtso bo'i sbyor ba yis// lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje bcing // se gol gtog cing sdigs brjod
86b1(rgyud 'grel): pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dus par 'gyur// sngar bzhin bstod pas bstod nas su// g+hu
86b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ skyo bcud bsrung ba rdzogs pas 'grub// gtso bo dam tshig mchog bcings pa// snying khar hU~M las rdo rje bsam// dr-i sh+tsa dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes ga
86b3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i sngags kyis rjes 'gro ba'o// lce laM pad+ma bsdam bya ste// gtso bo snying po bkod byas paste// chos kyi phyag rgya gsung bsgrub bo// gtso bo las kyi phyag rgya bcing // spyi bir rdo rje ku dngos bsam// las kyi phyag rgya phrin las
86b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// ye shes sems dpa'i snying kha ru// ring gi mtshon mi bsam byas nas// phyag rgya chen po bas byas nas// phyag rgya chen po btsu pa nA~M// 'phrin las thad 'grub par 'gyur// rigs kyi dbu rgyan bsams nus ni// mchod dang mnyi ma nyid la sogs
86b5(rgyud 'grel): bstod // de nas bzlas brjod bya ba ni// shes rab 'khor lo'i sngags rnams los// 'od zer de 'dri 'jig rten du// 'gro ba'i don byas der 'dus thim// dang po'i zla sa po yin par 'dod// yang mtshan mchog brjod pa ni//
86b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa yin te der yang gnyis// bsdus la kun de phye ba la// dum bu drug tu gdon byas nas// phan yon drug tu rgyud bzhin 'gyur// bsdus pa'i man ngag 'di yin te// rnam snang cha dang rnam snang dang // rdo rje sems dpa
87a1(rgyud 'grel): mdo gnyis te// snying las mtshan rnams thon byas nas// sku yi grangs kyis 'jig rten du// chags can gti mug can don byas te// 'dus te dbyangs nas gsal byed la// thim pas 'od kyi 'khor lor
87a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// dbus kyi cha la gnas pa'o// shar sogs mi bskyod la sogs pa// rang rang mtshan gyi gnas skabasu// sngags don rigs kyi lhar 'phros te// zhe sdang can sogs da dang byas nas// 'dus te rang gi 'khor lo ru/
87a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags la 'dus te sngar bzhi no// so so rang rang mtshan gyiso// dang po'i ming gi sbyor bso// phyi nas sngags ni nus tshad bzlas// gal te gtong bar 'dod na yang // sngar bzhin mchod bstod sngon 'gro bas// lhag chad
87a4(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa zhi ba dang // bzod pa gsol dang gsal ba dang // sngar bcings dam tshigo phyag rgya ngagrol// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad // rje su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshe
87a5(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // slar yang 'byon par mdzad par rigs// sprul pa'i 'od zer der bsdus la// stong pa'i nga rgyal brtan bsgoms nas// srung ba dam pa yin par 'dod// spyong lam bzhi yi dus su yang // 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
87a6(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal 'chad// yid la yang ni sbyar bar bya// snying po'i ting 'dzin sbyar ba'o// de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas ni// gang 'dod las ni rdzogs 'dod pas// dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams bya// grong la sogs
87b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs bdun ni// rnal 'byor pa yis spang bar bya// yon tan kun dang yongs ldan pa'i// byang shar mtshams ni yongasu bzung // sems la nus pa dang ldan na// gang du yid dang mthun par bya// mngon par
87b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pI sa phyogasu// drag dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis// sa ni sbyang ba 'grub par bya// gyo mo bsreg ma thal ba dang // rus pa phub ma la sogs grub// bsal bas gnod pa med par 'gyur// dbus su sa ni brkos
87b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la// dag pa'i chu yis bkang byas la// me tog dkar pos bkang byas la// shar du gom pa brgya phyin nas// log ste dngos grub rtag par bya// de nas maN+Dal sngon 'gro bas// bruM ser las byung lha mo la//
87b4(rgyud 'grel): bslang ba gzhung dang mthun par bya// sa yi dbusu ting 'dzin gsum// snga ma bzhin du bsgom b+ha ste// 'on kyang khyad par dbye ba yod// rten gyi 'khor lo rdzogs byas la// deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag
87b5(rgyud 'grel): gri gson pa 'bras bu yod// lha dang dam tshig mnyam 'gyur bar// gyur par bdag nyid som nyi med// byang chub sems dong sems gcig pas// ma log por ni bdag gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
87b6(rgyud 'grel): rigasu ni// dang bdag skye ba the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// spos snod lag tu thogs nas ni// ma lus phyogs
88a1(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ dngos grub 'di ni stsal du
88a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de nas ting 'dzin gsum pa ni// snga ma bzhin du shes par bya// de nas gtso bo'i sbyor ldan pas// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'o// nga rgyal 'dzin pas sngar bzhin bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// sprul
88a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor chen po bshadadu gsol// de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gsan nas// phyogs rnams kun tu phyag byas nas// nga ni rang nyid rdo rje can// 'jam
88a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje bdag rang gis// dA ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// bdeg po rdo rje chen po'i bdag/ byin gyis brlab pa mi 'doro// mig dang rkang pa byin brlabs nas// dkyil 'khor steng
88a5(rgyud 'grel): du bdag byas la// dengs shig ces ni brjod byas la// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhom par bya// de nas phur bus gdab pa yi// 'og gi bgegs ni zlog par 'gyur/
88a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas skyang nul byas nas ni// spos kyi dkyilo 'khor bya ba ni// bdag po'i gnasu gru bzhi ste// lhag ma'i gnasu zlum po ru// rang rang gi ni snying po 'am// sku yi gsang sngags zlos paso// de nas bum pa bya ba
88b1(rgyud 'grel): yang // rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa// rtswa ba nag po ra ri med// rang gi mtshan mas mtshan bcas pa'o// 'bras chags lcags mas kha brgyan nas// ras zung gis ni mgul ba bcings// 'bru sna rin chen sna
88b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang // snying po lnga dang ldan par bya// dri zhim chu yis rab bkang la// steng du mchod yon chu bzhag la// rang gi chos kyi sa bon las// rang gi lha ru rtags nas ni// bsdu dang bstong dang dgug pa dang / rgyas gdapa li
88b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs sngar bzhin bya// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis// gzung ste sku yi sngags bzlas la// mchod yon phul la gnas su bzhag/ lag bzangs zhus pa'i rgyus gsungs pa'i// cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya// 'og nas
88b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i cho ga yiso// sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya// gson po'i slob ma'ang lha gnas bya// 'khor bzhi rnams kyi nang nas ni// dkyil 'khor tshegs rjes gzung bas// rang la bslab par shin tu ldan// theg pa che
88b5(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu mos// blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gzhug/ gzhan dag rje su gzung mi bya// de nas slob mas phyag byas te// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsel// byang chub sems dpyi
88b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid gsal du gsolo// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug por mdzad// bu tshur
89a1(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po yi// tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // de bzhin gang
89a2(rgyud 'grel): dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi gsong sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'ang mkhyen nas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams
89a3(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan meng brnyes// skyob pa 'dzem pa'i rdo rje yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de phyir kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir// bro yi blo gros 'di gyis shig/
89a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mas brjod bya ba// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// bsod nams kun l-i rje yi rang // byang chub mchog tu sems//
89a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyad bgyi// sems tsan thams cad mgron du gnye ro// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ sa ma ya a/ su ra tas+t+waM sa ma ya ho// badz+ra satwa ya thA su khaM/ snying kha la sogs par byin gyis brlab/
89a6(rgyud 'grel): oM shwat+tha la sogs pa'i shing // sor ni bcu gnyis me tog bcas// byon nas kha dang so yang brud// rtse nas bcas te dor ba dang // hub gsum chu yang sbyin par bya// dpung pa g.yon par srung skud bcing /
89b1(rgyud 'grel): ku sha byin la rmi lam brtag/ da la nud par smyos zhes bsgo// 'jig rten nA ni kun mkhyen rnams// u duM wA ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya la mA na ni res 'gru' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags kyi ni tshul
89b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gi mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byeng par nus// gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di lam// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo bas// dri dag kun ni 'khor ba'i rgyun// sdug bsngal
89b3(rgyud 'grel): kun 'byung bden pa bcas// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring brnyed// gang gis sangs rgyas sros bcas pa'i// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongasu bzung nas
89b4(rgyud 'grel): skyob bzhon par// sang ni rab tu 'dod bcas nas// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams 'dri ni 'dod byas na// rang byung skal pa chen po la// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi//
89b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs par gyur pa yin// zhes bstan par bya'o// snyan gsan dbab pa brgyad bzhin bya// tha rangs dus su langs nas ni// dkyil 'khor steng du sngar bzhin bzhag/ sku yi gsang sngags bzlas pa yi sa// dri yis dkyor
89b6(rgyud 'grel): byugs byas la// sar pa legs par bsgril ba la// kha dog lnga ni legs gyur nas// ye sheso lnga las sangs rgyas ltar// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// bcom ldan dkyil 'khor thig gdab phyir// rdo rje'i thig ni bdag
90a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i thig ni bdag la gsol// btang ba bsdus te bkang ba ni// legs par bsgril te mchod cing bzlas// sgrub pa'i grogs kyis lag gtang la// dkyil 'khor brtags te chung gcal nas/ phyi nas/
