90a2(rgyud 'grel): thig ni gdab par bya// nub nas shar du tshangs thig gdab// lha nas byang du'ang de bzhi no// byang dang lho drung shar nub dang // rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs bltas nas// dbang po chu dang nor gshin rje// zur thig
90a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang gdab byas nas// ngos bzhi dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gyur// so so'adra cha chanA bcu drug tu// so sor rnam par phye ba bya// dbang po phyogs nas btsal bya ste// cha dang po'i mtha' gnyis nas// bezhi cha gnyis
90a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gdab par bya// gnyis pa mnyam po bzhi ru'o// gsum pa phyed kyi phyed ma gnyis// bzhi pa dang po'i tshad dang mtshungs// cha ni bcu gsum dog tu 'gyur// gdugs dang 'khor lo pAd+ma dang // rim pa bzhi dang
90a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' brgyad// dgu dang bcug bcu gsum pa// de gsum lnga lnga ra~M bgo bar bya// yang phugs 'gram dang log su 'gyur// de kun ring thung cha gnyis pa// bcu dang bcu gnyis gnyis pa ni// logasu gcig
90a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das gcig gis ni// bzhi cha logs te de yang yin// cha phyed 'das ni phyed kyi phyed// nang ma sngar byas khyud du 'dod// de'i nang du cha chen lha rnams yang // cha phyed gnyis byas phyi ma las// mtha' gnyis nas
90b1(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhi na gdab// gdugs dang pad+ma 'khor lo'o// glanyis pa'i nang ma bzhin du bya// skus la sogs pa lta bur 'gyur// de'i nang go cha chen po// de yang gnyi su byas nas su// phyi ma gnyis byas de yI nang // sbyar byas ya
90b2(rgyud 'grel): phugs yin par 'dod// rlung gi cha chen de yi ni// bzhi cha gnyi su byas pa las// mtha' gnyis dag tu byas pa yang // lnga tshwar byas pas 'gram dang ni// ngos su gyur tre de kune yang // chu gnyis nas ni ring ba med// khyud dang
90b3(rgyud 'grel): logs ni rang gi tshad// phyi las lpags pas nang gi tshad// phyed tshod gnyis kyis bzhi char 'gyur// phyogs gsum yang ni desra shes bya// kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod// nAng gi dkyil 'khor du bye bar yang // bsdus pas/
90b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te dbye ba drug/ mkhas pa so sor shes byas te// bsdus pas 'dod pa brtsam par bya// se chen rnam pa bzhir gnas pa'i// re re 'ong bzhi bzhir byas nas ni// tshangs pa'i thig las logs ro ru// drug pa spyi'i ka/
90b5(rgyud 'grel): b+har 'gyur// bcu bcu nas ni mchog rnams 'dod// cha phyed pas ni zlum thig gis// bskyor te chu phyed phyir bor bya'i// cha phyed par ni bskor byas pas// nang gi mu khyud dag tu 'gyur// dbus dang phyogs byazhi brgyud rnams
90b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// gnyis gnyisu ni byas pa yis// bcu drug dag tu 'gyur ba yi// dkyil 'khor lnga po kun gyi ni// rto babs sgo la sogs pa yang // phye bzhin te de der shes bya// kun gyi phrad gnas lugs dong ni// rdo rje dbyings dang
91a1(rgyud 'grel): khams te rgyal// don grub 'gro 'dul las kyi rigs// de nyid 'dus pa rgyud kyi rtse// 'dri ru bya zhes mkhas pas 'dod// yang nu thun mong min pa ste// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas// ka ba brgyad
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsibs rten bcas// de phyi ma rtsibs bcu drug/ rtsibs rnams rten dang bcas par bri// zur brgyad dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// lha'i snam bu'i phyogs bzhin du// 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang rtsibs rten dang // lte bar bca'
91a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thig gdab bya// phyir yang rdo rje me 'od bskor// so sor phye ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // sngar bzhin rnam pa gnyis shes bya// thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o// de nas tshon gyi las bshad de// sngo ser dmar po ljang gu dang // dkar
91a4(rgyud 'grel): po rnam pa rim bzhin du// hUM tra hrIHa A las ni// mi bskyod ri dbang tshe dpag med// gdon mi za dang rtag pa bskyed// mig gi ldan pa'i lcags kyu yis// rang bzhin gnas pa kun nas ni// 'dres pas ro gau cig gyur bsam
91a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// bzlas pa bya ste dge brtsam// dang par rdo rje slob dpon gyis// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams par dgye// phyi nas kun tu slob mas so// shar phyogs su ni sngon po che// lho ni ser drang
91a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan// nub ni pad+ma rA ga ste// byang du ljang gu yin par 'dod// dbus kyi sa yi cha gnyis ni// shel lter dkar ba bla na med// sngon po rdo rje rtsi rang bzhin// gnyis pa gser lo dmigs pa ste// pad+ma chags pa'i ngo ba
91b1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo bzhin// de bzhin gzhan ni mar gad de// dkar po nang du shes bya ste// 'di ni tshen gyi rim par grags// de nas lha rnams dkod pa yang // dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbusu ni// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas//
91b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin// seng+ge yi ni gdun la bzhugs// yang na dbus mA dang po la// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud// yang na rnam snang chen po'o// lnga po kun gyi shar pogasu//
91b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyed glang po la gnas shing // bdud 'dul rdo rje bsnams shing bsngo// kun gyi lho yi phyogasu ni// rin chen dbang gi rta lo bcibs// mchog sbyin rin chen bsnams shing ser// dkyil 'khor kun gyi nub phyogasu/
91b4(rgyud 'grel): tsheche dpag med pA rma byA bcibs// ting 'dzin pad+ma bsnams shing dmar// lnga po kun gyi byeng phyogasu// gdon mi za ba mkha' lding bci bas// skyabs mdzod sna tshogs bsnams shing ljang // rdo rje 'degs pa sngon 'gro bas//
91b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po brjod cing bri bar bya// de nyid 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// lnga la rang gi 'khor gyis bskor// yang na 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ rigs kyi mdog ltar dgod par bya// rdo rje sems ma rin chen chos// las mchog
91b6(rgyud 'grel): mas te dpal ldan ma// mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod// bzhi'i mtshams bzhi po las ni// me mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs lnga ni// shar sde lho ser nub dmar zhing // byang du ldang zhing dbus dkar la//
92a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i sgeg mo rnam lnga ni// dbusu de bzhin gshegs rigs dkar// rdo rje shar du sngon po ste// lho ru rin chen ser mo ste// nub tu pad+ma dmar mo ste// byang du las ma ldang ba ste// de bzhin lho nub
92a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang // nub byang glu ma dbang ldan du// las ma la sogs de bzhin no// phyi yi lha rnams mtsham su ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin dgod// byams pa yang ni rigs lnga'i lha// 'khor lo lag na de bzhin te// rigs
92a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdog gis dbye bar bya// 'khor dang gtso bo phyogs sogs ni// lA s+ye la sogs bshad pa bzhin// bskal bzang gzhan yang de bzhin no// sgo rnams kun gyi nang du yang // sgo srung bzhi yang lnga lnga ru// gtso bo
92a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yang sngar bzhin brtag/ phyag mtshan la sogs dbye ba ni// rgyud las ji skad gsung bzhin bya// 'khor lo bcu chen gsum dang gsum// brgyad dang brgyad cu rtsa lnga ru// mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya// de ltar
92a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po 'am// yang na log pa'i phyag rgyar bcaso// yang ni mtshan ma dgod pa 'am// yang na yi ge dgod pa 'am// yang na gdan gyi mtshan ma 'am// gol te 'byor pa med na yang // phyag rgyas yongasu bsgrub
92a6(rgyud 'grel): to bsam// dkyil 'khor mdun du brtag pa'o// so sor phye la'ang de bzhin de// rang rang gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// de nas phyi dro'i thun dus su// khrus dang rgyan ni rab rdzogs pas/ 'il bu rab bskul ba
92b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor byas pas// lhag par gang yin 'dor bar 'gyur// mkhas pas ma tshang yongs skrod mdzad// 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// stang du btag pa dgug
92b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // gzhug cing dbang du bya'o// de nas bum pa bya ba yang // rtsa ba nag po rab rib meng // mgrin par ras mchog gis brgyan pa// 'bru sna ra ni chen sna lnga dang // snying po lnga dang ldan par byas// dI zhim chu yis yongs bkang /
92b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bsgrubs te rang gi gan su dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// ting 'dzin gsum po sngon bzhin sgom// ye shes sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis// mchod pa nyid dang gtor ma dang // sbyin sreg ci nus pa yis mchod//
92b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga yang // slob ma 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bya// de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang // gson dang shi ba'i las yin te// re shig snang ba nod par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni// rdo rje slob dpon
92b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub che// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma gang yin 'jug par 'tshal// de nas slob ma thams cad kyis// gson pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par s+ho// dga' chen khyod badrag ston pa bas// slob dpo
92b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni bdag la dgongs// byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pa// skyob pa chen po bdag phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyobs gsum song la bdag skyabos mchi// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog
93a1(rgyud 'grel): tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par 'tshal// bu tshur gshegs shig theg chen gyi// lam chen snod ni khyod yin te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
93a2(rgyud 'grel): da ltar bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen na// 'jig rten spyong po rjes 'jug phyir// 'khor lo bskor nus mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i//
93a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas rgyun bshags byed du gzhug ste// yol ba'i mthu ru gnas pa las// gdong ba gos kyis goyogs pa yis// dkon mo chog gsum la skyabasu mchi// sdig po
93a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sngo sor bshags// bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung // byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can rnams kyi bdag gi mgron du gnyer//
93a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ ces brjod du gzhug go// de nasna o sU ra tAstaM swa ma yastaM/ he badz+rI sid+d+hi ya tha su kha/ zhes pos sems ni bskyed par bya'o// de nas che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid
93a6(rgyud 'grel): ni// byang chub sems ni yongs gzung nas// dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi// 'khor lo 'di ni 'jug par 'dod// de nas slob ma la sgrags pa// sdom pa thams cad dbog pa ni// nus pa'i nyams
93b1(rgyud 'grel): la sbags te sbyin// slob mas yang ni de bzhin bzung // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs zhugs// tshul 'di gzhan la ma brjod cig/ gal te smras par gyur pa ni// 'jam pa'i rgyal po rab khros nato// /
93b2(rgyud 'grel): bdun rgyud rigs dang bcas par bzlog/ de nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ro da ka chu glad do// gal te gsang na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu yis 'grub// de nas brtsams te bu khyod kyi// 'jam
93b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rgyal po nga yin gyi// brnyas mi bya zhing mnyam par bgyi// ye shes dag pa dpog pa dang // brtan pa'ang gzhug bzhin bye ba ste// phreng ba dor dang bcing ba dang // gdong g.yogs dgrol zhing dkyil
93b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bstan// bla ma brgyud pa shes pa bgyi// 'jug pa rdzogs nas dbang bskur ba// lhar bskyed chu dang cod pan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni// brtul zhugs rjes gnang gzengs bsting dang // lung
93b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan dbugs dA byung la sogs pa// cho ga mthong bas shes par bya// gson pa'o las ni yongs rdzogs nas// gal te shI la phan 'dogs na// re 'am rus pa gos la ni// sku yi sngags kyi btab
93b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// chu mchog gis ni dkru dang gtor// de nas de la gnas pa yiso// gnod pa'i bgegs rnams bsal ba ni// shin tu khros pa'i 'jam dpal du// bdag nyid rab tu bsams nas ni// gshin rje
94a1(rgyud 'grel): gshad dam bdud rtsi yis// gsang sngags drag por rab bzlas pa'i// yungs kar rdo rjer bsams nas ni// de la lan gsum rab tu brab// de nas de yi bgegs bral la// snying kha'i 'dod pa'i
94a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po yis// bar do'i shes pa dgug par bya// A le sogs pa'i sa bon gyis// ye shes sems pa rab bskyed la// sems bskyed sdom bzung la sogs dang // dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug pa rnams// gson po'i//
94a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin byas na su// dbang bskur ba yang rim bzhin bya// rnam par dag pa de yi ni// lte ba snying kha lkog me dang // spyi bo rnams ni rim bzhin du// shes rab 'khor lo lhag bya ste// lte bar shes rab 'khor lo
94a4(rgyud 'grel): ni// mu khyud bzhi dang rtsibs bcu gnyis// mu khyud bzhi la sngags bzhin ni// sngar bzhin dgod par shes par bya// rtsibs la'ang dbyangs yig bcu gnyis te// lte bar a yig bsam pa'o// snying kha mgrin
94a5(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi bo yang // de bzhin bsame pa byas nas ni// sto dang bsdu bya'i 'od kyis ni// de'i lus kun khyab par bsamo// de la sogs pa'i gzugs brten na// sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya// de yang thabs dang
94a6(rgyud 'grel): dgang gzar blugs gzir rdzas// shang dang sgrub pa pa dang snod// rdzas gsang dgod dang mi bring dang // bsang gtor dang ni me sbar dang // ku sha dgra mo dang gnas pa dang // me bskyed pa dang spyan dra
94b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs// bsrung skud bcing dang mchod pa dang // zhabs bsil skyab dang dbang bskur dang // dam tshig sgo dang mchod yon dung // gsang gtor thor 'thung bsreg blugs
94b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // me bsad brtag dang dgang blugs dang // kun bsreg bsang dang lha dgod dang // bsdus dang bstod dgug pa dang // sngon bzhin phyag rgyas dbang bskur dang // mchod
94b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bsad// dgang blugs cigro ba shos las bskul dang // lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang // maM lha dgang blugs mchod yon bcas// gsad gtor sogs
94b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gshegs gsol ba// cho ga ji ltar mthong ba yi// gang na lngas kyis cho ga med// dra nI ci yi cho ga l-is// rgyas pa'i cho ga sngags pas bstan// de shes pa la nyes pa bral/
94b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byed pa'i slob dpon ni// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ston bzhin mchod pa dang // yi ge brgya pa brjod pa dang // bzod pa gsol dang bsngo ba dang // phyag
94b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya dgrol ba'i rim pa bye// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'byon par mdzad
95a1(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ oM badz+ra mu 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khyab pa'i// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga ni// thun mong thun mong min par sbyaru// nongs na mkhas
95a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzod par mdzod// gsang bar 'os pa sba ba'i phyir// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga byos// 'di las dge ba ci thob pa// 'gro kun 'jam pa'i dbyangs thob shog/ 'phags pa 'jam
95a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rigs bsdus pa dang // phye ba'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba// slob dpon zla bzangs grags pas mdzad pa// kha phya'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyo na dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul
95a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so//
96a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub babs zhugs
96b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya grwar skad du/ Ar+yA mAny+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha nA mA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tsha'o/
96b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag/ ngo bo nyid kyis rnamasra sangs rgyas// snying po'i don ldan sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal nas// snying po dan gyi rgyud nyid las// brten nas bdag gi sgrub thabs
96b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// de nas sku chen yid 'ong ba'i// nags tshal shin tu mdzes la sogs// dad deng dbyang bskur rje su ldan// byams sems ldan pas 'dri brtsam mo// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i blos// khro bo drug gis
96b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya// oM badz+ra rak+Sha kA la rU pa hUM/ oM badz+ra ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes bya bas bsrung bar bya'o// de nas byams pa'i sems ldan pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas//
96b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang mchod pa byA ba ni// na ma sr-irba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra d+hU pa pU dzA mau g+hA sa myA drA s+phA ra No sa ma yai hUM/ na mAHsarba ta thA ga te badz+ra puSh+pe pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a lo ka
96b6(rgyud 'grel): pU dza maM g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yai hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA gi ta badz+ra gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa mi yai hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badz+ri ni wi ti pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na saM ma ye hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta
97a1(rgyud 'grel): shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa mA ye hUM/ zhes mchod sngon du song nas sdig pa byA shag+nas+t+ra pa lA sogs pa bya'o// de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dadA btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o//
97a2(rgyud 'grel): a b+hU wa swa b+hA wa bi shud d+ha badz+ra tsakra a A aM aHzhes bya bas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las// dang po a'i ra bzhin las// 'od 'phros hUM las rdo rje nI// zhal drug ldan me dpung
97a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan// bum pa'i nang du mchod rten ni// rin chen lnga las grub pa bskyed// chos sku la brtan gzugs sku ni// e las byung ba'i bum pa'i nad // kha dog dkar po bskyed par bya// de nang b+h+rUM gi 'phro 'du las// gru bzhi pa la
97a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi tshom bu lnga// bcu drug 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i// dbus su seng+ge gti mug gdan// shar du glang chen zhe sdang gdan// lhor nr-i rta steng rgyal gdan// nub tu rma bya chags pa'i gdan
97a5(rgyud 'grel): byang du shang shrang phrag dos/ dan// lnga yi bdag nyid bcom pa'i gdan// zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa ste// gdan yang de bzhin zla ba'o// dang po dbyings yig rang bzhin las// gti mug blo ste tshul khrims mchog/ chos
97a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings rang bzhin zhi ba'i sku// dbus su rnam par bsam par bya// 'di ltar sangs rgyas skye med pa'i// zhal lnga phyag brgyad pad+ma'i ste// 'di ltar sangs rgyas skye med pa'i// 'dab bzhi a ra pa ce na// 'di ltar sangs rgya
97b1(rgyud 'grel): skye med pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthing ka ste// thabs dang shesA rab nyi zla'i bar// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsgom// zhe sdang chen po bzod
97b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag/ me long rang bzhin mthing kA ste// brtan pa'i rtags can mi bskyod pa// cung zhig khros pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// chags pa chen po sbyin pa'i bdag/ mnyam pa'i rang bzhin ser mo ste// chags pa
97b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po rang bzhin gyis// mnyam pa yi ni tshul gyis bzhugs// bsam gton rang bzhin zhadod pa'i bdag/ so sor kun rtog dmar po ste// 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin ste// bsam gtan gyi ni tshul gyis
97b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// skyob pa'i rang bzhin phrag dog ser// bya ba sna tshogs sna tshogs mdog/ phrag dge chen po'i rang bzhin bdag/ 'phrin las kyi ni tshul gyis bzhugs// don chen stong pa'i rang bzhin gyi// me long
97b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mthing ka sta// rdo rje bsnams pa 'gying bog cani// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs// brjod pa bral bas mtshan mA med// mnyam nyid ye shes mthing ka ste// rin chen bsnams pa 'gying bAg can//
97b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs// brjod pa 'byung ba smon pa med// so sor kun rtog dmar po ste// pad+ma bsnams pa 'gying bag can// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs// chos dang chos can de bzhin nyid// bya ba
98a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa sna tshogs dag/ rgya gram bsnams shing 'gying bag can// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs// byang chub mchog gi 'dod pa'i bdug/ sku mdog mthing ka chen po ste// shes rab chen pa
98a2(rgyud 'grel): sku 'chang ba// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i ste// bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin gyis// sku mdog ser po'i sku 'chang ba// byams pa'i rang bzhin lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // dga' ba'i mchog gi rang
98a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi// sku mdog dmar po sgra yi swa bdag/ dbyer med thugs kyi mda' gzhu 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i stong // mgu ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// sku mdog ljang gu'i rang bzhin te// phrag dog spangs pa
98a4(rgyud 'grel): mgu ba'i bdag/ rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // gzugs kyi phye ba'i bdag nyid can// sku mdog gser dang 'dra ba ste// dbul ba sel mdzad rin tshon 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // khe dog shin tu gas
98a5(rgyud 'grel): bA yi// sku mdog bai du l-i yi mya dog/ gnyen po mthar 'dzin nyi m+b+ha 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // mtshan thos pas ni snyan pa ste// ljang gu stA yI rnam shos sku// snyanA pa yi ni rtog 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje
98a6(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung zla ba'i steng // snying po 'dus pas mi bzad mdzod// sku ni mthing ka'i mdog can te// 'gyod pa med pas sor phreng 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed// sku mdog
98b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rA ka'i mdog/ chags pa med pas pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i stong // nyon mongs pa yi 'dzin pas bcings// sku mdog ljang gu 'od dang ldan// nyon mongs gtsod byed ral gri 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i
98b2(rgyud 'grel): steng // snang ba bzhin du gsal bar rtogs// myathing ka lce'i rnam shr-is sku// gzhan yang ltos pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin// rdo rje sbrulnga krung zla ba'i steng // rtogs pas rang 'dra de rtog so byed// sku mdog gA sa ru bsregs 'dra ba'i
98b3(rgyud 'grel): sku// smra bar byed pa'i lce bsnams shing // rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // mkhas pas denyen po sna tshogs brtan// ljang gu'i mdo can mdzes pa'i sku// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid rgyo gram 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng
98b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i rang bzhini don kun 'grub// sku mdog mI rdeng ka chen po ste// phyir mi ldogs pa'i mche ba 'dzini// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // byams dang snying rje dga' bas dga'// sku mdog gser 'dri mdzes pa'i sku// dman pa
98b5(rgyud 'grel): lus grol go cha 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // 'bras bu chosau sku sgyu ma'i sku// mig 'phrul sprul pa mo thing kwa'i mdog/ rang bzhin don grub khu tshur phyag/ rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // rgyun rnams kun+da gyis rnam
98b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing // bzhis bzhis yongasu bskor ba'o// sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo gtso// sku mdog dkar mo me long 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i snying // shar lho mtshamasu bsam par bya// tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba ma
99a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ser mo phreng ba 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i snang // lho nung mtsham su bsam par bya// bzod pa'i bdag nyid glu ma ni// sku mdog dmar mo pi ljang 'dzin// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // nub
99a2(rgyud 'grel): byang mtsham su bsam par bya// brtson 'grus bdag nyid gor ma ni// sku mdog ljang gu gar ma ste// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // byang shar mtshamasu bsam par bya// dang po'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i// shes rab dkyil
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bskyed byas nas// 'khor lo bcu drug dag la ni// thabs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin no// byams chen rang bzhin dpag med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni// sku mdog dmar sder gun+de bsnams// sems
99a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // snying rje shes rab mchog gi sku// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpol ni// ljang ser phyag na ut+pal bsnams// sems dpa'i skyilo krung zla ba'i stong // dga' ba'i shis rab blo chen ni// byang
99a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' spos glang po// mthing ka phyag na spos phor 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // mkhos pa btung snyoms thabs che ba// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog/ dkar po phyag na tog bsnams te/
99a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // rdzu 'phrul snying rje'i stobs dang ldan// sems dpa'i blo gros rgya mtsho ni// gser mdog phyag na rin po che// se mos dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // shugs chen byams pa'i stobs dang
99b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan// sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pa// gser mdog phyag na rin chen 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dga' ba'i bdag/ byang chug sems dpa' bzang skyong ni// mdog sngo phyag na spos kyi/
99b2(rgyud 'grel): shing // sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // bdag gzhan sde 'joms btang snyoms bdag/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs brtsegs nI// mthing ka'i mdog tson po ti bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla bo'i steng // srid
99b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri 'joms dga' bo ni// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob// mdog dmar phyag na pad+ma bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // sra zhing mkhregs pa btang snyoms sku// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song 'dren/
99b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // drag po chen po byams pa'i sku// byang chub snrums dpa' mya ngan 'joms// dung mdog phyag na ral gri bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng
99b5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje 'joms pa che las sgrub// byang chub sems dpyi' drib ce na// mdog dkar phyagan+d+ha dz+nyo ba bsnams// snyoms dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // mgon po'i rigs te btang snyoms spyi// sems dpa' zla 'odadi gzhan nu ni//
99b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar ser phyag na zla ba bsgoms// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // dga'o ba'i byin brlabs che ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpag med// mdog dkar phyag ni lcags kyu bsnams// sems dpa'i
100a1(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung zla ba'i sbyang // byang chub snying rje'i lam gyi bdu// sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po ni// sku mdog ljang gu ral gri 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // theg chen byams pa chen po'i bdag/
100a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpo' na mkha'i mdzod// mthing ka rin chen zur brgyad sgom// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // bsam gtan gyi ni bdag nyid de// dri yi lha mo bdug pa ma// mthing kha'i mdog can spos por 'dzin/
100a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ mdzes pa'i me tog lha mo ni// dkar mo phyag na me tog 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // thabs kyi shes rab phra rol phyin// mdzes pa'i
100a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo ni// dmar mo phyag na dri cha ba bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng // smon lam gsal ba'i pha rol phyir// ro dang ldan pa'i zhal zas ma// ljang gu phyag na ro mchog bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla
100a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng // ye shes snying rje chen po yi// khros pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma// mthing kaM phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin// khros po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng // byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i stobs// khros pa'i lha mo zhags pa
100a6(rgyud 'grel): ma// ser mo phyag na zhags pa bsnams// khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng // dga' ba'i pha rol phyin pa'i stobs// khros pas lha mo lcags sgrog ma// dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams// khros pa'i tshul gyis
100b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i steng // ye shes zad med btang snyoms bdag/ khros pa'i lha mo dril bu ma// ljang gu'i mdog can dril bu ma// khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng // dang blo'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin las// lha rnams de ltar
100b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya/ oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha swarba d+har+m+ma ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dza[:]shrI pa ri shud+b+ha/ mu da ye ti a zhes sbyin drang bar bya'o// a A i I o A e ai o o aM aHsti to hr-i dI dz+nyA na mur+t+ti/
100b3(rgyud 'grel): ru hai bud+d+ho bud+d+ho nAM/ tA to warti naM/ oM badz+ri tik+Sh+Na/ duHkhats+tshe da/ prad+h+waM dz+nyA na mur+N+Na ya/ dz+nyA na ka ya/ wA gi shwa ra ai ra pe tsa nA ya tre na ma/ zhes phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas gnyisu med par bstim par bya'o//
100b4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba taM thA ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hU~M hriMHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na murti a zhes bya bas zla ba'i steng du sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// a sarba ta thA ga te hr-i da ya ha ro ha ra/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ U mA la su ba
100b5(rgyud 'grel): ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA n+ya gar+b+ha a zhes bya bas dbang bskur te/ rigs rnams kyis mtshan pa'o// de nas bsgom pa rab tu brtsam// ma yengs gastsal bar byas ti sgom// A rA pa tsa na a zhes bzlas par bya'o// de nas
100b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi sngags brjod par bya'o// mtshon rnams bsdus nas gtso bo la zhu ste kun tu zhal rnam par snang mdzad du'o// gzhan du ni gtso bo zhu bo dang rdzas kyi gtso bo zhu ba'o// gti mug can sbyongs nas pradz+nyA
101a1(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na murti a zhes bya bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal bar byas te mtshan brjod par bya'o// zhe sdang can sbyangs nas duHkhats+tshe ta zhes bya bas me long lta bu'i
101a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal to mtshan brjod par bya'o// 'dod chags can sbyangs nas oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na zhes bya bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung sku ro gsal te mtshan brjed
101a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// nga rgyal can sbyangs nas wA gi shwa ra zhes bya bar mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsalo te mtshan brjod par bya'o// phrag dog can sbyangs nas dz+nyA na kA ya zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i
101a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i sbyar gsal to mtshan brjod par bya'o// de ltar longs sku dang sbrul sku'i sngags brjod nas bstod pa ni/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthor gyur khyod la
101a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod lo 'dud// ces bya bas stong pa nyid de dang mtshan ma meng pa dang smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o// yum bzhis chos
101a6(rgyud 'grel): sku la bstod pa'o// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshol 'dud// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces bya bas nang stong pa nyid phyi
101b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgo nas/ shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhis chos sku la bstod pa'o// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag
101b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces bya bas chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
101b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de lho phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung du khyod la 'dud// na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud//
101b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes las byung khyod las 'dud// ces bya bas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog mo dang tha ma myed pa dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid de nub phyogs kyis
101b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes su nyid
102a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'dud// ces bya bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i rnga ba nyid stong pa nyid
102a2(rgyud 'grel): de byung phyogs kyi sems dpa' chos sku la bstod da'o// a b+hA wa swa b+ha wa bi shud d+hA badz+ra tsakrA aM a zhes b+ha bas bzlas pa bstan nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// de nas spyod lam gyis gnas
102a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// bdag gis bla ma'i gdams pa la brten nas/ rgyud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig don sbyar// mkha' 'gro'i rjes su 'brangs nas de brtsams paso// 'gro kun yo shes sems dpa'
102a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs paR+Sha shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs/ u rgyan gyi slob dpon shrI a wa d+hu tI ba chen pos mdzad pa rdzogaso//
102a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po se bsgyur ba'o// /
103a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//
103b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Da la bi d+hi kri ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes sku// de
103b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid bdag dri med pa'i// tshig la sgra mkhas brjod pa'i gsung khyad bdagA sku la lnga bstod te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lam// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa
103b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// dad ldan thos pa la brtson dang // dbang theb snang ba sbyin pa'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas kyi bar chad bsal// byams sems ldan pas bsnyen pa brtsam// slob mas thal me sbyar byas nas// maN+Dal me tog bcas phul
103b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// bdag ni mi shes rang bzhin gyis// lam gyi dam pa bstan du gsol// gsol btap+ta gra nang sbyin ched du ni// rdzas rnams la sogs gunang ba sbyin// byams ldan bstan pa la 'jug bya// gtso bo la 'bum gzhan la
103b5(rgyud 'grel): khri// oM badz+ra tIk+tA duHkhats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+t+ta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gi shwa ra/ a rA pa tsa na hU~M d+hi/ phyogs skyong rnams la ga tor ma btang // bsod nams pa sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan byung nas
103b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri bo'i las brtsam bya// dang po sangs rgyas skur langs la// lha mnyes sa bslangs brtag dang // nag tshal spang ljongs nyams dga' gnas// sngar byas rang yid dga' bar brtsam// dri zhim chus gtor me tog
104a1(rgyud 'grel): dgram// de ltar sa brtag de ru ni// mchod pa lnga yis lha mo mchod// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa
104a2(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng+ge yis// bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar// de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi sde// pham par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri// len gsum brjod pas sa la thim// de yi rtags ni shar la sogs// mtho dman rtags kyis brtag
104a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// brko ba lto 'phye lto bar brko// dri yi chu yis spangs la bzhag/ de nas lag mthil ltar mnya mo byo// lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// logs dang steng yang de bzhin no// bdag ni dkyor lha
104a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas// lha rnams khyed ni dpang du gyur// bdag gzhan sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dbu rgyan stong g.yogs dang brgyan bgos nas rdo rje dril bu thogs nas// oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhU~M//
104a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra A lo kI AHhUM/ oM badz+ra g+han+d+he AHhUM/ oM badz+ro nai we te AHhUM/ zhes mched pa lngas mchod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa// sgyu ma sprul pa bdag nyid kyis// 'ja' tshon lta bur so sngor gsal
104a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab sku mnga' bo'i// dkyil 'khor ldan pa phyag 'tshal bstod// khong nas 'byung ba shes rab thabs// shes rab dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// nyon mongs dug rnams sel mdzad pa'i// thabs kyi dkyil 'khor
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad du gsol// oM prad+d+ha maN+Da la pra b+he sha/ oM u pa maN+Da la pra b+he sha/ de nas phyogs bcu khro bos bsrung // bka' bgro stang stobs bya bar bshad// gur dang bla re la sogs pa// rak+Sha'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o// da yA
104b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lngas byugs te// de ni dri'i thig le dang // me tog tshem bu dgram par bya// tsho gas bsags stong nyid bsgoms nas ni// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas as lha bskyed// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug gzhug bya// 'di ltar sangaso rgyas skyed
104b3(rgyud 'grel): byed yum// khong nas 'byung ba skye med bdag/ smra bsam brjod med spros grol yum// gsang ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po gti mug tshe// gti mug ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// ma rig sbubs 'byod
104b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin// rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// zhe sdang ma lus 'joms mdzad cing // 'khregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen
104b5(rgyud 'grel): po nga rgyal che// nga rgyal ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen por 'dzin// rin tshun 'byung ldan phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// 'dod chags ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// sprin dkar dag/
104b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pad+ma bsnams// snang ba mtha' yas phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po phrag dog che// phrag dog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// phyag 'tshal don yod grub la bstod// dang po sangs rgyas/
105a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu med cing // gdong lnga gtsug phung lnga dang ldan// glegs bam ral gri phyag na bsnams// dang po'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod // shes rab ral gri mnga' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi
105a2(rgyud 'grel): shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// shes rab 'khor lo phyag 'tshal bsteng // ya shes sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba// ye shes dbang bskur
105a3(rgyud 'grel): co pan can// yang shes sems dpa'i phyag 'chil bstong // 'dod pa chen po par tshon ldan// dga' ba don ldan mag par byeng / shes rapa pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab sems dpa' ba chu dag pa stong /
105a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo la// tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba mA// bzod pa brtson 'grus glu gar ma// lha mo bzhi lo phyag 'tshal bstod // shos rab mar me bsam gtan dri// thabs ldan mi dge smon larar
105a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lha mo bzhi la bstod // sems can don la rab brtson pa'i// snying rje chen po blo mchig ldan// byams pa la sogaso thabs kyi bdag/ thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bstod// stobs ldan lcags kyu
105a6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa ma// ye shes lcags sgrog dril bu ma// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi// sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod // de nas sgrub pa'i las brtsams nas// gsang po'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kun//
105b1(rgyud 'grel): lus bdag la dgongasu gsol// sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir// sang ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal// thal sbyar bus gtsugs dril bu gsil// spos thogs de ltar gsol ba gang bya// de nas sgrub pa
105b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni// gsol ba btab pa sngon song nas// gsang ba'i dkyor mkha' la bdag/ nyi zla bar du mkha' la bdeg// de nas slob ma gzung bar bya// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs
105b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa'i// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // dkon mchog gtso 'khor bcas pa drang // skyabs/
105b4(rgyud 'grel): dang grong mchog 'jug par 'tshal// bu tshur lam chen 'dir zhugs pa'i// bu tshur thag chen rten yin te// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di // khyod la yang dgra bshad par bya// lam 'di la ni brten nas
105b5(rgyud 'grel): ni// 'das dang ma byon da lta rnams// byang chub shing gi gdan drung du// thams cad de mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob// bdud sde dag kyang 'di yi bcom// ngo bas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// bu yis lam 'di sgrub par
105b6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// dkyil 'khor lnga dang dkon mchog gsum// dus ni rtag tu skyabasu mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo sra dpon la// dus ni rtag tu skyabasu mchi// bla med dkon mchog dkyil 'khor lha// thams cad bdag li dgo
106a1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// bdag dus 'di na gzung byas te// tshangs spyong dam tshig sdom pa gzung // phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bzhugs pa'i// bla ma slob dpon yi dam lha// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
106a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang // dam chos rnams la bdag sdig bshagaso// bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas dang // dkyil 'khor chos dang dge 'dun gyis// yon tan yongasu sgrogs rnams la// de la bdag ni yi rang ngo // chos kyi 'khor
106a3(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor ba dang // badre gshegs mya ngani mi 'da' bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam lnga// dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas pa dang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// snying po byang chub mchis bar du// di
106a4(rgyud 'grel): ring nyid du skyab su mchi// bdag ni dring dus gzung du gsol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub tu ni sems bskyang ltar// de bzhin sems can phan don du// bdag gis byang chub sems
106a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas sdom pa bzung // rdo rje rin chen khyad par gyi// rdo rje drilta bu'i
106a6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa gzung // thabs dang shes rab bsam pas ni// slob dpon nyid du sdom pa gzung // rin chen 'dzin pa chen po yi// yid du 'ong ba'i dam tshig la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin
106b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// pad+ma 'dzin pa chen po yis// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa yis// dam pa'i chos kyi sdom pa gzung // phrin las 'dzin pa chen po yi// tshul khrims sum ldan bya ba dang // rgya che
106b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa gzung bar bya// de ltar sdom pa ra bo bzung nas// slob ma bsrung bar rab tu bya// 'bru gsum sngags kyis rab bsrungs nas// gnas gsum byin brlabase ra po brtan nas//
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas slob ma brtan phyir mchod// de nas maN+Dal po ko tsam// bshams nas so shing dor bya ni// ut+pal pad+ma dri zhom ni// sor ni bcu gnyis 'bus ma zos// dri dang me tog shin tu bcings// shar bltas mi g.yo
106b4(rgyud 'grel): steng du dor// bcas zin nas ni mi g.yo dor// steng ltos mchog thob phyogasu ni// so sngo'i phrin las mtsha ma su ni// dngos grub tha ma 'og gi 'og/ de nasA dri mA dag pa'i phyir// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya bA gi shwa ra/ ma hA pa
106b5(rgyud 'grel): tsa/ bi shro d+ha sarba pA paM rU pa tsit+ta bra gA pa ya na hUM/ bzlas pa'i chu yis lus ngagra yid // so so dag phyir hub gsum btung // de nas rgyud ni sbyang ba'i phyir// dad dong mi lus thob pa dang // sangs rgyus 'byung ba shin tu
106b6(rgyud 'grel): dkon// me tog u dma? wa ra bzhin// lam bzang rnyed pa de bas kyang // shin tu sdig pa zang byed pa// dkyil 'khor dbang ni thob par deka'// dbang ljon nus pa thob dka'o// de nas oM AHhUM ma Ni bi shud+d+ha hUM/ sarba pA paM
107a1(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha hUM/ ku sha'i byin brlabs snga su gzhug/ ldang ba'i stobs kyi rmi lam gang ba/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM kA la rU pa hUM/ gnyis kyis srung ba'i skung pa bya// byin brlabs srog gnas nyid du gdags
107a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas gtor ma btang byas nas// slob ma seng+ge'i nyal thabs nyal// rmi lam brtags ni so sor brtag/ rtags bzang spro nga ngan na ni// sbyin sreg gzhan gyi sdig pa sbyang // slob dpon dkyil 'khor
107a3(rgyud 'grel): nang bzhugs te// slob mi sta gon la gnas pa'o// de nas rin chen lnga las byas// bum pa kha dog dkar po ste// pang steng so so'i mtshan ma bgod// mgul mchings kha dag so sor bcings// 'bru
107a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rin chen lnga dang ni// snying po lnga dang spos lnga blug/ 'bras bu can gyi kho rgyan shing // sbyangs nas de nas dgram par bya// lha grangs mthun pa'i bum pa dgram/ bi shud+d+ha'i sngags kyis sbyang //
107a5(rgyud 'grel): b+h+rUM lAs rin chen bum pa bskyed// nang du so so'i lha rnams bsam// dgug gzhug la sogs rdzogs pa dang // mchod nas baustod cing 'dud kyi bstod// oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga t+ye hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/
107a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM hrI/ b+ha ga wAM/ dz+nyA na mur+t+ti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pai tsaM/ sarba d+har+m+ma/ gA gA nA/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dzI na gAr+tha aH/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na AHhUM/ oM duHkhats+tshe da AHhUM/
107b1(rgyud 'grel): oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ya AHhUM/ oM wA gI sh+tsa ra AHhUM/ oM dz+nye na kA ya AHhUM/ a ra pa tsA na AHhUM/ zhes pas ni rigs so so dang tha mas ni las thams cad pya byin+da gyis brlab bo// de ltar sgrub pa'i
107b2(rgyud 'grel): dus su mr-iN+Dal byas la/ me tog gro rami so sor dgram/ mar me mchod pa so'i grangs// zin nas ras kyi steng du bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// dang poraraM thig gi las bya'o// sar pa'i tshad dang
107b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ldan// dri zhim chu dang snod du bzhag/ bdag nyid shar du 'dug nas ni// thig ni ya shes lnga ru bskyang // phyogs bcu'i ye shes lnga ru bstim// oM a ra pA tsa na ma ti kra ma hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad
107b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so// de nas oM a hri zhes bya byas sum sgril du'o// de nas slob mas blangs la dang po gdab pa'o// sa'i thig gdub slob dpon nub// slob ma shar 'dug tshangs thig gdab// slob mi lhor 'dug slob
107b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon byung // slob dpon shar lho lho nub ste// de bzhin logs thag gang ba par bya// zur thig de nas cha chen gdab// de nas cha chung bcu drug gdab// de nas phyi dang nang du dbye// nang du bcu drug de bzhin dubye//
107b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang de bzhin cha yi dbye// cha rnams dbye bas sgo brgyan te// nang gi phyed cha pho brang ste// tshom bu lnga ldan par 'dab bzhi// de ltar thig no so sor gdab// ye shes skud po mchod pa ni// ye shes gshegs
108a1(rgyud 'grel): la dam tshig bsdu// de nas rdul tshon dgye ba ni// rin chen lnga'i phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras kyi phye mas bri// kha dog so sor bkram nas ni// oM hUM sra a ha go rim su// ma dag bshig nas dag pa bskyed// yis
108a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni spyan drangs bstim// oM a ra pa tsa na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes lan bdun pazlas nas ni// de nas tshon rtsi rim bzhin du// dbus nas brtsams te bro bar bya// sgo ni shar nas dbye bar bya'o// dang po'i tshon la mchod pa ni// yid kyis
108a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas tshig 'di brjod// chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa// sems can yongs dag zhing 'dir bri// nyes pa'i dri ma kun bral phyir// rdul tshen ye shes lnga lis bris// dang pa dbus su pad+ma ni// sna tshogs shin
108a4(rgyud 'grel): tu ze 'bru dkar// shar gyi sna tshog ze 'bru mthing // lho'i sna tshogs ze 'bru serA// nub tu sna tshogs ze 'bru dmar// byang du sna tshogase ze 'bru ljang // de yi gdung dang 'dra ba bskor// pad+ma nyi mes rab tu bskor// de ni nang gi pho
108a5(rgyud 'grel): brang ngo // gru chang ljang la sgo bzhi dang // rta babs la sogs bcas pa'o// de yi phyi rolo cha chen gcig/ rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo'o// shar mthing lho sar nub dmar po// byang ljang gru chad ljang gu ste// sgo bzhi rta
108a6(rgyud 'grel): babs bzhi ldan pa'o// dkyil 'khor legs par rab tu bri// na mkha' dang bsre thugs mtshan dgeng // dbus su sa bon a bris nas// phyogs bzhi gzhan gyi don bzhin no// dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab bzhi la// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma
108b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram dang // gtso bo phye nas mtshan ma so sor sbas// shar gyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol dgong // lho'i pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la// rin chen nyi ma tog dang so phreng dgong // nub kyi pad+ma 'dab/
108b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhi po la// pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce dgod do// byang gi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la// rgya gram mche ba go cha khu tshur dgod// gru chang bzhi la nang gi lha mo ni// me long phreng ba pi wang phyag shing dgong// de ni nang gi mtshan ma
108b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa'o// de nas phyi'i mtshan ma dgod pa ni// shar du 'gu de ut+pal spos por rgyal mtshan no// lhor ni rin chen 'bar ba smos phor po ti'o// nub tu pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri dra bo'o// byang du zla ba lcags kyu ral gri rin chen
108b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// phyi'i lha mo'i ngo god pa ni// me tog mar mye dri dang bshos// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu'o// ye shes gnyis med bsres la dgong // lha rnams phyogs skyong rnams kyang dgong // de nas bla re ba ngan so Da/
108b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs dgram// de nas rol mos bum pa ni// spyan drang bskor byas dgram par bya// de nas bdag nyid shar bltas te// bde ba'i stan la nyor 'dug nas// bgags rnams yongasu bskrang nas ni// /
108b6(rgyud 'grel): rten la mchod dang sdig bshags dang // byang chub tu bdag sems bskyed bya// stong nyid sngags kyis stong nyid bsgom// de nas hUM las rdo rje bsgom// khro zhal drug ldan bum par ni// bru las chos sku na mkhar ldan gru gsum
109a1(rgyud 'grel): na mkhar bru bsams nas// gru bzhi sgo bzhi tshom bu bzhi// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed// de nas tshom bu lnga la ni// seng ge glang chen rta dang ni// rma bya shang shang a las bskyed//
109a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du rang sems a// de las rnam par snang mdzad ni// zhi ba mdog dkar zhal bzhi pa// phyag rgya byang chub mchog gi sku'o// thugs khar dang po sangs rgyas so// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ste// de
109a3(rgyud 'grel): stong ye shes sems dpa'o// phyag rgya ral grI po ti ste// gzhan ni so so'i phyag mtshano// mthing kha ser po dmar dang ljang // rdo rje ro ni chen pad+ma las// sa gnon mcheg sbyin ting 'dzin skyabs byin te// de bzhin yum
109a4(rgyud 'grel): g+hi mdog dang phyag mtshan so so'o// mthong kha ser po dmar po dang ljang gu ste// rdo rje lcags kyu mnga' gzhu se grel ni// so so'i phyag mtshan legs par bsnams// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa
109a5(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'o// gser mdog dmyur dang ljang gu thon ka mdog/ rin chen nyi ma tog dang sor phreng bsnams// rin chen nyi ma tig dang bzhod pa'i dpal// so s+ye'i rgyan ldan sku ni mdzes pa'o// dmar dang ljang khu
109a6(rgyud 'grel): mthing ka gser bsregs mdog/ ma chags sems gcod sems rgyud gsal bar smra// kha dog so so gsal zhing ma 'dras 'dzin// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo lce bsnam so// ljang gu mthong kha gser bsregs
109b1(rgyud 'grel): margang mdog/ las dang gnod sbyin go cha khu tshur dang / rgya gram che ba go cha khu tshur te// bzhugs tshul zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// sgag dang rin chen phreng ba glu ma gAr// dkar dang ser dang dam
109b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ljang gu dang // me lcong phrang dang pi wang chags shing bsnams// pang steng rgyan ldan sgeg pas bzhugs pa'o// byams pa 'jam dbyangs spos kyi glang po tog/ dmar po ljang ser mthing kha dkar ba ste/
109b3(rgyud 'grel): d+hA ut+pal spos phor rgyun mtshan dang // so so'i phyag mtshan ma 'das bsnams pa'o// blo gos rgya mtshe blo gros mi bzang bzang skong spobs pa brtsegs// sar dang gsar bsags in+na nI la thon ka
109b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i mdog/ rin chen rin chen 'bar ba spos pho rau pau ti bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng na bzhugs shing mdzes// mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren dang mya ngan dri ba can gyi 'odra// dmar
109b5(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma rA ga dung mdog shin tu dkar dang ut+pal mdog/ pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri dro ba rnams// shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan 'dzin sku dang ldan// zla 'od gzhon nu thugs rje'i stobs dang na mkha'i snying po
109b6(rgyud 'grel): na mkha'i mdzod// zla ba lcags klu dang ni ral gri 'bar ba rin chen sgrim ni g.yas g.yon 'dzin// dkar ser dkar dang ljang gu mthing kha'i mdog/ sku mdog shin tu gsal pas ma 'das gsal// bdug pa
110a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog dri dang ro// mthing kha dkar dang dmar po ljang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// muthing ka ser dra mar ljang khu'o// de lta dam tshig lnga bsgreng nas// thugakhwa nu la
110a2(rgyud 'grel): tu gsal// pra kri t+ya pa ri shud d+ha sarba d+hArma/ ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dza shrI pa ri shud+d+ha/ mu pa te ye ta a/ yongasu dag pa'i ye sheso// zhing nas ma lus spyan drang ngi// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin yis rims
110a3(rgyud 'grel): drang ngo // s+thisti hri ti dz+nyA na murti naM ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+ha naM/ t+yA d+ho warti ne zhes pas sku bzhi la phyag bya'o// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHbstim zhing byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ oM hUM hri zhes hA saM so// nga ni dbang bskur te gsos gang
110a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da yu/ ha rA ha ra sarbaM d+har+m+ma/ gA ga na a mA lA su pa r-I shud+d+ho d+hur+m+ma d+ha tu dz+nyA na gir+N+Na pa A/ da ni slob dpon 'jug pa'o// slob ma 'jug pa ni/ ras kyis gya dong nI bka ba nas su// lA
110a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes lam bstan nas/ sher skor slob ma 'dug stangs ni// thul sbyar gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug/ de nas gsol ba btab byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// slob dpon la ni skyabasu mchi// dkyil
110a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gtso 'khor bcas la yang // bdag ni rtag tu skyabasu mchi// thor pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// zhes brjod la maN+Dal dbul// de nas slob dpon gyis gsel ba ni
110b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i grong mchog tu// bdag gis khyod ni gzhug par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gong gis sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha la phyag byed gzhug
110b2(rgyud 'grel): nga nas sdom pa'i cho ga sbyin pa ni// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// gsum la skyabasu mchi bar bgyi// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong // sdom pa rtag tu bzung bar bya// thabs ni rdo rje shos rab dril//
110b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab sdom pa bzung // da ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchog/ sdom pa de ni bzung bar bya// nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// rin cheni rigs mchog chen po yi// sdom pa rtag tu
110b4(rgyud 'grel): bzung ba'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam bya'i chos kyang ma lus bzung // pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po ste// demachog ying du 'ong ba gzung // sdom pa thams cad ldan pa dang // mchod sbyin las
110b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang ci nus bya// las kyi rigs mchog chen po yaM// sdom pa dag kyang bzung bar bya// dra ni khyod kyisra 'di gyis shig/ las rnams su laM sma mi bya// 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu// 'di las 'das nas
110b6(rgyud 'grel): brlag por 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta hUM hUM hUM pany+tsa hri zhes pas lan gsum sbyin no// da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo slob dpon nus pa dang ldan paso// slob dpon nyid la bstim nas srung // phrin las rnam bzhi'i
111a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog brtag/ s+t+rIste hr-i ta/ dz+nyA na murti a zhes pas/ byin gyis brlabas+ya// de nas me tog dor byas nas// spyan ni legs par dbye bar bya// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po ltar// de bzhin du spyan dbye'o// oM
111a2(rgyud 'grel): a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsak+Shu a A i aHstong pa bzhin spyan dbye'o// gdong g.yogs phud la 'di skad do// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dri lo ltos// da ni dang ba rab tu skyes// sdig pa thams cad zhi ba dang // dngos grub
111a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnyis 'di las 'byung // de phyir 'di la nan tan gyis// dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags sgrub byos zhes byas nas// rung gi 'gu ha na ma dang yi dmya lha rnams gsal bar bstan// lha rnams phung po kham su bshad// de nas
111a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rab tu bsheng // grubo bzhi tshad med bzhi dang ni// skyo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bozhi// rta bab sau yang dag spong ba bzhi// dra ba dra phyed pa ni// yang dag stong dag bzhi pa'o// kr-i ba brgyad ni 'phags ldem brgyad//
111a5(rgyud 'grel): tshom bu lnga ldan pha rol phyin// rdo rje'i gdung ni shes rab blo// 'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo te// stong pa bcu drug phyi yang ngo // de nas maN+DalA byas nas ni// yo byad rdzas kyi bla ma mchod// de rjes dbang ni rab bskur phyir// sgo lhor sna
111a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma'i ste/ slob mo blo ldan de steng bzhag/ bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas// las kyi khro ba sgrol pa spro// bdud rtsi chu yis bsrung bar btor// oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM khaM/ oM ka lA rU pa hUM hIHber chod bgegs
111b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsal nas nI// drwa ba gur gyis bsrung ba dang // khro bo drug gis bsrungs pa la// rim pa baN+Din du dbang bskur ro// bum pa'i chu rnams thams cad kun// gtso bo bum par kun bsdus nas// bdag nyid lha'i skur gsal
111b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma byin brlab bya ba'i phyir// de nas bum pa blangs nas ni// slob ma'i mgo la rab gtugs te// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mAM hUM/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dga' ldan gnas ni bzhugs pa la// lha rnams kyis ni khrus gso
111b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar// de bzhin bdag gos khrus gsol lo// oM duHkhAts+tshe da hUM/ de nas dbu rgyan ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi// so so yang dag rab gsal phyir// bstim nas mchod cing bstod nas ni// mnyam nyid gzung 'dzin springs
111b4(rgyud 'grel): byis bskur// oM wa gi shAshwa ra tr-i/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// ye shrIs lnga ldan log lta 'joms// steng nyid don stong rdo rje che// bu khyed thugs la gnas par bgyi// oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na tra~M/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
111b5(rgyud 'grel): don// rgyun mi chang bar 'gro don phyir// mchod bstong bstims nas dbang byaskur phyir// dri rong khyod la dbang bskurak+ShA ya ha/ mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// shes rab ye shes gnyis med mtshan
111b6(rgyud 'grel): po te grags bam mchod nas pasti mi// di ring du khyod ming dbang bskur// oM br-id+d+ha dz+nyA na mu rti ye oM/ ye shes lnga ldan drug rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog/ spyod lam rgyun du phreng ba'i dbang // skyong la brgyun
112a1(rgyud 'grel): du phreng ba'i dbang // ngi ring khyod la bskur bar bya// oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcod pa dang // shes bya ma rig gsal ba'i phyir// shes rab mtshon chen ral gri 'di// bu yis rtag tu bzung bar
112a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ oM badz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ badz+ra tik+Sh+Na/ duHkhan+na da d+ha ra hUM/ lha rnams mchod dang sems can mnyes// zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa rnams// las rnams thams cad khyod kyis gyis// bsam pa bzang pos de gyis shig/ de nas da ni
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ni// ri dgas rna ba bzhin du gos// gyon nas khyod la lung bstan ni// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yi// dngos grub rnams gnyis thob bya dang // 'gro drug dug rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'gro thar thar pa'i lam
112a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di thob// sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya bud+d+he ba swA hA/ chos kyi dud de sgra chen ldan+da// chos kyi gar+b+he sgra po che// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga sgra sgrogs// chos kyi skyobs phyir gdugs dbub bo// oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ saM gi tI ni oM/ oM
112a5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra tek+Sha gan+thi hri/ oM dz+nyA na kI yaM dun+na haM/ oM duHkhats+tshe da tsha tre hUM/ oM wa gi shwa ra rat+ne hUM/ oM a ra pa tsau na dz+nyA ne ka tsik+Shu bi mA la hUM/ de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang // mchod cing bsteng le sbyin bsreg bya// de ltar rdzo
112a6(rgyud 'grel): na gter ma btang // ye shes gshig su gsel ba ni// swa ar+theny+tsa wa/ pa ra ar+tha tse wa/ sid+d+hi ta gats+tsha mu pa ti ye ti au/ de ltar ga shags nas muHzhes brjod// dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon
112b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' nas bsdu// rab tu gnas par bya ba ni// dang po bsnyen par rdzogs par bya// de nas sa'i cho ga ni// bslang dang brtag dang bsrung ba dang // sbyang zhing byin brlabs gzung bar bya'o// de nas bum pa lta gon bya// gser dngu/
112b2(rgyud 'grel): zangs la sogs pa yi// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen blugs// 'bras bu dri dang kho brgyan gdags// A sarba ta thA ga ta hU~M ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hri/ b+ha ga wau dz+nyA na murti/ wa gau shwa ro/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harma ga ga nAM mA la su pa ra
112b3(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na grarba aHlha rnams bum par gsal bar bskyed// sa bon mchen mA so sor bri// maN+Dal du ni go rims dgod// rnam rgyal bum pa rdzogs par ro// de nas go rims bzhin du bzhag/ maN+Dal dri'i thig
112b4(rgyud 'grel): lo buM// mchod pa la segs gzhung bzhin dbul// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// ye shes spyan drangs bstim nus ni// mchod dang rtsa ba'i bzlas pa bya// oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ de nas mkha' la gdegs par bya//
112b5(rgyud 'grel): rten ni spyang ba lags byas nas// khrus ni yongs ngag rdzogs byas nas// yar gyi ngo bo'i zla ba dang // snga dro dri med gtsang ma gos// gyon pa'i slob dpon thig las byas// tshon gyi las kyang rdzogs byas nas// bskyeng dang mchod
112b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bstong rdzogs nas// de nas rab tu gnas par bya// thams cad sku gsum ngag tu bskyang // de nas snyan ni drang bya ste// ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin gnas na bzhugs pa la// chos dbyings gan su
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa ltar// 'di nyid du ni gshegasu gsol// ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'og min gnas na bzhugs pa las// bde ba can du gshegs pa ltar// 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol//
113a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la// sprul pa'i sku ru gshegs pa ltar// 'di nyid du ni bzhugasu gsol// oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma/ ya tu ta/ oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ saM bo ta
113a3(rgyud 'grel): dza tu taM/ oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha nirman dza tut+ta/ oMShAM sto hr-i d+ha dz+nyA na mu d+ho naM/ ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ t+yai two warti naM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu paM/ pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye a hUM/ zhes bya bas mchod nas de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHzhwa
113a4(rgyud 'grel): bya bas bstim par bya'o// oM a b+ha wa sa b+he wa bi shud+d+ha/ badz+ra tsak+Shu badz+ra tsak+Shu A A ai aHde nas a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha re ha ra/ ga ga nA mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha NAMbadz+ra d+hA tu/ duHkhats+tshe da/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ sarba ta
113a5(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha rA ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa r-i shud+d+ha/ re tI d+hA tu wo gi shwa ra/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta haM da ya/ ha ra hA ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pi ri shud+d+ha/ pad+me d+ha tu/ badz+ra tik+Sha/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/
113a6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA laM su pi r-i shud+d+ha/ karma d+hA tu/ d+hA na kA ya dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tuM/ pradz+nyAM dz+nyA na muH
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ bum pa lngas dbang bskur te/ oM hri kA la rU pa hUM zhes bya bas bgegs bskrang la phyag rgya ni lag pa mnyam par sbyar zhing bcings pa la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du gzhan rtsa mo ltar byas
113b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rdo rje sdug bsngal gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag par mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dang gung mo gnyis rtse mo so sor byas pa ni// rin po che ste dag gi dbang gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa thal mi sbyor nas
113b3(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun du bsnol ba la gung mo bsgreng te tshig bcag nas rtse spyad pa ni pad+mi ste rdo rje gnon po yi'o// lag pa thal mo mnyam par sbya ro te gung mo gnyis nang du mnyam par sbyar te srin lag gnyis bsnol lo mdzus
113b4(rgyud 'grel): mo dang mthi'u chung gnyis sbyar te// mtheb mo gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rdo rje rgya gram s+t+rai dz+nyA na kA ya yi'o// lag pa rgyab sbyar nas ser mo bsnol ta mthe bong mthil du sbyar ba ni 'khor lo sta/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na'i phyag rgya si bum pa blang+ga
113b5(rgyud 'grel): nunas dbang bskur ro// de nas 'khor lo dbang bsgyur ba ni/ oM badz+ra satwa dz+nyA na tsakra hU~M/ de nasaM dung gri dbang bskur ba ni// oM badz+ra shaM ka dz+nyA na s+yAtwa hUM/ de nas gdugs kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ A~M badz+ra d+h+r-i dzA rba tre zhes pas//
113b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin bya// gtor ma gtong nas dkyil 'khor bsdu'o// bdag gis 'di byas dge bas ni// thams cad 'bras bu thob par shog/ shar nas lho ru za har yul du ni// zla dang 'od kyis gang ba
114a1(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan la// gnyis su med cing sbas pa'i don la mkhas// chos kyi dam pa de nyid dpal du byung // chos kyi dam pa bzang gi gdams ngag 'di// rin chen lta bur 'grel pa rnam gnyis thos// de
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs dngos grub 'bras bu thob gyur nas// thams cad bla med kun su 'dren gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya slob dpon gnyis med sbas pas mdzad pa
114a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tri drang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ur+ya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu shrI ta tA sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
114a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i 'ching gcod po'i// sdug bsngal gcod la phyag 'tshal nas//
114a5(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi rim pa yang dag don// dran nas bdug gis rab tu bshad// re shig yid 'ong gnas dag tu// bde ba'i stan lo nye 'dug ste// mchod cing stong nas sdig bshags byA// tshad med bzhi ni rab tu bsgom// oM ma
114a6(rgyud 'grel): hA shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sr-ib+h+rUM wa~M a d+hi ga ta zhes bsgom mo// dang por bdag nyid me bsgos s+ho// baM las pad+ma 'dab ma no// chos 'byung rdo rje'i nang du bsgri me// bdag zhid zla ba'i steng thos mi mo// de la mi sdug
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa ni// sku mdog mthing ka'i 'gying brag can// rdo rje ut+pal brtan pa'i sku// zla bu'i steng na a bsam mo// 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng na ni// a A a aHtshad myed bzhi ldan yum bzhi ni// 'gying bag ut+pal bcas pa'i
114b2(rgyud 'grel): sku// rdo rje skyil krung mdun bdar nas// go rims bzhin du rab tu bsam// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas// sku gsum byin brlab dbang bskur ro// de nas don dang rabye ldan pas// mtshan rnams rab tu brjod par bya//
114b3(rgyud 'grel): ai duHkhats+tshe da/ na maHsu bA ra da badz+ra gra bud+d+ha ko Ti nA mo stu taM/ na mo s+t+waM shu n+yA ta ga pra/ bud+d+ha bA tra nA mas+t+rai hoHde nas ldang bar 'dod na muHdang baTasaM pas gshegasu gsol// dam tshig gis ldang bar bya'o// bcom ldan
114b4(rgyud 'grel): drag gi dbang phyug ni// rin chen ut+pal gi spyir gyi mdog/ pad+ma 'dab bezhi zla ba'i steng // rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// pang bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni// a a ai A yum bzhi'o// spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas na
114b5(rgyud 'grel): byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no// oM wA grI shwa ra bu dA ra ga na mo s+yA s+thA/ bu drA rA ga nA mau nA ma/ br-i d+yA pr-i ti nA ma/ bu d+yA b+h+yAM dut+tA ni ma/ muHzhes gshegasu gsol nAs sngon lAma~M gyis gnas par bya'o// rdo rje rab
114b6(rgyud 'grel): to 'bar ba'i nang // 'deb bzhi dmar ba'i zla ba'i steng // a las byung ba rnon paM ni// medog dmar pad+ma ut+pal bsnams// rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng // 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni// a a aM a yu mo bzhi ni// 'gyi
115a1(rgyud 'grel): bag gtso bo lA phyogs pa'o// spyan drung mchod dang bstimA b+has naso// oM badz+ra tIk+ShA/ bud+d+ha nA mya/ bud+d+ha s+thi ta su tra b+hA nA ma/ bud+d+ha b+ha tsa nA ma sres+thA/ pu drA tsa ta na mo nA ma zhes brjod nas muHzhes
115a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o// shes rab rang bzhin stong pa'i nang // snyingangaM rjes mtshon po'i gnan bsams te/ byang chub sems kyi sa bon te// shes rab ye shes a las bskyed//
115a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po rab tu mdzes// 'khor lo ut+pal yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bosems// 'dab pazhi zla ba'i steng du ni// A a aM a yum bzhi
115a4(rgyud 'grel): ba sgom// pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza ma ga sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a lo ke te pU dza me gre sa mu
115a5(rgyud 'grel): dra s+pha ra nu sa ma ye hUM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gAn+d+ha pU dza mA g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta no wi te pU dza me ga sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta shap+ta pU dza me ga sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
115a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes mchod nas dza hUM baM hoHzhes bsti ma// oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wa/ dz+nyA na murti/ wA gi rishwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ta mA laM su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garba a/ zhes brjod nas
115b1(rgyud 'grel): rlargya na sang dag par brjod pa gangon par bya'o// oM pradz+nyA dz+nyAn+ta mut+tA ye a ba bod+d+ha ba nam+bo s+yAs+thA/ b+hA n+yA mA s+yA b+hU dA sa b+hA la/ gA g+hAn b+hA b+hA na mo s+yA b+h+ya/ nA ma stA d+hA mA sa b+hA bA zhes bstung nas smra// nas brjod nas/
115b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o// shes rab kyi ni hUM la me baM skyeng // snying rje ma chags pad+ma'i gdan// byang chub sems las byung ba'i stong // a nr-i rab tu gsal bar bya// ye shes smra ni ljang guste// rgyu grAm u
115b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa yi// sems bsnod sa bon te// rdo rje skyil mo klung du zhugs// 'ad ba 'di nu pa'i snodan ni// A sa a suM ma pa ni bskyed// swaM shaMs+yai gnyis med po snum byas na ma// b+hin brlabs dbong basmA dz+nyAH
115b4(rgyud 'grel): bdeng // n+ta ni yang dgu brjod par bya// de nas skyong ba 'di bstod do// oMd+hi r+yA k+Sh+ma la/ s+ye m+b+ha re lA nA myAts+tsha d+hA/ nAm na/ nAm swAH seM / nAk+ShA ya ni mo 'as spyod lam
115b5(rgyud 'grel): sa shis la / trA~M d+hA ga sa na spyod san sa// thom par shig pa na
115b6(rgyud 'grel): hU~M ma nga / dzin kyis rgya sa rkyen shing du/ nimi coM N+Di to/ bad nang du/
116a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor byas pa// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// de la drang po sngags pa ni/ rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson// rnyed dang bkur sti ma chags sems// sems can don dag
116a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya// dang por sa'i cho ga dang sta gon cho ga t+ya ste/ rang yid du 'ong ba'i sa'i thig gdab ste// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab khung rgyar khru gang zab su de'i khru phyed pa kha khyer sor bzhi byi dor bya// nang du pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan pa// byug
116a3(rgyud 'grel): po dang dri dang me tog dkar pos brgyan pa// mtshams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa// kha khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o// shin tu sar pa'i ras kyis g.yog par bya// de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg dang mam shing bud shing dad dgang gzar
116a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bshams te// mchod rdzas g.yon du bzhag sreg rdzas g.ya su gzhag/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mar ni mdun// de nas bsod nams tshogs bsags la// tshad med bzhi ldan sems bskyed bya'o//
116a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// oM a b+ha wa swa b+hA wa badz+ra tsakra a A aM aH/ de nas bdag nyid lha ru bskyed// spyan drang byin brlabs dpang bskur bya// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal// de nas raM las me'i dkyil
116a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o// gzi brjid chen po 'ong gsal ba// zhes pas de nas a las me lho ni// sku mdog dkar po tshangs pa'i gzugs// dbyug pa bgrang phreng 'dzin par bskyed// spyan drangs mchod
116b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod byas nas bstim// bum pa'i chu yis bgegs bskrang bya// de nas mar ni dgang blugs gsum// me lha nyid la dbul bar bya'o// me mtshan ngan na spobs pa bya// de nas mchod rdzas dbul bya zhing // sreg rdzas phul nas bstod
116b2(rgyud 'grel): pa byaM// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal zhes pa ni// de nas thugs khar pho brang ba tsa la// bgegs la sogs pa gong bzhin bya// srog rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul// gdags pa zhi ba shAn+tiM // sprin dkar drag pa bzhin
116b3(rgyud 'grel): du dkar// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// de nas bum pa'i chus bsangs la// sreg rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul// nga gang blugs gnyis kyang dbul bar bya// de nas phrin las bcol bya zhing // bstod pa'i rim pa gzhu
116b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bstod// rtsa sngags muHdang bcas pas gshegs// bdag gis dge ba 'di brtsams pas// dge ba dri med gang thob des// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// rje btsun 'jam dbyangs thob par shog/ 'pha
116b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal gyi sbyin sreg slob dpon mya ngan med pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// @#// rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu shrI A dA bud+d+ha sA d+ha nA ma/ bod ska du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po
116b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// thog ma bar dang thar sangs rgyas// srid pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i sku// dang po'i sangs
117a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la gtud nas// snying po bsdus pa'i mtshan rgyud las// ye shes lnga'i sgrub thabs 'di// ma rig 'phrul pa spangs pa'i phyir// gsung gi sgrub thabs gsal phyir bri// gnas khang yid du 'ong bar ni//
117a2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i bstan la nyer 'dug ste// tshad med bzhi po bsgoms byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// a b+hA wA swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsakre a AM oM aHde nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las// a hUM las byung
117a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo rgyal po zhalo drug ldan// mI dpung 'bar ba dang bcas po// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje bskyed par bya// dang po yi ni dbyangs yig las// thabs drang shes rA pa rang bzhin gyi// ya
117a4(rgyud 'grel): shes mig cig e yau nang // nyon mongasau dri med pad+ma'o// dang po'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i// paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i nang // rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan
117a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rdo rje gnon po rang bzhin zhal// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// rnam dag shes rab ye shes zhal// slu ba'i skyes mchog dam pa yi// bcom ldan sdug
117a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gcod pa'o zhal// stabs dang ldan pa smra ba'i rgyal// gsung dbyangs rdo rje chos kyi zhal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// rdo rje zab mo sku'i zhal// smra ba'i sing+ge nyon mongs sol// kha dog so so mtshungs med
117b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal// kun tu bltas pa mchog tu dga'// sku ni gzi brjid phung po yis// mtshan dang dpe byang lta nu sdug/ 'od bzang rin chen 'bar ba ste// g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi pro ti 'dzin// g.yA ba yi ni phyag bzhi yis// 'od
117b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i ral gri 'phyar// sman pa che mchog gzhon nu'i sku// ljon pa'i shing dang btsos pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun sku lho'i bdag nyid can// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung che ba// rtsib
117b3(rgyud 'grel): mu khyung gsung yang yin// a badz+ra tik+tA nub tu'o// duHkhits+tshing shwar du'o// pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye dbus su'o// wa gi shwa ra lho ru'o// dz+nyA na kA ya byang du ste/ e ni dbus su dkar po'o// pa ni shar du mthing ka'o// tsa ni lbo
117b4(rgyud 'grel): ru ser po'o// ra ni nub tu dmar po'o// na ni byang du ljang gu'o// gsal byed dang ni dbyings yig ni// mu khyud bzhi la bsam pa ste// de ltar shes rab 'khor lo'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi
117b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs la gnas// rdo rje nyi ma shes rab // rdo rje zla ba thabs kyi bya dag/ chags dang chags bral yig 'bru mchog/ khwa dog sna tshogs 'bar bu'i 'ong // aM pra kr-i tA pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA naM/
117b6(rgyud 'grel): kA ya/ many+dzu shrI mu pa ta ye ti a/ a A i I u U e ai o o aM aHsIste hr-i ti dz+nyA na murti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+ha ni/ d+yu tA brti na~M/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe swA hA/ oM badz+ra A la~M ka swA hA/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he swA hA/ oM badz+ra ne&te
118a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM badz+ra shap+ta swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA gu tA hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hri/ b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti wA gi shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri
118a2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ de ltar bskyed nas bsgom par bya'o// de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na duHkhAts+tshe nga/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA nA kA ya/ wA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma/ da ni
118a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon nas brjod pa ni// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu ni mkha'i mthas gtugs par// chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// 'gro dang 'dug pa
118a4(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// de ltar bsgoms nas mtshan brjod do// gtor ma phul nas gshegasu gsol// bdag nyid spyod lam gnas par bya'o// mong rgyud snying po'i don las ni// man
118a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag la brten gzhung 'di brtsams// de yi bsod nams gang bstsags pa// 'gro rnams 'jam dbyangs thob par shog/ slob dpon a wa d+hU tis mdzad pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs rdzogaso//
118a6(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten bsgrub pa'i chog mdor bsdus pa sab tu tis ya dza pa brdzun /
119b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsa do sA d+ha bany+tsi tri ta/ bod skad du/ mchod rten gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga mngon bsdus pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tsha lA lI// chos nyid dang bsdus rtog pa'i dri ma bral//
119b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin yongs dag yon tan ldan pa'i sku// thugs rjes sbrul sku 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sku gsum ye shes mchod pa'i rten la 'dud // de dron 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// rgyud don la rten bdag gis brtsam// mchod
119b3(rgyud 'grel): cing brjod pa drang srong che// sa rnams kun gyi rgyun ldan bskyed// cesuM bya ba ni sna blang zhing byin gyis brlab pa bstan nas/ kong bu byin gyis brlab cing gdab pa ni// shes rab chen po'i skad cig la// chos kun khong /
119b4(rgyud 'grel): du chud pa 'chang // zhes bya bas thabs dang shes rab gnyis byin gyisau brlabo// au badz+ra tik+Shi duHkhats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murti ya dz+nyA na kA yaM wA gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na a/ zhes d+ya bAsA gdab po// btab pa de ji ltar zhe na//
119b5(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzung // brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rgyud kun gyi sna ni bdag po mchog/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gnas// mchod
119b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu rim gro smon lam gdab// rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa 'bras bu chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid// ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sku bum pa na 'od dang bcas pa/ sems can rgyud smin pa 'od
120a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba bsam mo// dge ba dri med gang thob des// 'gro kun sku gsum thob par shog/ a ba dU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/
120a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rigs gsum bdag po ye shes sku// rje btsun 'jam dpal phyag 'tshal
120a3(rgyud 'grel): te// de nyid rjes dran cho ga bshad/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lugs nyid kyis// gang zhig yang dag mngon dbang bskur// rjes gnang thob pa'i sgrub pa po// deng 'dir yid la gnas drag tu// bde po'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ gshin
120a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dgra 'am zhal drug la// khro bo'i rgyal pos bsrung bar bya// oM hriM kA la rU pa hUM kha hUM swA hA/ a ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ de nas gshin rje gshed po'i sngags// oM AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis// mchod pa rnams kyis yang ngag mchod
120a5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang bsgom// de nas chos kunau dngos medA paR+Sha// rang gi blo yos rnam par bsgom// oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma ya tu ta/ sarba te thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu pa ta ye ti//
120a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas thams cad stong pa las// paM las byung ba pad+ma las// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor a las byung // de dbus yi ge a dkar las skyes pa// rnam par snang mdzad che mchog zhi ba sku mdog dkar// bying chub mchog
120b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mnyam par 'dzin// sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs bdag nyid bsgom// de'i thugs khar d+hi las byung ba yi// pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnam par bsam par bya// gdong lnga gtsug phung lnga dang ldan// zur phung
120b2(rgyud 'grel): po me tog thong // dang po sangs rgyas de'i thugs khar yang // shes rab 'khor lo nyes kun sel ba bsgom// pad+mor gyur pa 'khor lo de dbus su// ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom par bya// s+thi ste hr-i tI dz+nyA na murti ra
120b3(rgyud 'grel): haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ t+yA tA brti naM/ zhes bya ba dang / lte ba dang bcas mu khyud nang ma gnyis// de nAs rtsibs rnams rim par ldan pa la// nga nas yang ni phye'o muM khyud gnyis// de la rtsa ba'i la sogs rim bzhin da / // ye shes sems
120b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' pad+ma zla bar gnas// de steng rdo rje skyil krung legs bzhugs pa// phyag gnyis ting 'dzin phyag rgya ut+pal mtshan// de stang shes rab po tis gnyis kha brgyan// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo'i 'ong ni shas
120b5(rgyud 'grel): cher dmar// cod pan bzang po thon ko'i rtse// sgyu mchog thonra ka chen po can// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// zhes pa'o// oM sarba d+harmA b+ha wA/ swa b+hA wA/ bi shud+d+ha badz+ra a A a a
120b6(rgyud 'grel): nang gi mu khyud mchog la'o// a A i I u U e aM o oM aM aHphyi rol ma la'o// de nas 'khor lo rtsibs drug la shar nas brtsams te sngags kyi rgyal po drug drug go/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha
121a1(rgyud 'grel): au hUM hI/ b+ha ga waM/ dz+nyA na murti wa gi shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harma gA ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHmu khyud phyi rol ma la'o// de'i phyi rol ka la sogs pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa
121a2(rgyud 'grel): dadagu pa la sogs pa'o// oM AHhUM/ de nas mngon par dbang bskur te// mi bskyod pas nI nga bu brgyan pa'o// ye shes sems dpe'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ slar bsdu bar bya'o// dngos po thams cad
121a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi de kho na lhag par rtogs pas chos thams cad la yang 'jim pa'i dpal du byed cing / 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying ke'i ye shes sems dpa' dang mnyam par sbyor
121a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing sngags kyi tshig gi ming ngag gdon no// oM AHhUM muHslar yang khro bo gnyis gang yang rung bas bsrungs la langs te/ phyi rol du a kA rau la sogs pas gtor ma sbyin no// 'di ltar dus gsum du ste/ rnal 'byor
121a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hi dus mya yin par ni 'jam pa'i dpal gyi sngags gong 'dod pa bzlas pa 'am/ mchod rten bya zhing bskor ba lnga sogs par bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrib thabs mya dran meng pa'i dpal gyis mdzod
121a6(rgyud 'grel): pardzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwe shI ri/ lots+tsha ba 'a zha rgyo gar brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// badz+ra tik+Sh+Na da mar/ du khats+tshe nga s+pho/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na muN+Do ye da kar/ dz+nyA na ka ya ljang wa gi
121b1(rgyud 'grel): re ser/ a ra pa tsa na dkar/ i ti// / @#rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya bA/ 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo//
121b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu khros shing gdug pa 'dul// ma lus log pa'i bdud 'dul ba// zhal dang phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// ma hi'i zhal la phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub pa'i rim pa zhig/ bdag gris dran nas brtsam par bya// dang por yid/
121b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun pa'i gnasu bdag nyid khrus byas te stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba dzA la dzA la hUM/ zhes pas lus bsrungs nas/ bla mA dkon mchog la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bsha
121b4(rgyud 'grel): pA la sogs pa bya'o// oM a b+hA l+yA swa b+hA wa biM shud+d+ha badz+ra tsakra a AHaM aHzhes bya bas stong pa nyid sgom mo// de nas bdag nyid yi ge Ar gnas pa las de'i 'od zer gyis tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi steng du
121b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla'i steng du oM zhu ba ut+pal 'khor los mtshan po de zhu ba las bcom ldan 'das 'dzem pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na ut+pal 'dzin pa/ gzhon nu'i cha lugs lnga rgyan gyis /
