148b4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// rlung du glu ma sku mdog dmir// paM wang brdung ba'i mchog yin no// dbang ldan gar ma rdo rje ni// rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do// bdug pa me trog mar me dri// spos khang me tog phreng ba dang /
148b5(rgyud 'grel): mar mo dri yi dung chos bsnams// sku mdog sgeg mo la sogs bzhin// de yi phyi rol dkyil 'khor du// sems can kun don byed bdag nyid// dpag med gzi brjid rnyad dka' ba'i// gang 'di byang chub sems
148b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams// sku la mdzes shing nyer zhi ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig po// pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung gos legs zhugs// mgon po byams pa la sogs pa// rin chen cod pan
149a1(rgyud 'grel): snang bar bsgom// de la byams pa phyag g.yas kyis// mchod sbyin dpung rgyan mdzes pa dang // gnyis pa phyag gnyis klu shing ni// mdzes pa yang dag bsnams pa yin// 'jam dbyangs
149a2(rgyud 'grel): phyug na ral gri ni// rin po che yi mdzes pa bsnams// chos kyi sbyin pa rjes byed pa'i// gzhan gyi shes rab po ti bsnams// spos kyi glang po gsal byed pa// dri yi dung chos bstims pa dang // g.yas pa'i phyag
149a3(rgyud 'grel): gi mchod sbyin dang // spyi bor 'od dpag meng rol ldan// ye shes rtog ces bya ba ni// thod kyis mtshan pa'i cod pani bsnams// zla rgyas rnam par mdzes pa yis// bzhi po dri ma med pa'i 'od// gti mug mun pa
149a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ni// 'joms par byed pa shar gyi yin// dpale ldan bzang skyong zhes bya ba// sku mdog gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i// rin chen 'bar ba lho phyogasu// / nor bu rgyal mtshan phag na bsnams// phyag g.yon de bzhin
149a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' yi// mdzod ni rgyo cher snang ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gser gyi mdog/ phyog gnyis bskal pa bzang po yi// dpag bsdam shing dang bum po bzang // sems can don mchog 'dzin pa yin// blo gros mi bzang phyag
149a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis// po tis mtshan pa'i ral gri bsnams// spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du// phyag na ral gri mtshan pa yin// gshin rje'i phyogasu bzhugs pa rnams// sku mdog sar po 'od zer ldan// byang chub phun tsho
149b1(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa'i// 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan// mthu chen thob pa ra lA gI dang // rgyal mtshan drag gis legs par dargyan// dran song kun 'drenA zhes bya ba// dpal be'u 'dzin cing byams par byed// mya ngan kun
149b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms blo gros ni// phyag na g.yu drung 'khyil pa bsnams// zla bas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang // dri lta bu'i sgra yi rnam pa yis// mtshon ma'i gdugs ni 'dzin pa dang // dman pa dga' ba phun tshegs pa'i// skyed pa'i lus kyi
149b3(rgyud 'grel): dA ba can// pad+ma ge sor ltar dmar ba// nub kyi phyogasu zhugs pa'o// zla 'od gzhon nu gsal ba yin// pi tis mtsham pa ral gri bsnams// skyil ldan rin chen mdzod chen po// 'od dpag med ni bsnams po yin// nam mkha'i
149b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po phyag giyas kyis// rin po che ni bteg nas bsnams// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon na bsnams// mya ngan thams cad sel ba yin// byang gi
149b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad sku mdog lding gu yin// yang na thams cad rims bzhin du// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang // rin+d+ra po che dang chu skyes dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa dang // ji ltar rong gi
149b6(rgyud 'grel): phyophyag rgyas mtshan// phyag g.yon dril bu bsnams pa yin// 'di rnams rim bzhin sngags kyis ni// nyon mongs ma lus sel ba yin// oM me tri ya saM hA ra na ye swA hA// oM many+dza shrI ye swA hA/ oM tri gan+d+ha ha ti ye swA hA/
150a1(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+nyA na ke tu ye swA hA/ oM ba tra la ye swA hA/ oM sta ka ra ma ti ye swA hA/ oM ak+Sha ye hri/ Ak+Sha ya karma a pa ra na bi shud+d+ha ne swA hA/ oM pa te ba na kun+te hUM swA hA/ oM swa mi mu hA swa me ba d+hi swA hA/ oM A kar+ya swA hA/
150a2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ku sha tra ner+b+ba ta na d+hi hU~M swA hA/ oM dz+wa li na ma hA dz+wa le ni hU~M swA hA/ oM tsan+ta su tsan+ti tsan+de byA ba la ki na swA hA/ oM a mi tA b+hU to hUM swA hA/ oM kha AM ka sha g+harba ya swA hA/ oM sarba ne pe ra ni bi shrI ne swA hA/ rdo rje hUM mdzod dbang
150a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du// sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa// dang po khri zhing sgeg pa dang // g.yas pa drag po 'jigs rung dang // de las gzhan pa dpa' ba dang // steng gi zhal ni rngam pa yin// snying khar khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi// phyag
150a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa// rgyab tu sbyar nas mthe'u chung gnyis// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni legs par sbyar// g.yas na ra la gri lcags kyu mda'o//
150a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang sbrul zhogs rdo rje g.yen// de yi zhabs kyi skrod pa yis// d+h+r-ig skye po dbang phyug chen po'i dang // u ma'i ni ma g.yas pa yi// zhabs kyis gnon pa bzhugs pa yin// rdo rje me ltar 'beR+Sha ba ni// mi thung
150a6(rgyud 'grel): dud pa'i mdog cano// g.yas na rdo rje ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon na dril bu zhags pa gzhu// ba dan sna tshogs g.yon pas brgyan// khe T+wAM ga yi g.yeng ka yi// sgra yis phyogs kun
150b1(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa dang // khyab 'jug chung mar bcas pa la// g.yas brkyang pa'i dga' bas bzhugs// 'khrul pa rnam par dag ngo bo// de ni spangs pa'i mchog yino// de bzhin bden bral mtsham su ni// dpal ldan dpa'o/
150b2(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung rgyalo// dang po'i zhal ni drag po dang // g.yas zhal dga' ba'i rgyal pa dang // steng ma za bar byed pa dang // g.yon pa mchog tu sgeg par gnas// 'bar ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs khA T+wAM sgeg pa dang /
150b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed lpags dmar rlon pa rim par ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis mnga' dang gzhu// phyag gnyis kyis ni khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams// g.yas rkyang zhibs kyis 'dzegs byang chung
150b4(rgyud 'grel): mar bcas pa mnan// 'gro ba'i byed po keng rus rgyan dang ska rags dang / sangs rgyas mtshun ma nang gnas pa'i// thod pa lnga yi cong panra gsal// bgegs tshogs ma lus rangs byed pa'i// sprin nag po yi sku
150b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang bya/ rnam par drag byed mgon po yis// phreng ba rus pa'i dum bu yis// sbrul nag po'i ngo bos ni// 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba yin// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba'i mi bzung sgeg pa'i spyod pa dang // chags dang
150b6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba spong bas sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'chang ba yin// mang po ji ltar gcig yin gcig tu rtogs nas gzhan pa yin// de yang skye ba de nyid dngos kun bdag po nyid kho na// rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa mya ngar 'das mcho
151a1(rgyud 'grel): yin// 'od zer 'bar ba dpal ldan khrag mthung ye shes phyag rgya yin// rlung gi phyogs kyi rta mchog ni// de ni zhabs bzhir yang dag ldan+da// spyan gsum khro bo sgeg pa yis// gtso bo'i zhal gsum
151a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa ni// drag po g.yon pa tshangs pa ni// rta gdong ste ma ljang gu'o// ba dan sum ldan g.yas pa ni// steng du slong bar byed pa'i tshul// ral gri mda' ni 'dzin po gzhan// thod pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang // mdung thung dang
151a3(rgyud 'grel): ni dbyig pa dang // bzhi ni g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi la'o// g.yas kyi gtso bo'i zhabs kyis ni// dpal mo dbang mo gzhan gyis ni// chags ma dga' ma mnan pa yin// ting 'dzin reg pa thob byang yin// g.yon gyi dbang pa myos
151a4(rgyud 'grel): byed dang // myos dang brgyal byang de bzhin du// rje su 'dzin par byed pu dang // 'di yis rta skad 'tsher pa yis// bdud rnams snying ni 'gas pa dang // spros pas byang chub 'gro bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag 'bar ba yis// dus
151a5(rgyud 'grel): mimatha'i mi yis kun khyab dang // spro zhing gyen du 'bar ba'o// gtsug gi nor bus gsal ba'i sgra// aM suM b+ha ni su b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pA ya hUM/ A nu ya ho b+ha ga bAM bI d+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lAr+m+ma hUM/
151a6(rgyud 'grel): oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM mu ta pany+tsa ka hU~M phaT/ oM suM b+ha ne suM b+ha hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba rgyal po'i sras kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gang gi se mos kyi spro ba 'jug pa yini// lha yi dbang po mchod pa byed pa 'od/
151b1(rgyud 'grel): thos pa'i lam du spong bas spos chu'i char 'bebs pas// 'jig rten kun gyi sdig pa'i me dpung zhi bar byed// de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni// phyi rol dbang ldan la sogs nas// brtsams nas cho ga bzhin bltas nas// mchod pa
151b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rnal 'byor rgyal// sngags ni dang por phyag 'tshal dang // swA hA'i mtha' can gzi brjid che// bzhi pa'i mtha' can rang rang min// dbus su de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// spyi bor thal mo
151b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jog pa yin// mdog dang phyag la sogs pa dgau/ chung ma rang rang bdag po mtshungs// rtse gsum thong pa 'dzin pa dang // phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// cod pa nau ral gri khyu mchog gdan// lho mo nye bar gnas pa'ang yin
151b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pad+ma phreng ba dgo/ tshangs pa'i spyi bo thal mo sbyar// mdog ser zhal bi we dang pa'i gdan// phyag gnyis dbyug po spyi blugs bsnams// phyag gnyis 'khor lo dang bcas dung // mgo laM legs bcing thal mo sbyar
151b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag mda' gzhu be con bsnams// mkha' lding gadran la be'us mtshan// 'di dag 'khor dang btsos pa ni// shau rtsi dpa' bo gser glang po// gro shin rje ma he'i gdan la bzhugs// nag po dbyug pa mdung thung bsnams//
151b6(rgyud 'grel): chu lha chu srin steng du ni// dkar po dung dang sbrul zhags 'dzin// g.yas g.yon lcags kyu dbyug to dang // lus ngan ser po mi la bzhugs// phyag gnyis phreng ba blags gzar dang // spyi bor thal sbyar me lha ni// mdog ser ra
152a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dag la bzhugs// dbyug pa gun+d+he 'dzin pa'o// bden bral mi ro'i gdan la bzhugs// ral gri dang ni phug 'dzin pa'o// rlung lta ba ngan bsnams pa dang // ri dgas gdan la sngo bsangs mdog/ khyu mtsho//
152a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas dbang ldan ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar pa 'tshang // rtse gsum thong 'dzin kha dog dkar// 'di kun 'khor la phyogs pa'o// pad+ma nyi ma 'chang ba ni// nyi ma stag gi gang na la bzhugs// zla ba ngang pa la gnas pa// dkar
152a3(rgyud 'grel): po zla ba chu skyes bsnams// mig dmar mdog dmar pad+ma'i gradan// g.yas pa'i lag gis chu gri dang // de las gzhan pa mi mgo za// pad+ma la gnas gza' lag ni// mdog ser mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// bla ma dkar
152a4(rgyud 'grel): po che skyes god na// phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs bsnams// de bzhin pa ba sangasu spen pa// mdog nAg rus sbrul la gnas pa// lag nA dbyug pa thogs pa'o// sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma thogs// mjug rings ral gri zhags pa
152a5(rgyud 'grel): so// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor bud med gzugs// lha mo'i rnam par mdzes pa yin// spyi bo thal mo sbyar ba ru/ bsgom bya sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkar po dang po bzhi pa dang // drug pa bdun pa'ang de bzhino//
152a6(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa dang ni bcu pa dang // bcu gsum pa'ang de bzhin// bco lnga pa dang bco brgyad pa// nyi shu gnyis pa'ang de bzhin no// nyi shu gcig dang nyi shu dgu/ nyi shu brgyad pa'ang de bzhi no// sngo sangs dag ni gsum pa dang //
152b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lnga dang brgyad pa dang // bcu gcig pa dang bcu drug pa// de nas yang ni bcu bdun pa// nyi shu nyi shu gsum pa dang // nyi shu bzhi pa 'ang de bzhin no// ljang gu dag ni gnyis pa dang // bdun pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// bcu
152b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcu dgu nyi shu la// nyi shu drug pa'ang ser po ni// gzhon nu gser gyi mdog can la// gdong drug rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs// mdung thung rdo rje dril bu dang // khyim bya dag ni phyag na bsnams// glang sna dkar po lag
152b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa// sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs 'chang zhing // la tu la phugI tri shu la// de bzhin du ni gri khug thogs// byi pa la gnas neg po ni// dga' byed rtswa rnga brdung b.ro byed// rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin par ni// nag po ma hA ka/
152b4(rgyud 'grel): lar grags// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa yis// b+h+ring gi ri ti di bzhin mchod // tshangs ma dang ni go cha mo// drag po dbang mo gzhon nu ma// ring gi bdag po ji bzhin no// yi dwags la gnas phag mo ni// mdog nag
152b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la thod pa 'chang // mdog dam+bAr mche ba gtsigs pa yi// yi dwags gdan la gnas pa ni// chu gri dang ni thod pa dag/ de ni gtum mo yis ni 'dzin pa yin// mkha' lding rkang paM pus mo'i bar// dkar sar de nas lte
152b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar// de nas mgrin pa nyi ma'i mdog/ kha ni mig sman nag po'i mdog/ stobs bzang glang po la gnas pa// ral gri gshol 'dzin dkar po yin// rgyal bar byed pa kha dog ldang // khu byug shing rta la gnas pa/
153a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng dang mnga' gzhu dang // kham phor lag na thog pa yin// sbrang rtsir byed pa kha dog dkar// ne tso la gnas kham par dang // mda' gzhu chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams// dpyid lha skal ldan mdzes
153a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// dre'u la gnas kha dog dkar// mnga' dang gzhu dang khamra phor dang // ral gri de ni 'dzin pa yi ni// sbrul gyis bdun bdun ldan pa'i klung // thal mo sbyar pa byas nas 'dug/ mtha' yas rigs ldan mdog dmar po// dr-i
153a3(rgyud 'grel): ze'i rigs te me las skyes// rgyal rigs dbang chen las skyes ser// dung skyong dang ni nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni pad+ma cha// nag po rje'u rigs rlung las skyes// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni// dmang rigs dkar po chu las
153a4(rgyud 'grel): // stobs bzangs dang ni thags bzang rigs// rab dgar dang ni rnam snang mdzad// khrab dang ge cha ral gri dang // pu pa dang g.yul la 'jug po yin// gser gyi mdog nan bu dang bcas// gter ni spro ba'i phyogs
153a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// gnod sbyin bdag po nA ku lA// sa bon grong khyer 'dzin pa yi// nor bu bzung po / ser gyi mdog/ gang ba bzang po sngon po yin// nor sbyin kha dog dmar po yin// de bzhin rnam thos sras ser po// rtse gcig
153a6(rgyud 'grel): thun dang kha dog dmar// ki li mi lo de bzhin gnas// sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po ni// ser po rgyud mang rdung ljon pa// chung ma dang bcas dkar ba ni// gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin no// bdag gi don kun grub pa dang //
153b1(rgyud 'grel): don med thams cad sel ba'o// rtsa bzhin rnyed bla'i thar pa ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bstan las yin// dkyil 'khor 'di yi 'khor lo yi// ming tsam yang ni rnyed par dka'// slu ba chu bur snying po med pa yi// 'khor ba chos
153b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rin chen ldan// skal ldan 'ga' zhig nyid 'dir ni// mtho ros 'dod pa de las thob// 'ga' zhig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang // de las mya ngan 'das mchog yin// de las snying po snying po mchog/ bsgrubs pa'i byang chub
153b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams// bde gshegs kun gyis gang gsungs pa'i// zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams 'thob// yon tan de las kyang 'byung ba// 'di ltar de la mchod pa rnams// mchod dang bzhugs gsol dga' ba dang // tI nge 'dzi/
153b4(rgyud 'grel): la mnyam gnas gzhan// mtshungs med mchod pa byed pa dag/ des ni ting 'dzin thams cad 'grub// 'di ni mchod dang mchod byed pa// lha mchog rnams kyis de mchod yin// dga' chen rgya mtsho rlabs kyis ni// 'jig rten
153b5(rgyud 'grel): bsil bar byed pa yin// mched dang bsnyen bkur bcas pa dang // sna tshogs bkod pa'i khyad par ldan// da ni na mkhar byed pa 'di// de skad cig gis ni ngo mtshar rtogs// gzhan dang gzhan ni grangs med spro// nam
153b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' shin tu rgya chen po// mchod pa'i sprin ni khyab pa yi// rin chen me tog sogs char gyis// dpag bsam shing rgyas skyed mos tshal// gnas 'di 'byor pa'i bdag nyid 'di// 'di ltar sngon med sna tshogs ba
154a1(rgyud 'grel): yongasu bzung nas spro bar bya// dang bas snying ga'i byang rgyus pa'i// bde pa'i dpa ldan 'byung ba'i gnas// skrag pa'i ro yis bcus pa yis// rab tu spros pa rgyas pa yin// de dus yun ring gnas
154a2(rgyud 'grel): yaM// drag po'i byang chub sems dri ni// lus las ba sgo ldang ba dang // rdo rje mchog ni skye ba yin// sgros lha'i me tog rgyas tshogs kyis// gnas kun sbyini b+hi dra bas byung // sa tshogs ro myong ba'i//
154a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mi g.yo 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs 'bor ba'i gnas 'di no// mchog gi mthu yis rgyas par spyong bzang po// pi wang rje rnga rje rings la sogs mnyam 'astsogs pa
154a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni mchog yin no// nyon mongs dri ngan rnam par spong byed gror 'byung ba'i// phyag rgya rgyun gyi sgeg pas lhuni skyes rje su~M bai d+yA// lha mo phyag gis pad+ma rnam par 'jug pa yasarAng /
154a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed// rgod dang lha dang lag bcangs dang ni gnyis gnyis khyod// mthong ba brjod rtsi dam bya de ba gtso ba yin// pad+ma zhig 'di ni phyag rgyu'i thabs ni chen po yi// 2/ bu 'ams su
154a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar cho ga ngo mtshar chen po'i gnas sna tshogs// phun tshogs sgeg pa'i rgyas po nyams myong 'byung // dkyil 'khor bdag po nas brtsams dkyil 'khor lta// 'khor la grangs pang rnam par 'byung ba yin//
154b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar so sor bdud rtsi dpag med de 'di rgyas pa las// lhan skyes yon tan brgya 'gyur gnas pa yin// des na 'di ltar phan tshun lhag par skyes pa yis// khyad 'phags kun gyis ma byas chos ro 'byung ba
154b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// 'di ltar sgrub pa dge ba rab 'byam bdag nyid ni// gang zhig rang bzhin rtogs po'i rang bzhin no// des na de nyid bdud rtsi rgyas kun 'jug pa yin// lhan skyes mi g.yo rtogs pa'i mya ngan 'das// mchod
154b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i so sor ting 'dzin thabs thob po// thog ma med pa'i gter rnams sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags// rig pa dang ni gzhan dag de bzhin nyid stong pa// shes rab byang chub chos dang bdag med ces// 'di 'dra'i
154b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol mchod pa chung gyur kyang // mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchog 'gyur de nyid mthong ba nyid// 'di'i sgrubs pa sems can mchog ni rnyed par dka' ba yin// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las gzhan cis na 'gyur
154b5(rgyud 'grel): gong dag thub pa'i sku gzugs raswA bris glegs bam sogs// de nyid mngon par rlon zhing zhi bar 'dod pa nyid// de nyid phul du gnyis las yun ring nyams par 'gyur// dge ba'i las bral stong pa nyid la dgong
154b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med// mun nag thibs po zla ba'i 'od dang bral ba las// pad+ma rgyas bral kha bas g.yogs pa'i mche bzhin no// rig pa dang bral nor dang dka' thub sred pa dang // thub pa mchong bral de nyid shes pa yis//
155a1(rgyud 'grel): des ni lha rnams dga' bar byed min de su zhig/ des na yon tan nyid thob myin pa de gang zhig/ gang du 'di ma gtogs par 'gro bar gtso bo gang // gang zhig mchod pa'ang de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur//
155a2(rgyud 'grel): chu bo bab pa rgya mtsho'i ngang pa dang // sa la me tog rgyas par 'byung ba dang // nyi ma shar bas don dam bsten pa dang // mchong pa byed pa mchog de'i stobs kyis ni// ngan pas gzhan la gnod pa byas pa las// mi gtsang
155a3(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid cis ni byung mi 'gyur// de'i dag pa'i bdag nyid lag pa las// lha rnams me tog dag ni len pa yin// gang zhig sdig pa spangs pa dang // lan gsum la gnas brtan pa ni// 'jig rten gsum dag 'di dag gi
155a4(rgyud 'grel): bsed nams chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di'i sgra las de las gzhan// phal pa 'di dag 'jug pa yin// 'di gtse nyid du mengon rlom pa// chos kyi lam las ltung ba yin// dam pa'i chos dang glegs bam dag/ mdun
155a5(rgyud 'grel): du so sor byas nas ni// sngar bshad pa yi sngags kyis ni// phyag 'an la mchod pa la sogs bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes yul// sngags kyi bseng nims phung po 'di// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha
155a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sngon du bodon pa'i rim pa yis// lce zla hUM yig la 'byung ba'i// rdo rje dbus su hrIHyig la so// byung ba'i chu skyes dbus ram dza~M// dkar po 'od zer 'khrugs pa las// sngags pas snang ba mtha' yas bskam//
155b1(rgyud 'grel): stags bskul nas ni bzlas pa bya// de la sngags ni 'di yin te// oM pad+ma sa ra satwa satwa prA brta ya shud+d+ha ya/ hUM hri raM dzaM// chos rnams kun la chags med par// sems can thams cad gyur cig ces// bsams nas de'i
155b2(rgyud 'grel): snying po bsel// 'di yi stegs dong dang ldan pa// oM badz+ra bi ga hUM/ sems can rnams kyi dri ma rnams// gsal lo zhes ni rnams bsams nas// 'di yis sngags pa yid gzhug pas// dri ma thams cad bsal bar bya//
155b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sa man+ta pa rik+Sha gu h+ya tsa ri tsa ra hUM/ pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos lhur// 'gro la phan tshun 'grogs par shog/ chags pa med par byung ba'i phyir// sngags pas dag pa rnam bsam bya// oM nerma ni sha d+ha hUM/ rnam pa thams cod
155b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs gcod pa// chos dbyings rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// bsgoms nas gang 'di dkyil 'khor 'di// byung pa sngags pa mkhas pa yin// oM ma hA maN+Da la hUM// rang bzhin stong par bsgoms pa'i bdag kun la chags
155b5(rgyud 'grel): pa med sems kyis// sngags kyi chu yi thig le yis// rang gi spyi bor dbang bskur bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsas ma ya shwa ye hUM/ chos rnams thams cing rang bzhin gyis// gnas pa med par bsgom par bya// bde
155b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sngags pas mchod pa brtsam par bya// oM a mo g+he pad+ma ba sun d+ha ri d+ha ra da re maN+Da hUM// las kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor bdag nyid// de nas ngad pa'i mchod pa brtsam// bgegs mthar byed po 'am
156a1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs 'joms pa// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya phyir mchod// mchod pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad// ji lta bzhin du skyer rigs pas// g.yon pa la gnas dri gzungs dang // g.yas pa la gnas
156a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan g.yon no// drang po la dbul ba bya ba ni// arga'i gnod ni dge byed dang // pad+ma phyag rgya ldan g.yos pas// de la ba ngan gsum pa dag / de nyid shes pas yi ge ni// gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya// aH
156a3(rgyud 'grel): snongad chu thogs pa yis// me tog la sogs bsangs nas ni// me togo la sogs lha mo yis// sngags ni ji lta bzhin du brjod// de nyid mngon sum byas bdag nyid// bsngags pa bla ma mchod par bya// brtul
156a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nyams pA la gzhan du// 'dir ni glang du 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po la sogs rlung dka' ba// gang zhig byin gyis brlabs las thob// 'dir thal mo sbyar byas nas// de'i sngags kyis spyan drang ngo // oM sarba tA
156a5(rgyud 'grel): thA ge ta badz+rAny+tsa li sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i thal mo'i sngagaso// phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// sras bcas 'jig rten rab grags pa// rdo d+hA rin tshan rigs dang ni// pad+ma las kyi rigros de bzhin// snying po
156a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rim pa rnams// lha'i tshigs kyi thams cad dag/ de dag bdag la dgongasu gsol// chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa rnams// bdag ming che ge zhes bya ba// chos dbyings bdag nyid grong khyer ni// de ring dkyil
156b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchod par bgyi// yo byad ci 'byor pa yis mchod// sems can rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// rjesu brtse bas nyer dgongs la// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad par rig sa// oM sar+b+ba
156b2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta bo d+hi satwa pa ri shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba At+ma nAM shud+d+hi saM pU ra ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni smyan 'dren pa'i stag so// mchod cing bsnyen bku bye ba'i pir// de nas bdag nyid dbul byar bya// de la sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA
156b3(rgyud 'grel): ti pU dzA bas+t+raM na l+ye At+ma d+h+r-in+yA tAM ya ma~M/ oM sarba ta thA gI tA pra ti gr-ih+nA two maM/ oM sar+b+bi t+tab+hU gai d+hA d+hI tiSh+ThA t+yA maM/ oM a ma g+has+t+ra nIts+tshu t+te mau// zhes byin gyis brlabya ba'i sngags so// sngags kyi don ni 'di lta bu//
156b4(rgyud 'grel): lhabadag nyid du mchod do// oM sArba ta thA gA tA pU dza badz+ra sa b+hA we At+ma ki&haM/ zhes so// sdug pa mthu mi'i bag gi tshogs// dril bu'i sgra yis bdud tshogs 'joms// sngags kyi grub pa 'dzin pa ni// phyug rgyud
156b5(rgyud 'grel): bo chen po'i tshig/ zhes grub pa'i dpal rdo rje d+histe zlas kyang ni mchodwI pa yin// oM d+h+r-i b+h+ra mo g+ha b+h+rU~M pA la sbyar/ ma d+hu r+yA ne+em+b+ha sha dra ti rA n+yA ra na d+ha// ye shes lha'i bdag nyid cig/ gnyis meng gnyis ji ltar 'gyur/
156b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar rang bzhin spros pa las// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje rtogs pa yi// de nyid blo yi mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+re sa ma ya tiSh+Tha la/ trai d+ha ra ya mi he hi hi hUM/ de la gnas pa 'ga' zhig ni// mchod pa'i
157a1(rgyud 'grel): yang lhug par gus// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas rnams// rang bzhin don ngam yin pa'i phyir// de yang dman dang lhag pa la// sgra yi rdo rjes mchod par bya// dril bu'i sgra ni sgrogs pa
157a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // sngagus dang gdug pa bstod pa dag/ 'don pa rje su sgrogs pa yis// drang pa'i rgya mtsho sna tshogs pa'i// brlabs kyi mgon po mngon dgongs mdzod// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i sngag sngo kyis ni// yang dag 'dus pa
157a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang ngo // dkyil 'khor pa kun rang sngags kyi// de nas bum pa gang ba yis// mgul chings phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'dab ma dang bcas dpal 'bras bu// gsang sngags kyi ni dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra
157a4(rgyud 'grel): kaM hUM/ gang ba'i snod kyis de bzhin mchod// 'gro ba rgyas pa'i ying dga' ba// oM ba tra pu ra ya u mo g+ha ba ti swa min+ta pra ni swA hA/ de nas me tog rgya bcings la// me tog tshwar rgyun 'jug pa yi s+t+waM// spyi bor
157a5(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar byas la// badz+ra ban+d+ha zhes brjod nas// gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na// lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid khyis
157a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dang // chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma luso shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya bo'i phyir ro// phyogs
157b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi
157b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pUl+lo pU dza me g+ha sa mu dA s+pha ra Na sa me ye hUM/ de nas bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// tshul khrims kyi ni bdug pa yis// 'gro ba bdug par gyur cig ces// mkhas pas 'di ltar brjod
157b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bya brag/ lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/
157b4(rgyud 'grel): yongasu gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
157b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cang lo dbul bur bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA gau ta d+h+ye pa pU dza me
157b6(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me phyag rgya snying kha ru// thal mo sbyar lo mthe bo gnyis// mnyam du sgreng bar byas nas ni// 'di ltar 'das pa yang dag pa'i// ye shes khyad par dang ldan pa'o// gang yang
158a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mI rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ rin po che'i 'ong ngam mar me'i snang ba
158a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchong pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang
158a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bor bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga tau A le ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na/
158a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ dri rnams bkod la gar dang ni// dri yi phyog rgya bcings nas ni// dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid la// bltas nas brjod par bya ba ste// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am// gang yang phyogs bcu'i
158a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na// lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ yongasu gyur pa can gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
158a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang
158b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dA s+phu ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal myo spyi bor bzhag nus ni// 'di skad ces ni brjod par
158b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// gang yang 'jig rten khams 'di 'am// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/
158b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po
158b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bogyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni bid+yA ka rat+no lAM kai rA pU dzA me g+he sa mu dra s+pha re Na sa ma ye hUM/ gaR+Sha skor thal sngar spyir bzhag la/
158b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhed pa'i phyag rgya bcing saM nas ni// 'khor ba nung 'khor rnams kyang ni// bzhad pa nyid 'gyur ces brjod lA/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mI rnams kyi rgong po dang sgeg pa dang
158b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang rtse 'dzi bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
159a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying pho dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar gyi'o// oM sarba tA thA ga ta
159a2(rgyud 'grel): hA s+ya lA s+ye ra ti kri Ta swa khya nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo spyi bor bzhag nas ni// mkhas pas 'di skad brjod par bya// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
159a3(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khrims thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dpag bsam gyi shing dang gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod la mchod pa'i las
159a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la
159a5(rgyud 'grel): dadobul bor bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA gau tA nut+ta ra~M be d+hi le ka ka ra bas+t+ra pU dzA mi g+hA sa mu dra s+pha ra Na s+yA mA ye hUM snying khur rdo rje thal sbyar la// sgeg mo'o phyag rgya rnam bcings nas// phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa dang // dza bzhin
159a6(rgyud 'grel): don rig 'di ltar brjod// sems can thams cad ye pad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la reg lus par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nutA ra ma hA badz+re d+hA
159b1(rgyud 'grel): wa dA pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ spyi bor thal sbyar phreng ba yi// phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad brjod// sems can thams cang mi dge ba'i lus dang drag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang yang dag par
159b2(rgyud 'grel): bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i lus dang dag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ri mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal
159b3(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar ba nyid dang ni// glu'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byang thams cad kyi lus yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras
159b4(rgyud 'grel): pa med par zhugs shing / mig dad yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod po dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mo hA d+har+m+ma ba bo d+hi kAn+ti pa ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ye
159b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dang por ger sgor byas nas ni// de nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongasu bzhol zhing 'khru
159b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yongasu mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyuro cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pa ri t+yai gA nr-it+ta re ma hA bid+ya pA ra mi tAM pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang por gor bskor bya ba dang / me tog phyag
160a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings nas ni// sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur cig/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang tinge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa
160a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta re ma hA sau khya bi ha ra d+he na pA ra mi ta pA dza me g+hA sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes re ba
160a3(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin 'gro ba'i// bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob
160a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bzod dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan par gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang de kho na nyid mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes
160a5(rgyud 'grel): thob pAr gyur cig/ ai sarba tA thA ga tA nut+pa ra kre sha/ ts+tshe da sarba d+harnA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha swa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ gdugs daung rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs// bza' dang bca'u sogs
160a6(rgyud 'grel): dadang pa yis// phyi rol ji lta ba bzhin bzhig/ dpag tu med pa dbul bar bya// dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gas pa sngags ni// bzlas pa dag kyang legs par bya// yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas/ tshar brjod pa
160b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dkyil 'khor bstod // 'bad pa yis ni smon lam dag/ de nyid rig pus 'don par bya// yo byad thams cad 'byor pa yis// yongasu gang ba'i gter ma sbyin// oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM a d+ya nut+pan+na tratra
160b2(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis so// gal te go skabs yod gyur na// phyogs bcur snod rnams bsam pa la// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni// bcings pa bla na med pa'i// khur ba 'bras can 'bras yos
160b3(rgyud 'grel): ngadang // til rnams kyis ni gtor ma sbyin// de la sngags ni 'di ya ni te// lho dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// na mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyis rigs rnams dang //
160b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag cig pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni// thal sbyar khyed rnams la ni gsol 'debs kyis// bu smad bcas shing gi yog 'khor bcas pa rnams// gsan nas phan gdag
160b5(rgyud 'grel): slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ 'byung po gang dag ri reb steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i che lo da lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa drung // chu ba
160b6(rgyud 'grel): kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu ba kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu steng ka rku ngogs dang // g.ya' chu sil me cen na gang gnas dang // grong dang grang
161a1(rgyud 'grel): khyer phyugs lhas stong pa dang // khang stong dang ni lha'i khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer gnas ngag gam// dka' thub gnas dang glang chen gres dang ni// rgyal po'i dkar khang
161a2(rgyud 'grel): dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang // gang dag lam po che dang shing cig drung // dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang // seng+ge dred dang gcan gzan go nas rnams dang //
161a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brog chen 'jigasu rung bar gang gnas dang // gang drag gleng mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur na su// phreng ba dri dang me tog bdug//
161a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul ba// 'di dag bzhes nus btung zhing bsnams nas su// las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni// de nas
161a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin// shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhesu gsol// me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag/ chu bdog rlung bdug nor gyi
161a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dang // steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa stengs klu// ri'i lha dang gsang ba'i tsho gas 'dus pa// so so so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di// rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes
161b1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // rang rang phyogasu legs par bzhug nas su// rang gi bu smad mdza' gshes gnyen 'dun dang // nung mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas// 'di dag
161b2(rgyud 'grel): btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang // bdag gi las 'di'i 'bra sA bu mchis par mdzod // oM badz+ra shi kha re ru Da ma Ta/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha gab+hUM
161b3(rgyud 'grel): bi d+hu rA dza hUM/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma dz+dza/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta swA hA/ phyi rel lha yi 'khor lo dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mtshig/ rim gyis daM ru bzhug par bya// nas snying po'i 'khor lo dang /
161b4(rgyud 'grel): de yang gtsug tor dkyil 'khor la// dI ni 'khor lo dbang phyug la// de yang phyag mtshan dang thi go le re// de ltar snang ba sogs rim gyis// spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang // stong nyid la sogs rim thob
161b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rnal 'byor lhan skyes mdzes pa yin// de ltar goms pas 'jug pa rnams// mi shesnga chu bo ma lus pa// bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni/ shar ba bskal ba bzang po yin// rim pa 'di yis 'khor
161b6(rgyud 'grel): lo rnams// thams cad spro ba'ang shes par bya// thig le'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// yun ma ring bar grub par 'gyur// yang na mdor bsdus sngags kyis ni// ji skad bshad pa'i me tog sogs// gang zhig cung
162a1(rgyud 'grel): zad dbul bar bgyi// mye tog chung nA'ang 'dir nyon mong sA// dus mtha'i me ni 'joms pa yin// de la mdor bsdu ba'i sngags ni// oM sarba tA thA g+hA ta puSh+Ta pU dza me g+hA sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma
162a2(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ de bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa la yang ngo // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug 'ba' zhig gam/ yang na 'khor los sgyur ba nI// rgyu dang bcas pa 'am snying po 'am// 'khor lo 'am phyi nang thams cad lA// dang ba dag
162a3(rgyud 'grel): par ljin rnams dang // sems dpa' chen pos mchod par bya// mchod pa bshad par byas pa las// mtho ris thar pa'i snying po thob// de dang de las sgro 'drogs yongs 'khrul po// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa'i
162a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo yis// lha yi 'khor lo chen po dag staR+sha ba// thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs skyes pa yin// da ltar cig mchod 'khor lo ma lus pa// mchong rgyas 'di nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yin// shi bar gyur kyang bla yi
162a5(rgyud 'grel): drang med par// mchod bral skad cig ma yin sdig thob 'gyur// 'khor lo 'di dag rnam bsams nas// me tog thal mos pratIr ba dang // gang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams// de sA ni tIl gyi thal mo
162a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// skye ba dang ni 'jigs pa rnams// sna tshogs shes rab kyis mnyam pas// sdug bsngal thar med byed par 'gyur// yi ge gsum gyis gshegasu gsol// 'jig rten gsum gyi spyi bo yis// mi
162b1(rgyud 'grel): lci nor bu'i tshogs rnams ni// mtshungasu med mi yi seng ge yis// bdud bzhi glang sngo 'joms par byed// ma rig sdong po gcod pa yi// thub pa'i yon tan tshogs 'khor lho// phyag 'tshul bstod dang kha za
162b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// dge 'dun dag ni mchod par bya'o// bdag gi bsod nams 'di yi su nI// shes rab ye shes mi bzang meng // rtog pa shing gi rtsa ba dag/ sreg pa'i rdo rje rdung ba ru shog/ rdo rje'i rigs ni rtogs pa dang /
162b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs ni thob pa dang // don ngam rtogs pa pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs kyi don chen byed// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sgrub
162b4(rgyud 'grel): bapa'i thabs/ slob dpon so ma shrIs mdzad pa rdzogasaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhas po chen pau par+t+ti ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha bA dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
162b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal lo pi ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
162b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sku la phyag 'tshalo// rang 'byung rnam par dag pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung dbang phyug/ rmad du byung dang brtson 'grus 'dzin// sna tshogs bdag nyid phyag 'tshalo// spangs dang ye shes
163a1(rgyud 'grel): phun tshogs pa'i// gang gi drin gyis rnyed bla ba'i// dbyangs kyi rjes 'jug bdag nyid kyi// de'i rgyu la phyag 'tshalo// phyag brnyan bzhin du dngos grub ni// gang gi drin gyis rnyed sla ba'i//
163a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyis// bla ma'i zhabs dag rgyal gyur cig/ srid pa'i btsongs pas khyab pa yi// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam 'joms po'i// gang de 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor ni// yang dag lte bas 'jug
163a3(rgyud 'grel): po bshad // de la rnal 'byor tshangs gnas la// gnasu dang gsum la skyabs gnas dang // sems bskyed pa yi stobs kyis ni// drang gi sdom pa la gnas dang // rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa las// sems gnyis dge
163a4(rgyud 'grel): bapa mi rtogs nor// shin tu bde ba'ang rtogs pa dang // the tshom med dang chags med dang // dngos po lnga lo mkhas pa dang // pha rol phyin tshol mngon dga' ba dang // de las gzhan pa'i ngo bo ni// yon tan ldan pa mkhas
163a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// yid ches pa yi khyad par gyis// byang chub sems ni phul byung dang / thabs dang shes rabe gnyis med dang // mos pa yang dag ldan pa dang // ji bzhin dbang ni thob pa dang // bla ma sems can mnyen pa
163a6(rgyud 'grel): dad ltung ba sna tshogs spang ba'i phyir// gus po'i blo yis bskal bar ljon// de nyid rnam bcu rtag tu ni// yid la byed pa mngon bzhol ba// sngags dang rgyud dang de nyid shes// sgrub byed thub pa'i dbang por brjod// dkyil
163b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor las la 'jug 'dod pas// 'bad pas bsnyen pa la gnas bya// dang por bsnyen pa ma byas par// lha rnams byin gyis rlob mi 'gyur// yid mthun pa'i gnas rnamasu// snying kha'i pad+ma'i zla ba la// 'od zer 'bar
163b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i maM yig dgod// rang sems dag pa'i na mkha' la// rdzogs sangs sras dang bla mar bcaso// yang dag bltas l-i phyag 'tshal dang // dad pa rgyas pa'i yid kyis kyang // 'khor lo mchod pas dang por mchod// de la spa
163b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod sngon song ba'i// dang po'i mgon la phyag bzhi pa// chu gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang // snod rgyas pa yang dbul bar bya// me tog dang ni bdug pa dang // mar me dri yis mchod par bya// de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs//
163b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog spos dang mar me dri// rgyan gyi rang bzhin mchod pa ni// rin chen bzhi ni dbul bar bya// bzhad dang sgeg dang dga' ba dang // rtse 'jo'i bye brag bde ba dang // dpag bsam shing dang gos gyi shing // shing dang bcas pa de
163b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dbul// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du// ji ltar rang sngags bzlas pa dang // phyag rgya yis ni dbul bar bya// ngan par byas pa sun phyung nas// de rnams mdun
163b6(rgyud 'grel): shags par ba// g.yo med pa yis sems kyis kyang // gzhan gyi bsod nams rjes yi rang // dkon mchog gsum la brten stobs kyis// gnas pa gang las 'jigs pa 'byung // de nas rang gzhan don gyi phyir//
164a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems bskyed pa dang mthun par ni// blo ldan lam la gnas par bgyi// dge ba rgyun mi 'chang ba'i phyir// smon lam dag kyang gdon par bya// sems can
164a2(rgyud 'grel): kun la brten nas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas ni yongasu bsgom// rang bzhin med drang dge lnga sogs// dril phyir mtshan ma med pa dang // yid mI 'jug ces bya bo yid// shes rab ting 'dzin gsum la 'jug/ ji
164a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar rang sngags bzlas pa yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bya bar ldan// mthong ba'i lam byin rdzogs spangs kyis// bu la sogs pa bstan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag gis bstan pas// phyag 'tshol
164a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba 'debs pa ni// skyob pa ji ltar bdag la ni// bston pa yang dag bshad du gsol// rang bzhin grub pa bzlas pa yis// rang gi sems ni sgom par bgyis// sla gsol zla ba'i gzugasna lto bu// mthong
164a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni gsol ba dang // sems bskyed ces ni bya ba yi// dang po phyag 'tshal ldan pa dang // dbus su byang chub yang dag ldan// sems bskyed pa ni bsnun pa lngas// bde ba bskyed pa'i rjes la ni// zla ba'i gzugs
164a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mthong ngo zhes// gsol bas brtan par gyisau shig ces// gsungs pa de ni brtan pa yin// oM dz+nyA na raSh+mi bi sri dza hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'od zer gyis// sems can byang chub la bkod nas// de dag gcig
164b1(rgyud 'grel): pur gyur pa las// rdo rje rtogs par mngon par 'dod // oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM s+pha ra NA badz+ra/ oM saM ha ra Na badz+ra/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA nA badz+ra/ rdo rje dbyings shes yang dang yang // zhes ni bdag nyid
164b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra at+ma ko&haM// brtser ldan 'gro la phan pa dgra/ gyur phyir byin gyis brlab tu gsol// zhes ni gsol btab skad cig la// de dag rab tu zhugs nas ni// de yi bdag nyid rang nyid
164b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur// oM sarba ta thA gA ta tasti u haM/ rdo rje rin chen sogs mnyam nyid// rnam pa kun tu 'od gsal ba// chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung bya'i// dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bstod ngo // de nas gzhan don byed
164b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// slar yang 'di ltar bsgom par bya// khro bo'i gzugs ni 'chang ba yis// sIng kar pad+ma nyi hUM las// khro bo bcu po bgegs kyi gtso// lus ngag yid gsum phur bus gdab// phyi rol rdo rje dra ba dong //
164b5(rgyud 'grel): dra ba lo sogs rnam bsgom nas// yi ge hU~M gnyis dbus gnas pa'i// 'og tu yaM br-i raM ngag las// rlung chu m+me yi dkyil 'khor rnams// de nyid rig pas de ltar bya// mkha' la bruM yig los byung pa// rtag pa'i
164b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag las byung ba'i// bdud rtsi'i rgyuni ni yongs gang bas// snod ni de yi bdag nyid 'gyur// hUM yig ge nyi su baM las ni// sku yi rdo rje yang dag 'byung // gnas po 'khrang bas gyur pa las// gser gyi dkyil
165a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid du 'gyur// hUM yig ngos gnyis ldan pa yi// dbus su las lhun po ste// de ru b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// dpal ldan gzhal yas khang brtsegs sAm// phyi dang nang du sgo bzhi dang /
165a2(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi stegs bur yang dag ldan// dra baM dra phyed phreng ba dang // dril bu me ldong gis gsal ba'o// ka pa brgyad dang ldan pa dang // na mkha' bla ris snang ba yin// 'og gi sa gzhi mtho bo dang // yangs pa rnam par
165a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa yin// de dbus hrIHlas sna tshogs pa'i// chu skyes nyi mar seng ge'i gdan// dang po dbyangs las byung ba yi// rgyal ba rnam snang sku mngag dkar// 'khor lo dril bu phyag na bsnams// nyi mye la
165a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs bsgom par bya// de yang snying khar sna tshogs pa'i// pad+ma nyi ma d+hIHlus byung // dang po'i sangs rgyas mig sman mdog/ zhal lnga phyag ni brgyad dang ldan// g.yas brtsams sur po dmar po dang /
165a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dkar po pad+ma'o zhal// na mkha' 'dra bi'i ral gri dang // shes rab po ti bzhi bzhi ni// g.yas dag gA yon gyi phyag rnams kyis// sgeg dang bcas pas bsnamaswa pa yin+da// oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba// nang
165a6(rgyud 'grel): gi mu khyud dag la dgod// phyi rol ka la sogs bkod pa// sgeg dang mdzes par snang ba yin// snying khar srid pa'i 'khor la ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis sten pa'o// de'i lte ba'i 'khor lo no// rtsibs bcu
165b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis brgyan pa yim/ oM pradz+nyA la sogs pa yi// gti mug sel bar byed bya yis// lhag ma nye snying sngags phyed kyis// nang gi mu khyud rnam par bskor// mu khyud A li bcu gnyis kyis// 'khor lo 'di yang rnam par
165b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal// zla ba gzhon nu ltar 'dzem pa// gzhon nu sgeg pa'i cha byad can// sna tshogs kyis ni rtse ban dang // gdong lnga zur pud lnga dang ljin// dpung rgyun ngo sha laM yan lag mdzes// dpal 'phro ba yi zhabs gdub sgras//
165b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa// shin tu dbugs 'byin byed pa yin// gang zhig shes rab ye shes sku// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdun la bzhugs// dang po'i dbyangs las byung ba yi// dpal ldan
165b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dbyangs zhes dran bya// seng ge'i gdan la gser gyi mdog/ phyi rol-i shwar sogs phyogs dgod pa// nyi mar rdo rje skyoli krung bzhugs// rin chen cod pan gyis mdzes pa// g.yos kyi 'od zer bcus 'khor lo//
165b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa gdan la brten pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs ming na no// 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad shes bya// de la rig pa'i lha myo bzhi// de yi mtshams bzhi shes bya ste// rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngo// phyag gis
165b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rdor dril bsnams// rin chen sems ma gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu nye bar mdzes// chos kyi sems ma gur gum mdog/ pad+ma dril bus mtshan pa yin// las kyi sems ma ljang gu ste// sna tshogs rdo rje
166a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdams mdzes d+yad+ya// 'gro ba sdud par byed pa yi// g.yon pa snang ba chen po yin// shAr du rdo rje hUM mdzad ni// mdog nag rnam rgyal phyag rgya dang // rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyar ldan//
166a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung sa bon hUM las byung // glang po'i gdan la gnas pa dang // khro dang sgeg pi'i nyams dang ldan// lho ru rdo rje nyi maM ni// traM byung rmad byung NA yi gad nau// yid bzhin nor bu mA luso pa'i// dbul
166a3(rgyud 'grel): ba spel bar byed ba dang // dril bu skra yis sems can la// dpal rnams 'gugs par byed pa yin// pad+ma gar dbang sku mdog dmar// nub tu rma bya'i gang nA la bzhugs// chu skyes dril bu bsnams pa dang /
166a4(rgyud 'grel): taM yig paM lo sngon phyogs byed// byang du rta mchog sku mudog ljang // na mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs// a byung sna tshogs rdo rje dang // dril bu'i sgra yis phyogs kun khyab// saM gau bAM g+h+r-i sa bon
166a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// o hUM tro hrIMHldan pa las// gdan 'di dgra n+yai gau rimAs bzhin// mkhas pas grangs bzhin shes par bya// zla ba'i gdan gnas 'di rnams kyi// dang po'i sangs rgyas grong ma bzhini// srid
166a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo chings pa ste// snga ma las khyad med phyiraro// zhi ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// mi bskyod sogs rigs rim bzhin du// oM duHkhats+tshe da la sogs dgong // rigs ni ji ltar de na gnas
166b1(rgyud 'grel): namra zhes bya rtsibs zhig la// mkhas pas kun la shes par bya// sdug bsngal gcod pa rdo rje dang // rin po che ni gsung dbang phyug/ rdo rje rnon po pad+ma dang // ye shes sku can zhes bya ba// sna tshogs rdo rje
166b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa la// g.yas pa rAl gri khyad par med// kun kyang zla bo'i gdun la bzhugs// zla ba ltar 'jam cha byang can// dang po'i dbyings byung bzlas pa yang // snying po ny+ra snying rim pa bzhin// de la lnga po rimi
166b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// snying po dang ni nye snying po// oM badz+ra dz+nyA nA murta ye na ma/ oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te naM ma/ oM wA gi shwa ra ya te no ma/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na ya tr-i ma maHoM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ nye ba'i snying po thun mong ste// oM s+yarba d+har+m+ma b+hA wa
166b4(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wA bai shud+d+ha badz+ra a A ai aHpra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma/ pa rI shud d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma/ ya du ta sarba ta thA ga tra dz+nyA na kA ya muny+dzu shrI pa ri shud d+hi ta mu pa tA ye ti a A sarba ta thA ga ta hU~M da ya ha raM ha ra oM hUM hU~MH
166b5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha gaM waM dz+nyA na mur+t+ti wA gi shwa ra ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA gA gI nA mU la~M su pa ri shud d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA nA gar+b+ha a// 'di rnams kyang ni rim bzhin du/ sharu la sogs paru bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dbye
166b6(rgyud 'grel): pas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcu drug/ rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// rdo rje dril bu bsnams par 'dod// rdo rje rgyal po gser gyi mdog/ phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsdams// chags pa pad+ma rA
167a1(rgyud 'grel): gA'i mdog/ mnga' dang guzhu ni bsnams pa yin// rdo rje legs pa sku mdog ljang // phyag gnyis legaso sbyin pa'o// rin po che dang dril bu bsnams// rdo gzi brjid nyi ma'i
167a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ g.yas pa nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa// rdo rje dpali ni mar grang mdog/ g.yas na rgyal mtshan bsgoms pa yin// bzhad pa kun nga zla ba'i mdog/ g.yas pi so yi phreng ba bsnams// 'di/
167a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum po yi g.yon pa ni// skyil krung gang na la brten nas so// chos ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ gauyon pa pad+ma dmar po bsnams// g.yas pas rnam par 'byed pa yin// de ni rgyas par byed pa yin// rnon
167a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'od zer mdog/ ral gri ni pipo ti bsnams// rgyu dang smra ba g.yas pa na// 'khor lo ni lce bsnams pa// bdag nyid mdzes pa g.yon pa yi// phyag gis pad+ma gdan la brten// las ni sngo ljang sA
167a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i// rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams// bsrung ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// phyag gnyis go che 'bar ba'o// gnod sbyin mig sman nag po'i mdog/ phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa mdzes/
167a6(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur rmad byung mdzes pa'i mdog/ phan tshun khu tshur rdo rje 'dzin// bdag po rnam po bzhi yi phyir// bzhi bzhi ru ni dran par bya// lha mo bcu bcu 'di rnams kyis// 'khor du yang dag dran par bya// skyil krung
167b1(rgyud 'grel): phyed mar ldan pa yI// rang rang bdag po'i mdog bzhin no// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan de bzhin shes rab dang // smon lam ye shes shes bya ba// 'bras bu gnas kyi
167b2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// 'dog dkar rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'khor du de dag gnas pa yin// de nyid lam gyi ngo bor ni// bdud li lcags kyu 'debs pa gzhan// ser po rdo rje rgyal po
167b3(rgyud 'grel): yi// 'khor du de dag gnas pa yin// de nyid rnam par dag ngo bor// mda' dang gzhu yis rnam brgyan pa// mdog dmar rdo rje chags pa ni// thams cad dkyil 'khor yongasu bskor// gzhan drin dro bar
167b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas de nyid// phyag gnyis legs pa byin pa dang // sku mdog ljang gu'i 'khor rnams kyis// rdo rje legs pa bskor ba'o// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// gsum pa de bzhin 'o byed dang // 'od 'phro spyang
167b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' de bzhin du// mngon gyur ring srong myi goyo bA// legs pa'i blo glasde chos kyi sprin// sku mdog ser por 'bras bdag nyid// dar dpyangs btsang ba'i tshul gnas pa// rdo rje rini chen 'khor du gnas//
167b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid lam gyi grangs kyi ni// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma bsnams// rdo rje nyi ma nyid bzhin du// rje su byed par gnas pa yin// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa lam dang de bzhin du// chos
168a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rjes shesmra pa dang // kun rdzob shes pa dang de bzhin du// don dam de bzhin mi skye bya// bang pa shes pa'i ye shes ni// rang basbyin phun sum tshogs dgu pa'o// rirna
168a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal margyan bsnams pa dang // mdag ltang d+hargyus mtshan // phun sum tshogs pa bsam par bya// glunan don thun sum bdag nyid kyi/ de bzhin rna ba'i 'do'i mngag// rdo rje ba'ang pa la ldan
168a3(rgyud 'grel): // so yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phreng po khyams dang skye mched dang // bden pa rten 'brel grubo pa yi// gnas dang gnas min bdag po dang // dus gsum bden pa rnam pa bzhi// 'dus byas
168a4(rgyud 'grel): 'asu ma byas dge ba// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor du bsgom// don dang phyug g.yon pad+ma ni// bsnams na ste g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad// gcig dang rgyu drung ba 'i dang // byed pa dang ni dbyung sbyar dang /
168a5(rgyud 'grel): 'i don dong brtag pa dang // nyon mongs pa drod dag pa'i gnas// rnal 'byor cin dang mi grol bkrol// bdag tu 'dzin pa skye ba nyid// de dag gcod pa'i sku mdog nog/ phyag na po ti ba~M snams pa dang
168a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs gcong pa'i ral gri bsnams// rdo rje rnon po'i 'khor du brjod// dad dang 'artson 'grus dran bsam gtan// shes rab de bzhin sha yi spyan// lha dang shes rab chos dang ni// sangs rgyas spyan
168b1(rgyud 'grel): dung drang po yi// rdo rje 'khor lo sgyu mdog ser// lha mo 'khor lo bsnams par bskor// gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dang // mos pa dad ni sna tshogs khams// dbyung po kun 'gro lam dag dang //
168b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs rnam par sbyang ba dang // sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang // zag pa zad pa nyid kyang de// rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog/ phyag gis lce bsnams 'khor gyis bskor// nam mkha' rnam shes mtha'
168b3(rgyud 'grel): yas dag/ de las gzhan pa'i zil gnon brgyad// rdo rje la ni sku mdog ljang // sna tshogs rdor dril thogs pas bskor// 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi po dang // sngon po ser po dkar dmar dang // na mkha'
168b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin sems dang ni// zad par rnam dag ldan pa yin// bsrung ba ser po go cha bsnams// rtsu ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na// phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang // 'bras bu rgyu'i de kho na// phra ba dang ni rags pa dang //
168b5(rgyud 'grel): grags dang rnam par dag yul dang // sdud dang dbye ba'i mtshon nyid dang // mkhas de kho ni rnam bcu ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag/ phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa'o// tshe dang sems dang
168b6(rgyud 'grel): yo byad dang // las dang spyi bi mos pa dang // smon lom dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang // ye shes dang ni dbang po dang // rdo rje khu tshuraraM sku mdog dkar// phyog gnyis khu tshur bsnams pa'o// so sor gtso bo'i sngags
169a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskyed// rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dang // rdo rje skyil krung phyed kyis ni// 'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin// 'di ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yon tan phun sum
169a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa nI// ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob// dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos// 'di rnams kyi ni grwa bzhi ru// mkhas pas sgeg mo'i la sogs bsgom// sgeg mo mdog dkar rdo rje bsnams//
169a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ma ni gser gyi mdog/ rin chen phreng ba bsnams pa yin// glu ma sku mdog dmar po ste// pi lcang rngub pa'i mchog yin no// grar ma rdo rje ljang gu ni// rtse gcig bsnams nas gAr mdzad do// spos
169a4(rgyud 'grel): dang me tog mar me dri// de rnams rjes la dran par bgyi// spos khang me tog snod dang ni// mar me yi ni mchod sdong dang // dri yi dung chos rim bzhin no// 'di rnams kha dog skagri sogs bzhin// lcags kyu dang
169a5(rgyud 'grel): ni zhags pa drung // lcags sgrog dril bu zhes grags pa// dkar po ser po dmar po ldang // shwa ra la sogs pa'i sgo la rten// ming dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gnas// phyi rol skal pa bzang po ni// shir la
169a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsgom par bya// rnam pa bzhi yi dbye ba yi// de dag bcu drug yang dag 'dod// rang gi bdag po'i rjes mthun par// sku mdog phyag mtshan mdzes pa yin// yang na gzhan du phyag mtshan rnams// rim
169b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bsam par bya// de la mgron po byams pa ni// phyag na klu shing bsnams pa yin// 'jam dpal ral gri po ti dAg/ ji ltar rim bzhin mtshan ma yin// spos kyi glang po spos chu yi// dri yi dung chos char
169b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs pa'i// thod dang bcas pa'i cod pon ni// ye shes rtog ni bsgreng nas bsnams// bzang skyong ba ni na mkha'i mdzod// bslang na mtshan par byed pa'o// blo gros rgya mtshe yid bzhin nor// phyag gi pad+ma mudzes
169b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang // blo gros mi bzang phyag g.yon na// po ti so mtshan pa'i pad+ma ni// spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du// phyag ne ral gri bsnams pa yin// mthu che ni thob pa
169b4(rgyud 'grel): ral gri bsnams// ngan song kun 'dren rgyal mtshan no// mya byin mun pa nges 'joms nI// dpal be g.yu drung 'khyil pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od rnamaso// zla 'od gzhon nu zhes bya ba// zla tshes g.yer ka rgyal mtshan
169b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// 'od dpag med pa po ti dang // ral gri rin chen mdzod 'dzin pa// nu mkha'i snying por shes par bya'o// sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri ni// bsgrims pa sgrib pa rnam par se lo// byang chubA sems dpa' zhes 'dod do//
169b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams phyi yi sgo skyong dag/ sngar ni ji skad smos pa bzhin// de ltar bsgoms pa'i rjes la ni// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas// de nyid gsum gyi yi ge yi// rnal 'byor rig pas byin brlobs bya//
170a1(rgyud 'grel): de l+yA rIm pa 'di yin tre// spyan drang sngon 'gro phyag 'tshal te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa da ban+d+ha na kA ro mi// e ma kun tu bzang po yi// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog/
170a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzeso// de nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhugs nas// Sh+Tha do nA rang rang rig pa ni// byin gyis brlab
170a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nA dzad pa yin// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen gdong nas skye ba med// rdul bral thams cad ji snyed kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gyur// de nyid gsum gyi byin brlobs dang // 'khri
170a4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i bdag nyid dbang bsgyur nas// rang bzhin dag par bsgom par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti a b+hi She ka sa ma ye shrI yai hUM/ de ltar ting 'dzin gsum dang ni// mkhas pas cho gu byas nas ni// de nas rang lha'i
170a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis// mchod pa yang dag brtsam par bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyo ldan g.yo bas// arga'i snod ni bzang ba yis// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum dang ni// de nyid gsum gyiso bsam par bya// de nas mkhra
170a6(rgyud 'grel): pis mo tog sogs// de yi chu yis bsang bar byo// oM badz+ra puSh+pe hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra AM lo ke hUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badz+ra a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA nAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta/ e AHhUM/ phyag
170b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal rdo rje ldan pa yI// dz+dzaHhUM bAM hoHzhes pa dang / se gol brdabs la dgug pa dang // phyag byas nas ni arga dbul// oM badz+ra a ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra A be sh+yA a/ zhwag+sa
170b2(rgyud 'grel): nas yi ge gsum gyis ni// byin gyis brlab lA da dang bskur ro// de nas sder bshang rim pa yis// mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang // dri las gzhan po'i rigasaM ma ni// bcu drug gis ni mchod bstod bya// dkyil
170b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam gsum phyag mtshan dung // ji srid thig le'i ri mA pa dang // snang ba lA sogs rim pa yi// spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang // stong nyid sogs rImra thob pa yi// rnal 'byor lhan skyes mdzes pa yis// dau ltar go/
170b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jug pa rnams// mi shes chu bo ma lus pa// bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni// shwar bskal pa bzang po yin// spros dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// ji srid sgrub pa mi skyo'i bar// de ltar yod dang yang du bya// langs nas
170b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// dwe nes gtor ma sbyin par bya// de lta rdo rje dpa' bye ni// 'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa las// a las byung zhing sku mdog dkare// rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams// thugs kai ri dang po sangs rgyas
170b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin// de la mya ngan 'das 'khor lo// e ra la sogs yi ger ldan// de steng a ra pa tsa na// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams// 'ang yi nye ba'i snying po ni// sngar ni bstan zin gang yin pa'o//
171a1(rgyud 'grel): oM a ra pa tsA na yA te nA ma// sngags kun rigs kyi bdag nyid kyi// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yang // zhal bzhi sku mdog dung 'dra zhing // bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan pa'o//
171a2(rgyud 'grel): dang por sangs rgyas thugs ka ru// zhi ba'i 'khor lo 'di rnams kyang // rtsibs drug pa la ris drug gis// yongasu bskor bar ldan pa'o// de la gnyis med 'jam pa'i dpal// mdog dkar zhal
171a3(rgyud 'grel): drug a las byung // phyag gnyis ral gri po ti bsnams// gnyis kyis ut+pal bsnams pa dang // gnyis ni ting badz+ran phyag rgya ni// yang dag snang ba snang ba che// 'di dag so so'i snying po ni// sgrub
171a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs las gsal bar bstan// bshad pa'i 'khor lo bdag nyid ni// lha rnams nyi shur mnyam pa la// gcig gi bdog nyid chen po ni// blo chen rnams kyis mchod par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad
171a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yis// 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'dod pa la// 'di rnams rang gi ngo bo ni// kho bos sngar ni bstan zin to// 'on kyang 'di yi khyad par ni// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// mda'o dang gzhu ni 'gengs
171a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // rnam rgyal phyag rgya dzar dril dang // ral gri rdo rje zhags pa dang // lcags kyu dang ni lcag steHbsnams// lha chen u ma mnan pa ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces brjod do// 'di yi rin chen hUM mdzad
171b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug rnam rgyal phyag rgya med// zhal drug zhal ni re re la// spyan ni gsum gsum ldan pa'o// 'di ni pad+ma'i hUM mdzad ni// mche gtsigs ha la ha lar ldan// 'di yi las kyi hUM mdzad ni// rnam rgyal rang gi
171b2(rgyud 'grel): phyog rgyar ldan// lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri dang // gtun shing lkog ma phyag na bsnams// gang yang rdo rje rin chen ni// 'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa la// ser pe rin chen gyis mtshan pa// kun kyang rin
171b3(rgyud 'grel): chen cod pan can// de la rnam snang sngar bshad bzhin// don kun grub po mi bskyod pa// rdo rje bsnams nas sa gnon no// rin chen gtsug phung snga ma bzhin// rin chen pad+ma sku mdog ser// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas
171b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // laM las byung ba'i sa bon ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa d+ma la// g.yas pa bkod nis g.yon pa la// bsam gtan dang po'i per du gnan// rin chen don yod don yod do// rdo rje'i che go ni thams
171b5(rgyud 'grel): cang la// rang ming rin chen sgra drang ni// yang dag ldan pa'i sku yin no// rin chen rdo rje'i rdor tshig la// khro gnyer ldan par shes par bya// g.yon pas rdo rje gnon pa dang // g.yas pas 'dod pa gnon
171b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdo rje rin chen nyi ma 'od// rin chen dpal ni rgyal mtshan brjod// gang yang pad+ma ger dbang phyug/ 'khor los sbyar bar 'dod pa lo// rdo rje'i gnasu pad+ma'i tshig/ lha gzhan kun la shes par bya// de
172a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gsheg pa pad+ma'i tshig/ sngon song rnam par snang mdzad brjod// rin chen rin chen gtsug phung dang // pad+ma gar gyi dbang la yang // ting 'dzin sgra yid ston du ni// pad+ma zhes ni
172a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yin// pad+ma nges pa'i dbang phyug ni// pad+ma'i don yod grub pa yin// gzhan gyi khyad par 'di dag kyang // nor bus byas pa'i rin po che// nyi ma nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa// dpal ni zla ba'i dang pa las//
172a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ku mu ta la ni// zla bas mtshon pa'i gdugs bsnams pa'o// bzhud pa la nI zhal bcu gcig/ pad+ma'i sgrol ma brgya byin mdog/ pad+ma'i 'khor lo khyab 'jug 'dra// smra ba tshangs pa'i rjesu byang // las ni
172a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu lte bu ste// de las gzhan pa khyad par med// rta mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid dam// rnam pa lnga 'am rnam pa gcig/ sngon po gsum gyi bdag nyid ni// ral gri mda' gzhu ut+pal bsnams// 'di yi
172a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gnyis pa ni// g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams// de la gtsang ma sku mdog dkar// pad+ma sngon pos rnam par mdzes// deg ma pad+ma rang gi mdog/ pad+ma dmar pos rnam par mdzes// 'di yi nang gi
172a6(rgyud 'grel): skye mched rnams// sa snying la sogs byin gyis brlabs// phyi yi skye mched rnams la ni// gzugs rdo rje sogs byin gyis brlabs pa'o// g.yon pas 'dod pa'i 'jig rten gnon// g.yas pas mnan pa
172b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan yin// rta skad 'tsher ba phyogs kyi zhal// bsam gtan dang po'i bar du reg/ lnga yi bdag nyid snga ma bzhin// yang na 'od dpag med pa bzhin// po ti dang ni ral gri dang // mda' gzhu bsnams
172b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yid 'phrog pa'o// tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug ni// pa ba sangs dang skar ma'i dgra/ zhabs kyi pad+ma bskor ba yis// grong khyer sum rtsegs pa gnon pa// 'phrog ma'i lha mo rnams kyang ni// 'di dag
172b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud nas bzhugs pa'o// rta yi ga dong can thams cad kyang // 'khor kun yongasu shes par bya// de ltar zla gcig phra drug gimr-i// lho gcig mtshan ma thob par du// de srid bsnyen pa byas nus ni// dkyi
172b4(rgyud 'grel): las la 'jug par bya// gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yi// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// chang ldan tshwa rgod med par ni// dkyil lnga khor dam pa bri bar bya// rgyal pos khru ni lnga brgya bcu// blon po chen pos ny+tsi
172b5(rgyud 'grel): shu lnga// tshong dpon ded dpon nyi shu 'am phyed// sgrub pos bcu gnyis sam do'i phyed// der ni mngoni spyod sbyin sreg dang // zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg dag/ byos nas sa ni sbyang bar bya// yongasu bzung bar bya ba ste
172b6(rgyud 'grel): der ni dkyil 'khor yongs sprul nas// gong du ji skad bshad pa bzhi// phyag 'tshal la sogs sngon song nas// mchod pa yongasu rgyas por bya// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
173a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstod nas// sa yi lha mo spyan drangs la// sna tshogs mchod pas mchod nas ni// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyud par gyis// sA dang pha rol
173a2(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dang // lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shIkya'i seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri// mig gnyis nyi zla rkang mthig
173a3(rgyud 'grel): ni// rdo rje rgya gram byin brlabs nas// zhal nas hUM gi sgra sgrogs shing // yongasu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang // rdo rje dra ba ra bau bsam// lag gnyis rdo rje dril ldan dag/
173a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa yis// tshul gyis bgegs la bka' bsgo dang // phur bus btab pa la sogs byo// de nas de nyid dris byugs la// lha yi gan su tsan dan las// stsogs pa'i dri yi thig le dang /
173a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya// de rjes na mkha' la gnas pa// dkyil 'khor lha rnams bkug nas ni// mchod pa lnga dang brgyad rnams kyang // mchod nas 'di ltar brjod par bya// rnam par smang mdzad
173a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das// rigs lho rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag no gus pa la// de bas
173b1(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba mdzad par rigs// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang // byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gsang sngags lha gzhan gang bzhugs dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang // gang yang
173b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po mthu chun dang // gang du lha'i spyan mnga' ba// sems can bstan lo dga' ba rnams// bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// song ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming
173b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes bya be ci nus kyi// cho ga bzhin du 'bri lags na// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// thugs ni brtse bar dgongasu gsol// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab par mdzadu
173b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// zhes ni lan gsum brjod pa yis// lha rnams lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas 'og nas 'chad pa yi// bum pa mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // 'bru la sogs pa thams tsid dang // bcas pa lhag
173b5(rgyud 'grel): par gnas par bya// gzhan yang sbyin sreg cho ga dang // gtorarA ma shin tu rgya chen po// slob mu lhag par gnas pa dang // rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// de la khrus byas gtsang ma yi// gos gon nas ni slob

174a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag 'tsha lo// dam tshig de nyid sbrul du gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// sgrubs gnas dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon
174a2(rgyud 'grel): pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// bu tshur shog cig thig chen po// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin to// gsang sngags sbyong pa'i cho ga 'di// khyod la yang dag bstan por bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das
